改革还处在探索阶段，要摸着石头过河，使其健康发展。
Gǎigé hái chǔzài tànsuǒ jiēduàn，yào mō zhe shítou guò hé，shǐ qí jiànkāngfāzhǎn。
To ensure a healthy development of the reforms, we should be very cautious, for they are still at the exploratory stage.
探照灯光扫过夜空。
Tànzhào dēngguāng sǎoguò yèkōng。
The searchlights swept across the night sky.
侦察兵一闪身机警地躲过了敌人的探照灯。
Zhēnchábīngyì shǎnshēn jījǐng de duǒguò le dírén de tànzhàodēng。
The scout dodged nimbly and evaded the enemy\'s searchlight.
她看侦探小说看上瘾了。
Tā kàn zhēntàn xiǎoshuō kàn shàngyǐn le。
She\'s developed a yen for detective stories.
探询丈夫情况的强烈欲望烧炙着我。
Tànxún zhàngfu qíngkuàng de qiángliè yùwàngshāozhì zhe wǒ。
I burned with the desire to ask after my husband.
探照灯射出一道道强光。
Tànzhàodēngshèchū yí dàodào qiángguāng。
The searchlights projected powerful beams of light.
你去探一下这条小河的深浅，看能不能蹚水过去。
Nǐ qù tàn yíxià zhètiáo xiǎohé de shēnqiǎn，kàn néng bu néng tāngshǔi guòqù。
Go and find out how deep the stream is and whether we can wade across.
用放射性同位素示踪技术探讨生命现象
yòng fàngshèxìng tóngwèisù shì zōng jìshù tàntǎo shēngmìng xiàn xiàng

Kāntànduì tàbiàn le zǔguó de shānshānshuǐshuǐ。
The prospecting team has traversed the length and breadth of the land.

Yǒu rén cóng ménkǒu tànjìn tóu lái。
Somebody popped his head in at the door.

cìtàn

zhēntàn

小猫总是巴头探脑地望着它的主人。
Xiǎomāo zǒngshì bātóu tànnǎo de wàng zhe tā de zhǔrén。
The kitten always tilts its head, and looks at its owner innocently.
去热带雨林里探险，必须扎上绑带。
Qù rèdài yǔlín lǐ tànxiǎn，bìxū zāshàng bǎngdài。
Leg wrappings are necessary when venturing into tropical rainforest.
这次会议的重点是探讨脂肪肝的辩证施治。
Zhècì huìyì de zhòngdiǎn shì tàntǎo zhīfánggān de biànzhèng shīzhì。
The focus of this meeting is to discuss the diagnosis and treatment of adiposis hepatica based on the overall analysis of the illness, and the patient\'s condition.
侦探善于猜料事件的发展过程。
Zhēntàn shànyú cāiliào shìjiàn de fāzhǎn guòchéng。
Detectives are good at speculating the process of events.
我在谈话中一直试图测探他的真实意图。
Wǒ zài tánhuà zhōng yìzhí shìtú cètàn tā de zhēnshí yìtú。
I was trying to determine his real intentions through our discussions.
这次科学考察团的任务就是探测沙地下是否有石油。
Zhècì kēxué kǎochátuán de rènwù jiùshì tàncè shādìxia shìfǒu yǒu shíyóu。
The task of this scientific group is to explore whether there is oil under the ground.
张教授写了一本书《亚健康初探》，还很畅销。
Zhāng jiàoshòu xiě le yìběn shū《Yàjiànkāngchūtàn》，hái hěnchàngxiāo。
Professor Zhang wrote a book titled &quot;Pilot Study on Sub-health&quot;, which sold well.
石油勘探者们正在打井。
Shíyóu kāntànzhěmen zhèngzài dǎjǐng。
The oil explorers are drilling well.
你先去打探一下，看看老师来了没。
Nǐ xiānqù dǎtàn yíxià，kànkàn lǎoshī lái le méi。
Please go to see whether the teacher has arrived or not.
他把头探出吊窗向外张望。
Tā bǎ tóu tànchū diàochuāng xiàng wài zhāngwàng。
He stretched his head out of the sash and looked outside.
这次的队日活动是去养老院探望孤寡老人。
Zhècì de duìrì huódòng shì qù yǎnglǎoyuàn tànwàng gūguǎ lǎorén。
Our collective activity this time is go and visit the elderly in a nursing home.
他是位精于探案的福尔摩斯。
Tā shì wèi jīngyú tànàn de Fúěrmósī。
He is good at detecting, like Sherlock Holmes.
他的梦想是当一名干探。
Tā de mèngxiǎng shì dāng yìmíng gàntàn。
His dream is to be a good detective.
我们去戈壁滩探险吧。
Wǒmen qù gēbìtān tànxiǎn ba。
Let\'s explore the desert.
委员们在探讨如何有效地解决“黑地”问题。
Wěiyuánmen zài tàntǎo rúhé yǒuxiào de jiějué“hēidì”wèntí。
Commissioners are discussing how to solve the problem of unregistered land effectively.
天地皇皇，宇宙浩大，自然中还有很多未知的方面等待我们去探索。
Tiāndì huánghuáng，yǔzhòu hàodà，zìrán zhōng háiyǒu hěnduō wèizhī de fāngmiàn děngdài wǒmen qù tànsuǒ。
The world is insignificant, and the universe vast.  In nature there are still many unknown fields waiting for us to exploit them.
监押期间亲属是不能探望犯人的。
Jiānyā qījiān qīnshǔ shì bùnéng tànwàng fànrén de。
During custody, relatives are not allowed to see the criminal.
物理教研室的老师正在探讨新教材的教法。
Wùlǐ jiàoyánshì de lǎoshī zhèngzài tàntǎo xīn jiàocái de jiāofǎ。
Teachers at the Physics Teaching Research Office are discussing how to teach with the new textbook.
探亲访友不需要办居住证吧？
Tànqīn fǎngyǒu bùxūyào bàn jūzhùzhèng ba？
Do I need a residence certificate to visit my relatives?
出发之前他写了决心书，表示一定要克服各种困难完成这次科考探险活动。
Chūfā zhīqián tā xiě le juéxīnshū，biǎoshì yídìng yào kèfú gèzhǒng kùnnan wánchéng zhècì kēkǎo tànxiǎn huódòng。
Before leaving, he wrote a pledge, saying he would conquer all the difficulties in order to accomplish this exploration.
这次南极探险之旅，定于下周一开拔。
Zhècì nánjí tànxiǎn zhī lǚ，dìngyú xià zhōuyī kāibá。
The exploration of the South Polar will set off next Monday.
经实地勘查，火灾原因已初步探明。
Jīng shídì kānchá，huǒzāi yuányīn yǐ chūbùtànmíng。
After the field investigations, the cause of the fire has been preliminarily verified.
俗话说“靠山吃山，靠水吃水”，于是他就想出了靠沙吃沙的点子，开发出了沙漠探险的特色旅游项目。
Súhuà shuō“kàoshān chīshān，kàoshuǐ chīshuǐ”，yúshì tā jiù xiǎngchū le kàoshā chīshā de diǎnzi，kāifā chū le shāmò tànxiǎn de tèsè lǚyóu xiàng mù。
As a popular saying goes: &quot;Those living on a mountain live off the mountain, those living near the water live off the water.&quot; Therefore he had the idea of making use of the sand and developed a special tourism item of desert exploration.
我们的徒步探险从出发到现在，已经进行了8天，克日可达目的地。
Wǒmen de túbùtànxiǎn cóng chūfā dào xiànzài，yǐjing jìnxíng le bātiān，kèrì kě dá mùdìdì。
Our expedition for food has continued for eight days, and we will arrive at the destination in due time.
勘探矿源的工作十分辛苦。
Kāntàn kuàngyuán de gōngzuò shífēn xīnkǔ。
The work of surveying mineral resources is very hard.
他写的侦探小说逻辑性很强。
Tā xiě de zhēntàn xiǎoshuō luójíxìng hěnqiáng。
His detective novels are full of logic.
探险队员每人都随身携带一个小煤油炉。
Tànxiǎnduìyuán měi rén dōu suíshēn xiédài yígè xiǎo méiyóulú。
Every member of the expedition took a small paraffin stove.
人类在不断地探索着自然界的秘奥。
Rénlèi zài búduàn de tànsuǒ zhe zìránjiè de mìào。
Human beings constantly exploit the profound mysteries of nature.
空军基地安装有很多具有抛物面的雷达探测器。
Kōngjūn jīdì ānzhuāng yǒu hěnduō jùyǒu pāowùmiàn de léidá tàncèqì。
Many parabolic radar detectors have been installed in the air force base.
他曾经破过无数大案，人称神探。
Tā céngjīng pòguò wúshù dààn，rénchēng shéntàn。
Having cracked many criminal cases, he is regarded as a master detective.
这艘船上安装了两台声呐探测仪。
Zhèsōuchuán shàng ānzhuāng le liǎng tái shēngnà tàncèyí。
This ship is installed with two sonar detectors.
我最喜欢看这种探案的电视剧了。
Wǒ zuì xǐhuan kàn zhèzhǒng tànàn de diànshìjù le。
I love such detective TV series the most.
每个队员都配备了这种小型的铁矿石探测器。
Měigè duìyuán dōu pèibèi le zhèzhǒng xiǎoxíng de tiěkuàngshí tàncèqì。
Everyone in the group is equipped with this kind of small-sized iron ore sounder.
这种最新型的探测仪价格不菲。
Zhèzhǒng zuì xīnxíng de tàncèyí jiàgé bùfěi。
The latest detectors are very expensive.
据探马来报，敌人已经开始撤退了。
Jù tànmǎ láibào，dírén yǐjing kāishǐ chètuì le。
According to the cavalry, the enemy are beginning to withdraw.
我希望能探秘海洋的更深处。
Wǒ xīwàng néng tànmì hǎiyáng de gèng shēnchù。
I hope that I can explore deep into the ocean.
我每年可以享有三天的探亲假。
Wǒ měinián kěyǐ xiǎngyǒu sāntiān de tànqīnjià。
Every year, I can enjoy three days of home leave.
我公司引进了两台新型的探伤仪。
Wǒ gōngsī yǐnjìn le liǎng tái xīnxíng de tànshāngyí。
Our company introduced two new flaw detectors.
我有机会一定要去泰山探胜。
Wǒ yǒu jīhuì yídìng yào qù Tài Shān tànshèng。
If there is a chance, I will go to Mount Tai to visit the wonderful scenic spots there.
我这篇论文的题目是《中国证券市场探析》。
Wǒ zhèpiān lùnwén de tímù shì《Zhōngguó zhèngquàn shìchǎng tànxī》。
The title of my thesis is &quot;a look at China\'s securities market&quot;.
我要把精力放在探幽数学问题上。
Wǒ yào bǎ jīnglì fàngzài tànyōu shùxué wèntí shàng。
I will spend all my time and energy probing into difficult math problems.
人类正不断地向美丽的海底深处探幽。
Rénlèi zhèng búduàn de xiàng měilì de hǎidǐ shēnchù tànyōu。
Mankind is exploring the beautiful depths of the sea.
这些资料对遗失文化的探赜索隐是非常有价值的。
Zhèxiē zīliào duì yíshī wénhuà de tàn赜 suǒyǐn shì fēicháng yǒu jiàzhí de。
The reference materials are of great value in that they look into the lost culture.
队里派出去趟道的探险队员给我们传回了好消息。
Duì lǐ pài chūqù tàngdào de tànxiǎnduìyuán gěi wǒmen chuánhuí le hǎo xiāoxi。
Some members of the expedition who were sent out to explore the way ahead brought us good news.
科学家们正在对地质构成情况进行科学物探。
Kēxuéjiāmen zhèngzài duì dìzhì gòuchéng qíngkuàng jìnxíng kēxué wùtàn。
The scientists are determining the distribution of the mineral deposits in regard to the geological structure.
由于小吴喜欢打探小道消息，大家都戏称他“包打听”。
Yóuyú Xiǎo Wú xǐhuan dǎtàn xiǎodào xiāoxi，dàjiā dōu xìchēng tā bāodǎtīng。
Xiao Wu is very nosy, and is nicknamed &quot;the inquirer&quot;.
我们宣明了公司的目标，大家可以一起探讨。
Wǒmen xuānmíng le gōngsī de mùbiāo，dàjiā kěyǐ yìqǐ tàntǎo。
We stated our company\'s goals for discussion.
上次户外探险，我们用羊皮筏过河，好刺激呢。
Shàngcì hùwài tànxiǎn，wǒmen yòng yángpífá guòhé，hǎo cìjī ne。
During the last outdoor exploration, we rowed a sheepskin raft across the river, it was exciting.
这个侦探小说把我的思绪引向了一个险象环生的世界。
Zhège zhēntàn xiǎoshuō bǎ wǒ de sīxù yǐn xiàng le yígè xiǎn xiàng huánshēng de shìjiè。
This detective novel fills my thoughts with a world full of dangers.
钻探队正在打油气井，准备开采天然气。
Zuāntànduì zhèngzài dǎ yóuqìjǐng，zhǔnbèi kāicǎi tiānránqì。
The drilling team is working on a petroleum associated gas well to exploit natural gas.
宇航器的出现为我们探索太空提供了可能。
Yǔhángqì de chūxiàn wèi wǒmen tànsuǒ tàikōng tígōng le kěnéng。
The shape of a spaceship makes it possible for us to explore outerspace.
探险队决定今晚在山顶扎营。
Tànxiǎnduì juédìng jīnwǎn zài shāndǐng zhāyíng。
The exploration team decided to pitch a camp at the hilltop tonight.
现在有海外关系的人很多，出国探亲变得十分平常。
Xiànzài yǒu hǎiwài guānxì de rén hěnduō，chūguó tànqīn biàn de shífēn píngcháng。
Nowadays many people have relatives residing abroad, so going abroad to visit relatives has become common.
我们新引进了一台金属探伤设备。
Wǒmen xīn yǐnjìn le yìtái jīnshǔ tànshāng shèbèi。
We have introduced new crack detection.
自然界有很多未知的事物等着我们去探寻。
Zìránjiè yǒu hěnduō wèizhī de shìwù děng zhe wǒmen qù tànxún。
There are many unknown things in the natural world waiting for us to explore.

Búyào kuītàn biérén de yǐnsī.
You shouldn\'t pry into other people\'s private affairs.

Zìtǐ zhuānjiā néng cóng zìtǐ zhōng kuītàn rén de xìnggé.

嗅探犬
xiùtàn quǎn

Shǎoshí léiyǔ tíngle，tànxiǎnduì yòu jìxù gǎnlù。
Before long the storm stopped and the exploration team continued on its way.
美国试探英国对美伍战争的态度。

足球迷
zúqiúmí 
a soccer fan (or enthusiast)
他对足球着迷。
Tā duì zúqiú zháomí。
He\'s fanatical about football.

误入迷途。

玩电子游戏入了迷。
Honestly, I think that your idea will lead you down a blind alley.
坦率地说，我认为你的想法会把你引入迷途。
to be in/go into a trance
在/陷入迷睡状态
The market took a downturn.
Shìchǎng zhuǎnrù dīmí。
市场转入低迷。
to be thrown into turmoil/confusion
陷入混乱/迷惑
to sink into depression/a coma
陷入消沉/昏迷
He sighed, closed his eyes and drifted finally to sleep.
Tā tànle yì kǒu qì，bìshàng yǎnjing，zuìhòu mímíhūhú jìnrù mèngxiāng。
他叹了一口气，闭上眼睛，最后迷迷糊糊进入梦乡。
球迷为足球队摇旗呐喊。
Qiúmí wèi zúqiúduì yáoqínàhǎn。
The football fans banged the drum for their team.
球迷对中国足球队永远失望了。

The fans have lost all hope in the Chinese football team.
球迷们疯狂地争斗起来，看台倒坍，酿成惨祸。

When the football fans got into a frenzied fight, the spectators\' stand collapsed and a horrible disaster occurred.
昨天晚上闹事的足球迷给拘起来了。

The football fans who made trouble last night were detained.
足球迷
zúqiúmí 
a soccer fan (or enthusiast)
球迷们纷纷拥入赛场。
Qiúmímen fēnfēn yōngrù sàichǎng。
The fans crowded into the competition venue.
在这场比赛中，球迷对边裁的判罚表示不满。
Zài zhèchǎng bǐsài zhōng，qiúmí duì biāncái de pànfá biǎoshì bùmǎn。
The football fans were not satisfied with the side umpire.
他虽然是个球迷，但他从来不看中国男足的比赛。

Though he is a football fan, he never watches the matches of Chinese Men’s National Football Team.

Zúqiú shìjièbēi sì nián jǔbàn yícì，shì quánshìjiè qiúmí de gòngtóng jiérì。
A common festival for all football fans all over the world, the Football World Cup, is held once every four years.
虽然双方球迷都喊破了嗓子，但下半时双方仍踢成1：1。

Though fans of both sides shouted at the top of their lungs.  The two teams tied the game with the result of 1 to 1 in the second half of the game.

bǎi míhúnzhèn

There is a revival of superstitious practices in the countryside.
这种迷信的风俗存在了很长的时间，积弊很深，改革起来比较复杂。
Zhèzhǒng míxìn de fēngsú cúnzài le hěncháng de shíjiān，jībì hěnshēn，gǎigé qǐlái bǐjiào fùzá。
This form of superstition has existed for ages and is deeply rooted, so it\'s not so easy to bring about reform.
迷信权威
míxìn quánwēi 
have blind faith in authority
破除迷信
pòchú míxìn
do away with superstitions or blind faith; topple old idols
乌鸦报丧是一种迷信的说法。
Wūyā bàosàng shì yìzhǒng míxìn de shuōfǎ。
It is superstition that crows can predict death.
这位皇帝非常迷信谶纬之言。
Zhèwèi huángdì fēicháng míxìn chènwěi zhī yán。
The emperor blindly worshipped divination by augury and mystical intepretation of Confucianist texts.
你还相信打鬼这样的迷信啊？
Nǐ hái xiāngxìn dǎguǐ zhèyàng de míxìn a？
You don\'t believe in the exorcism of demons, do you?
这些迷信活动，必须荡除。
Zhèxiē míxìn huódòng，bìxū dàngchú。
These superstitious activities must be eliminated.
就业和升学的压力在一定程度上成了年轻人迷信星座占卜的风源。
Jiùyè hé shēngxué de yālì zài yídìng chéngdù shàng chéng le niánqīngrén míxìn xīngzuò zhānbǔ de fēngyuán。
In a certain sense, the pressures of work and study have caused the prevalence of astrology among young people.
迷信大部分都是弄一些烟火惑人耳目。
Míxìn dàbùfen dōushì nòng yìxiē yānhuǒ huòrén ěrmù。
Most superstitions make use of smoke-screens to fool people.
叫魂怎么能治孩子的病！？这根本就是封建迷信。
Jiàohún zěnme néng zhì háizi de bìng！？Zhè gēnběn jiùshì fēngjiàn míxìn。
How can one cure the sick by calling back his spirit? It\'s sheer feudalistic superstition.
传说老鸹是种不吉利的鸟，其实那只是大家的一种迷信。
Chuánshuō lǎoguā shì zhǒng bùjílì de niǎo，qíshí nà zhǐshì dàjiā de yìzhǒng míxìn。
It is a superstitious tradition that corvine is inauspicious.
他很迷信，每逢有大事情发生，他都会先去问卦。
Tā hěn míxìn，měiféng yǒu　dàshìqing fāshēng，tā dōuhuì xiānqù wènguà。
He is very supersititious, and goes to pray to the gods whenever something big happens.
迷信的说法认为看见喜鹊是祥瑞的征兆。
Míxìn de shuōfǎ rènwéi kànjiàn xǐquè shì xiángruì de zhēngzhào。
Superstitious people believe that the sight of magpie is a good omen.
我从不迷信，但这件事说起来还真够邪乎的。
Wǒ cóngbùmíxìn，dàn zhèjiànshì shuōqǐlái hái zhēn gòu xiéhū de。
I am not a superstitious person, but this thing sounds really weird.
对封建迷信可不能盲目信从。
Duì fēngjiàn míxìn kě bùnéng mángmù xìncóng。
We shouldn\'t blindly believe in superstition.
小王是个迷信的人，他一直相信世界有幽魂。
Xiǎo Wáng shì gè míxìn de rén，tā yìzhí xiāngxìn shìjiè yǒu yōuhún。
Xiaowang is a susperstitious person and believes that there are ghosts.
从迷信的说法看，这是冤孽作祟。
Cóng míxìn de shuōfǎ kàn，zhèshì yuānniè zuòsuì。
According to superstitious belief, this is because of retribution for bad deeds.
配阴婚完全是封建迷信思想在作俑。
Pèi yīnhūn wánquán shì fēngjiàn míxìn sīxiǎng zài zuòyǒng。
Marriage between deceased people was created according to a superstitious feudal idea.
有人向他灌输迷信思想。
Yǒurén xiàng tā guànshū míxìnsīxiǎng。
Someone indoctrinated him with superstitious beliefs.
他迷信鬼神。
Tā míxìn guǐshén.
He has a superstitious belief in ghosts and spirits.
迷信可能会让人丧失理智。
Míxìn kěnéng huì ràng rén sàngshī lǐzhì.
Superstition may cause people to behave irrationally.

迷信起源于恐惧和无知。

这件事情从一开始就把我引入了迷误之中。
Zhèjiàn shìqing cóng yìkāishǐ jiù bǎ wǒ yǐnrù le míwù zhī zhōng。
I took the wrong path from the very beginning of this matter.
这个错误的公式，不知道迷误了多少数学家。

Numerous mathematicians have been puzzled and misled by the wrong formula.

wùrù mítú
go astray

He was obsessed by lust for money, so he made a mistake.

They lost their bearings in the forest and couldn\'t find their way out.
迷失方向
míshī fānɡxiànɡ 
lose one\'s bearings; get lost
我们迷失了路途，所以就向一位老丈询问一了下。
Wǒmen míshī le lùtú，suǒyǐ jiù xiàng yíwèi lǎozhàng xúnwèn yí lexià。
We lost our way, so we inquired with an old man on the road.
自我标榜的人往往会在别人的奉承中迷失自我。
Zìwǒ biāobǎng de rén wǎngwǎng huì zài biérén de fèngchéng zhōng míshī zìwǒ。
People who sing their own praises always lose themselves in others\' praise.
他们在森林里迷失了方向。
Tāmen zài sēnlín lǐ míshīle fāngxiàng。
They got disoriented in the wood.
迷失方向
míshī fāngxiàng
lose one\'s bearings

迷途失群
mítú shīqún
be lost and left behind

Tā gǎndào wúbǐ mímáng，jìntuì shījù。

迷失方向。
I\'m glad to get back to civilization after being lost for three weeks in the mountains.
在山中迷失了三个星期后，我很高兴又重返文明世界。
We were city mongrels，gathered from the streets，feeling helplessly lost.
Wǒmen shì chéngshì lǐ de zázhǒnggǒu，cóng gè gè jiēdào lǐ fēngyōng\'érlái，gǎndào míshī ér wúzhù。
我们是城市里的杂种狗，从各个街道里蜂拥而来，感到迷失而无助。
She lured Michael into becoming a lost boy.
Tā yǐnyòu Màikè\'ěr biànchéng yí gè míshī de nánhái。

His disorientation was the result of inattention.

他的迷失方向是粗心的结果。

主队输掉了比赛，令球迷们大失所望。
Confusion caused his unfortunate misstep.
Míhuò zàochéng tā búxìng de shīzú。
迷惑造成他不幸的失足。
Unemployment dulls society\'s spirit.
Shīyè shǐ shèhuì jīngshen céngmiàn dīmí。
失业使社会精神层面低迷。
小伙子们迷上了霹雳舞。
Xiǎohuǒzimen míshàng le pīlìwǔ。
The youngsters became crazy about break dance.
自从看了武侠小说，他就迷上了八卦拳。
Zìcóng kàn le wǔxiá xiǎoshuō，tā jiù míshàng le bāguàquán。
He has been crazy about Ba Gua Quan ever since he read stories about swordsmen.
为了防止沙子迷眼，我戴上了一副墨镜。
Wèile fángzhǐ shāzi míyǎn，wǒ dàishàng le yífù mòjìng。
In order to prevent sand getting in my eyes, I wear a pair of sun-glasses.
我刚合上眼就迷迷糊糊地睡着了。

I dozed off as soon as I closed my eyes.

陷入混乱/迷惑
The confusion caused by the dismal economy led to protests.
经济低迷引起的混乱导致了多起抗议。
如果不是他指引的话，我们就迷路了。
Rúguǒ búshì tā zhǐyǐn de huà，wǒmen jiù mílù le。
If it weren\'t for him, we would have gone astray.
这一带山路岔道儿很多，容易迷路。
Zhèyídài shānlù chàdàor hěnduō，róngyì mílù。
There are many crossroads in this mountain, so people may get lost easily.
这里丛山环绕，很容易迷路。
Zhèlǐ cóngshān huánrào，hěnróngyì mílù。
This group of mountains surround each other so that it is quite easy to get lost here.
她迷路了，只好在街口停了下来。
Tā mílù le，zhǐhǎo zài jiēkǒu tíng le xiàlái。
She got lost and stopped at the end of the street.
我迷路了，正好遇到一个放牛的牛郎，给我指了路。
Wǒ mílù le，zhènghǎo yùdào yígè fàngniú de niúláng，gěi wǒ zhǐ le lù。
I was lost, when a cowherd appeared and showed me the road.
郊外阡陌纵横，我第一次去春游时几乎迷路。
Jiāowài qiānmò zònghéng，wǒ dìyīcì qù chūnyóu shí jīhū mílù。
With paths crisscrossing in the suburbs, I almost lost my way the first time I went for a spring outing.
玄武门在哪里啊，我迷路了。
Xuánwǔmén zài nǎlǐ a，wǒ mílù le。
Where is the Xuanwu gate? I\'m lost.
山上烟霞迷蒙，明早我们一起去，以防迷路了。
Shānshàng yānxiá míméng，míngzǎo wǒmen yìqǐ qù，yǐfáng mílù le。
The mountain is covered by mist and clouds. We have to start early tomorrow so as not to lose our way.
多亏你告诉我们，不然我们就迷路了。
Duōkuī nǐ gàosù wǒmen，bùrán wǒmen jiù mílùle。
It\'s lucky that you told us or we would have got lost.
迷路
mílù
lose one\'s way
天太黑，我迷了路。
Tiān tài hēi，wǒ mí le lù。
I lost my way because it was too dark.
我们迷失了路途，所以就向一位老丈询问一了下。
Wǒmen míshī le lùtú，suǒyǐ jiù xiàng yíwèi lǎozhàng xúnwèn yí lexià。
We lost our way, so we inquired with an old man on the road.
他们在森林里迷失了方向，找不到出路。
Tāmen zài sēnlín lǐ míshī le fāng xiàng，zhǎo bu dào chūlù。
They lost their bearings in the forest and couldn\'t find their way out.
再往前走可能迷路，赶紧退回。
迷了路
If you get lost, I will meet you in 2 hours at the monkey house at the zoo.
万一你迷路了，两小时后到动物园的猴馆吧，我在那儿等你。
We lost our way and got to rest two hours later.
我们迷路了，所以两个小时后才停下来休息。
I think I\'m lost, all I can see in front of me is a brick wall.
我想我迷路了，在我面前只有一堵砖墙。
She is afraid of getting lost in the forest.
她担心在森林里迷路。
It\'s easy to get lost in this part of town.
在镇子的这边容易迷路。
to be lost
迷路
to get lost
迷路
to lose one\'s way
迷路
The girl, who got lost in the dark forest, walked towards the source of the light, hoping to find someone there.
在黑暗的森林中迷路的女孩向着光的源头走，希望能在那找到人。
I will have to help the lost boy find his parents.
我会帮助迷路的男孩找到他的父母。
The house was an ordeal for visiting children, who were always getting lost.
Zhè suǒ fángzi duìyú lái cānguān de jīngcháng mílù de háizǐmen láishuō shì yí cì yánjùn de kǎoyàn。
这所房子对于来参观的经常迷路的孩子们来说是一次严峻的考验。
Aaron wandered lost around the old city getting drenched in the rain.
Yàlún zài lǎo chéng guàng mílùle，bèi yì chǎng yǔ lín de shītòu。
亚伦在老城逛迷路了，被一场雨淋得湿透。
The team was lost in an African jungle.
Duìwu zài fēizhōu cónglín zhōng mílù le。
队伍在非洲丛林中迷路了。
If you wander from the foot trail, use your compass it\'s easy to get lost.
Rúguǒ nǐ cóng xiǎolù líkāi，yídìng yào shǐyòng zhǐnánzhēn，nà\'er hěn róngyì mílù。
如果你从小路离开，一定要使用指南针，那儿很容易迷路。
Going by past experience there was a high probability that the visitors were lost.
Yīzhào yǐwǎng de jīngyàn，nàxiē yóukè mílù de kěnéngxìng hěn gāo。
依照以往的经验，那些游客迷路的可能性很高。
They were clearly lost.
Tāmen míngxiǎn shì mílù le。
他们明显是迷路了。
We were pretty much lost when we met the forest ranger.
Zài yùdào hùlínyuán de shíhou wǒmen jīhū kuàiyào mílù le。
在遇到护林员的时候我们几乎快要迷路了。
I looked lost in the room of unfamilar faces.
Zài yì wūzi mòshēngrén gēnqián，wǒ xiàngshì mí le lù。
在一屋子陌生人跟前，我像是迷了路。
睡眼迷离
shuìyǎn mílí 
eyes dim with sleep
海市蜃楼，惝迷离。
海市蜃楼，惝恍迷离
迷离恍惚。
Her fans have stayed very loyal in the past, but this scandal could really cook her goose.
过去她的歌迷总是对她不离不弃，但是这个丑闻一下子就会把她打到十八层地狱。
If you wander from the foot trail, use your compass it\'s easy to get lost.
Rúguǒ nǐ cóng xiǎolù líkāi，yídìng yào shǐyòng zhǐnánzhēn，nà\'er hěn róngyì mílù。
如果你从小路离开，一定要使用指南针，那儿很容易迷路。
The musical sound as the bomb left the barrel of the mortar still fascinated me.
Dāng pàodàn líkāi pǎijīpào pào guǎn de shíhou fāchū de yuè\'ěr de shēngxiǎng réngrán ràng wǒ zháomí。
当炮弹离开迫击炮炮管的时候发出的悦耳的声响仍然让我着迷。
我刚合上眼就迷迷糊糊地睡着了。
Wǒ gānghéshàngyǎn jiù mímihūhū de shuìzháo le。
I dozed off as soon as I closed my eyes.
睡得迷迷怔怔的
shuì de mímizhēngzhēng de。
be dazed with sleep
他色迷迷地看着她。
Tā sèmími de kàn zhe tā。
He looked at her, his eyes becoming hazy with lust.
请不要再迷恋金迷纸醉的生活了。
Qǐng búyào zài míliàn jīnmí zhǐzuì de shēnghuó le。
Do not cling to a life of luxury and dissipation.
他总是用色迷迷的眼神看身边走过的漂亮女孩。
Tā zǒngshì yòng sèmīmī de yǎnshén kàn shēnbiān zǒuguo de piàolǐang nǚhái。
He always stares lasciviously at beautiful girls passing by.
山上烟霞迷蒙，明早我们一起去，以防迷路了。
Shānshàng yānxiá míméng，míngzǎo wǒmen yìqǐ qù，yǐfáng mílù le。
The mountain is covered by mist and clouds. We have to start early tomorrow so as not to lose our way.
他是个老财迷。
Tā shì gè lǎo cáimí。
He\'s an old miser.
球迷们疯狂地争斗起来，看台倒坍，酿成惨祸。
Qiúmímen fēngkuáng de zhēngdòu qǐlái，kàntái dǎotān，niàngchéngcǎnhuò。
When the football fans got into a frenzied fight, the spectators\' stand collapsed and a horrible disaster occurred.
他们在森林里迷失了方向，找不到出路。
Tāmen zài sēnlín lǐ míshī le fāng xiàng，zhǎo bu dào chūlù。
They lost their bearings in the forest and couldn\'t find their way out.
处于昏迷状态
chǔyú hūnmí zhuàngtài 
be in a coma
农村迷信活动有所回潮。
Nóngcūn míxìn huódòngyǒu suǒ huícháo。
There is a revival of superstitious practices in the countryside.
她昏迷过去了。
Tā hūnmí guòqù le。
She went into a coma.
昏迷不醒
hūnmí bùxǐnɡ 
remain unconscious
这种迷信的风俗存在了很长的时间，积弊很深，改革起来比较复杂。
Zhèzhǒng míxìn de fēngsú cúnzài le hěncháng de shíjiān，jībì hěnshēn，gǎigé qǐlái bǐjiào fùzá。
This form of superstition has existed for ages and is deeply rooted, so it\'s not so easy to bring about reform.
不要被假象所迷惑。
Bùyào bèi jiǎxiàng suǒ míhuò。
Don\'t be misled by appearances.
昨天晚上闹事的足球迷给拘起来了。
Zuótiān wǎnshangnàoshì de zúqiúmí gěi jū qǐlái le。
The football fans who made trouble last night were detained.
迷了方向
mí le fāngxiàng 
lose one\'s bearings; get lost
小伙子们迷上了霹雳舞。
Xiǎohuǒzimen míshàng le pīlìwǔ。
The youngsters became crazy about break dance.
景色迷人。
Jǐngsè mírén。
The scenery is of enchanting beauty.
他让金钱迷住了心窍。
Tā ràng jīnqián mízhù le xīnqiào。
He was obssessed by lust for money.
足球迷
zúqiúmí 
a soccer fan (or enthusiast)
这么多花布我都看迷糊了。
Zhème duō huābùwǒ dōu kàn míhu le。
I was simply dazzled by all these cotton prints.
睡迷糊了
shuì míhu le
be dazed with sleep
喝酒喝迷糊了
hē jiǔ hē míhu le
get tipsy
把人给弄迷糊了
bǎ rén gěi nòngmíhu le
make one feel muddled
他这个人有点迷糊。
Tā zhège rén yǒu diǎn míhu。
He\'s somewhat muddleheaded.
这草木不生的世界被笼罩在迷幻的雾里。
Zhè cǎomùbùshēng de shìjiè bèi lǒngzhào zài míhuàn de wù lǐ。
The barren place was cloaked in mysterious fog.
摆迷魂阵
bǎi míhúnzhèn 
lay out a scheme to bewitch sb.; set a trap
感到迷惑不解
gǎndào míhuòbùjiě 
feel puzzled; feel perplexed
指破迷津
zhǐpò míjīn 
point out where sb. has gone astray

shuìyǎn mílí 
eyes dim with sleep

Tiān tài hēi，wǒ mí le lù。
I lost my way because it was too dark.
烟雾迷漫
yānwù mímàn 
be enveloped in mist; be covered in thick mist
大雪纷飞，原野一片迷茫。
Dàxuě fēnfēi，yuányě yípiàn mímáng。
The vast plain was obscured by the falling flakes of snow.
迷失方向
míshī fānɡxiànɡ 
lose one\'s bearings; get lost
走入迷途
zǒurù mítú 
go astray
迷惘的神色
míwǎng de shénsè 
a perplexed look
迷信权威
míxìn quánwēi 
have blind faith in authority
最近二至三年内，中国的房地产业发展将进入走出低迷后的盘整期。
Zuìjìn èr zhì sān nián nèi，Zhōngguó de fángdìchǎnyè fāzhǎn jiāngjìnrù zǒuchū dīmí hòu de pánzhěngqī。
In the next two or three years, China\'s real estate sector will be recovering from a low period.
破除迷信
pòchú míxìn
do away with superstitions or blind faith; topple old idols
云迷世界，雾罩乾坤。
Yún mí shìjiè, wù zhào qiánkūn。
Clouds over the world; Mist shrouds the cosmos.
他昏迷过去，人事不知。
Tā hūnmí guòqù，rénshì bùzhī。
He fainted and lost consciousness.

If it weren\'t for him, we would have gone astray.

Tāmen de jīngcǎi biǎoyǎn shǐ guānzhòng kàn de rù le mí。
The audience was fascinated by their superb performance.
看书看入迷了
kànshū kàn rù mí le
be engrossed in a book
大家听他讲故事，都听得入迷了。
Dàjiā tīng tā jiǎng gùshì，dōu tīng de rùmí le。
Everybody listened to his story with rapt attention.
球迷们纷纷拥入赛场。
Qiúmímen fēnfēn yōngrù sàichǎng。
The fans crowded into the competition venue.
神志昏迷
shénzhì hūnmí
have lost consciousness; be in a state of delirium
迷途失群
mítú shīqún
be lost and left behind
他昏迷了一个多小时才苏醒过来。
Tā hūnmí le yígè duō xiǎoshí cái sūxǐng guòlái。
He remained unconscious for more than an hour before he came to.
被表面现象所迷惑
bèi biǎomiàn xiànxiàng suǒ míhuò

不为表面现象所迷惑
bùwéi biǎomiàn xiànxiàng suǒ míhuò

权迷心窍
quán mí xīnqiào
be obsessed by a lust for power
他昏迷了三天，刚刚醒过来。
Tā hūnmí le sān tiān，gānggāngxǐngguòlái。
He was unconscious for three days and has just come to.
为一时的表面现象所迷惑
wéi yìshí de biǎomiàn xiàn xiàng suǒ míhuò 
be misled by transient phenomena; be taken in by appearances

Háizimen tīnggùshì dōu tīng de zháo le mí。
The children were spellbound by the story.

Tā duì yīnyuè zháo le mí。
He\'s crazy about music.

迷茫
mímáng
vast and hazy
自从看了武侠小说，他就迷上了八卦拳。

He has been crazy about Ba Gua Quan ever since he read stories about swordsmen.

他打起麻将来不管不顾，很是入迷。

He is rash in playing mahjong, and is totally obsessed with it.

His three-day coma worried his family.
这一带山路岔道儿很多，容易迷路。
Zhèyídài shānlù chàdàor hěnduō，róngyì mílù。
There are many crossroads in this mountain, so people may get lost easily.
外面尘雾迷天，最好戴上口罩。
Wàimiàn chénwù mítiān，zuìhǎo dàishàng kǒuzhào。
The smog is so thick that you\'d better wear a respirator.
这位皇帝非常迷信谶纬之言。
Zhèwèi huángdì fēicháng míxìn chènwěi zhī yán。
The emperor blindly worshipped divination by augury and mystical intepretation of Confucianist texts.
他对于京剧艺术的迷恋已经到了痴狂的程度了。
Tā duìyú jīngjù yìshù de míliàn yǐjing dào le chīkuáng de chéngdù le。
He is crazy about Beijing Opera.
爸爸喜爱诗歌词赋，在他的熏陶下，我也对此十分地着迷。

Father was fond of poetry. Because of his influence, I am fascinated in it too.
这里丛山环绕，很容易迷路。
Zhèlǐ cóngshān huánrào，hěnróngyì mílù。
This group of mountains surround each other so that it is quite easy to get lost here.
你还相信打鬼这样的迷信啊？
Nǐ hái xiāngxìn dǎguǐ zhèyàng de míxìn a？
You don\'t believe in the exorcism of demons, do you?
世界上的很多事情都存在着“当局者迷，旁观者清”的情况。
Shìjiè shàng de hěnduō shìqing dōu cúnzài zhe “dāngjúzhě mí，pángguānzhě qīng”de qíngkuàng。
The onlooker sees the best; the outsider sees most of the game --- this is a general rule in many situations.
这些迷信活动，必须荡除。
Zhèxiē míxìn huódòng，bìxū dàngchú。
These superstitious activities must be eliminated.
影片在高潮处突然定格，使观众迷惑不解。
Yǐngpiàn zài gāocháo chù tūrán dìnggé，shǐ guānzhòng míhuòbùjiě。
A freeze shot appeared at the climax, which puzzled the audience.
自从见到她的那天起，我就被她的端雅迷住了。
Zìcóng jiàn dào tā de nàtiān qǐ，wǒ jiù bèi tā de duānyǎ mízhù le。
I was struck by her refined manner the very first day I met her.
小明忽然成了兵器迷，尤其对反弹道导弹很有兴趣。
Xiǎo Míng hūrán chéng le bīngqì mí，yóuqí duì fǎndàndào dǎodàn hěn yǒu xìngqù。
Xiao Ming is suddenly obsessed with weapons, he is especially interested in anti-ballistic missiles.
就业和升学的压力在一定程度上成了年轻人迷信星座占卜的风源。
Jiùyè hé shēngxué de yālì zài yídìng chéngdù shàng chéng le niánqīngrén míxìn xīngzuò zhānbǔ de fēngyuán。
In a certain sense, the pressures of work and study have caused the prevalence of astrology among young people.
他因为肝昏迷被送进了抢救室。
Tā yīnwèi gānhūnmí bèi sòngjìn le qiǎngjiùshì。
He has been sent to the first-aid centre because of hepatic coma.
歌迷们在台下高呼着这位歌手的名字。
Gēmímen zài tái xià gāohū zhe zhèwèi gēshǒu de míngzi。
Fans shouted the singer\'s name loudly under the stage.
病人已经昏迷两天了，医生嘱咐家属给他灌服流食。
Bìngrén yǐjing hūnmí liǎngtiān le，yīshēng zhǔfù jiāshǔ gěi tā guànfú liúshí。
The patient has been in a coma for two day, the doctor has recommended his relatives give him liquid food.
迷信大部分都是弄一些烟火惑人耳目。
Míxìn dàbùfen dōushì nòng yìxiē yānhuǒ huòrén ěrmù。
Most superstitions make use of smoke-screens to fool people.
他一手打着简板，一边唱着曲，观众都听得很入迷。
Tā yì shǒu dǎ zhe jiǎnbǎn，yìbiān chàng zhe qǔ，guānzhòng dōu tīng de hěnrùmí。
The audience were spell-bound by his playing of percussion instruments accompanied with his singing.
叫魂怎么能治孩子的病！？这根本就是封建迷信。
Jiàohún zěnme néng zhì háizi de bìng！？Zhè gēnběn jiùshì fēngjiàn míxìn。
How can one cure the sick by calling back his spirit? It\'s sheer feudalistic superstition.
她迷路了，只好在街口停了下来。

She got lost and stopped at the end of the street.
小明对于画卡通画可着迷了。
Xiǎo Míng duìyú huà kǎtōnghuà kě zháomí le。
Xiaoming is fascinated with cartoons.
传说老鸹是种不吉利的鸟，其实那只是大家的一种迷信。
Chuánshuō lǎoguā shì zhǒng bùjílì de niǎo，qíshí nà zhǐshì dàjiā de yìzhǒng míxìn。
It is a superstitious tradition that corvine is inauspicious.
我们迷失了路途，所以就向一位老丈询问一了下。
Wǒmen míshī le lùtú，suǒyǐ jiù xiàng yíwèi lǎozhàng xúnwèn yí lexià。
We lost our way, so we inquired with an old man on the road.
垒垒的山峦，云雾弥漫，这风景真是迷人。
Lěilěi de shānluán，yúnwù mímàn，zhè fēngjǐng zhēnshì mírén。
Range upon range of mountains are surrounded by pervading clouds. How beautiful the scene is.
小时候，广播里最让我着迷的栏目就是评书连播。
Xiǎoshíhou，guǎngbō lǐ zuì ràng wǒ zháomí de lánmù jiùshì píngshū liánbō。
When I was young, the program that attracted me most was the sequential broadcasting of storytelling.
她有靓丽的外表和动人的歌喉，赢得了无数歌迷的爱戴。
Tā yǒu liànglì de wàibiǎo hé dòngrén de gēhóu，yíngdé le wúshù gēmí de àidài。
With a beautiful appearance, and appealing singing voice, she has won love and esteem from thousands of fans.
站在岸边，海水弥望，这景色真是迷人。
Zhànzài ànbiān，hǎishuǐ míwàng，zhè jǐngsè zhēnshì mírén。
Standing beside the shore, one sees the fabulous scenery of the sea covering the horizon.
星星在迷蒙的天空中闪烁着。
Xīngxīng zài míméng de tiānkōng zhōng shǎnshuò zhe。
Stars are shining in the hazy sky.
这件事情从一开始就把我引入了迷误之中。
Zhèjiàn shìqing cóng yìkāishǐ jiù bǎ wǒ yǐnrù le míwù zhī zhōng。
I took the wrong path from the very beginning of this matter.
这个错误的公式，不知道迷误了多少数学家。
Zhège cuòwù de gōngshì，bùzhīdào míwù le duōshǎo shùxuéjiā。
Numerous mathematicians have been puzzled and misled by the wrong formula.
她看到那位影星出现在面前，顿时感到一阵迷眩。
Tā kàndào nà wèi yǐngxīng chūxiàn zài miànqián，dùnshí gǎndào yízhèn míxuàn。
Seeing the star appear in front of her, she suddenly felt a fit of dizziness.
为了防止沙子迷眼，我戴上了一副墨镜。
Wèile fángzhǐ shāzi míyǎn，wǒ dàishàng le yífù mòjìng。
In order to prevent sand getting in my eyes, I wear a pair of sun-glasses.
春天的江南乱花迷眼。
Chūntiān de jiāngnán luànhuā míyǎn。
In Spring, in areas south of the lower reaches of the Yangtze River, there are numerous flowers which are beautiful and enchanting.
他被金钱所迷眼，所以才会犯这样的错误。
Tā bèi jīnqián suǒ míyǎn，suǒyǐ cáihuì fàn zhèyàng de cuòwù。
He was obsessed by lust for money, so he made a mistake.
他已经迷醉于京剧艺术多年了。
Tā yǐjing mízuìyú jīngjù yìshù duōnián le。
He has been fascinated by the art of Beijing opera for years.
这个孩子中了魔障了，不好好学习，天天为电子游戏而着迷！
Zhège háizi zhòng le mózhàng le，bùhǎohǎo xuéxí，tiāntiān wèi diànzǐ yóuxì ér zháomí！
The child is addicted to electronic games, and plays games rather than studying hard every day.
他虽然是个球迷，但他从来不看中国男足的比赛。
Tā suīrán shì gè qiúmí，dàn tā cónglái búkàn Zhōngguó nánzú de bǐsài。
Though he is a football fan, he never watches the matches of Chinese Men’s National Football Team.
我迷路了，正好遇到一个放牛的牛郎，给我指了路。
Wǒ mílù le，zhènghǎo yùdào yígè fàngniú de niúláng，gěi wǒ zhǐ le lù。
I was lost, when a cowherd appeared and showed me the road.
爷爷是戏迷，受爷爷影响小明也从小就爱上了皮黄。
Yéye shì xìmí，shòu yéye yǐngxiǎng Xiǎo Míng yě cóng xiǎo jiù ài shàng le píhuáng。
The grandpa is a theatre fan. Under his influence, Xiao Ming fell in love with Beijing opera when he was a child.
从窗户望出去，雨中的山、树一片凄迷。
Cóng chuānghu wàng chūqù，yǔ zhōng de shān、shù yípiàn qīmí。
Looking out of the window, the mountain and trees are desolate and hazy in the rain.
看着他凄迷的眼神，我不知如何是好。
Kàn zhe tā qīmí de yǎnshén，wǒ bùzhī rúhé shì hǎo。
Looking at the sorrowful expression in his eyes, I have no idea what to do.
郊外阡陌纵横，我第一次去春游时几乎迷路。
Jiāowài qiānmò zònghéng，wǒ dìyīcì qù chūnyóu shí jīhū mílù。
With paths crisscrossing in the suburbs, I almost lost my way the first time I went for a spring outing.
她长得俏美，是个“万人迷”。
Tā zhǎng de qiàoměi，shì gè“wànrénmí”。
She is a really pretty girl, loved by millions of people.
他整天琢磨女人，真是一个色迷。
Tā zhěng tiān zuómo nǚrén，zhēnshi yígè sèmí。
He is thinking of women all day. What a lecher.
她是一位深受歌迷喜爱的歌手。
Tā shì yíwèi shēnshòu gēmí xǐ\'ài de gēshǒu。
She is a singer extremely popular with the fans.
他感到无比迷茫，进退失据。
Tā gǎndào wúbǐ mímáng，jìntuì shījù。
He felt mixed-up and in a hopeless position.
足球世界杯四年举办一次，是全世界球迷的共同节日。
Zúqiú shìjièbēi sì nián jǔbàn yícì，shì quánshìjiè qiúmí de gòngtóng jiérì。
A common festival for all football fans all over the world, the Football World Cup, is held once every four years.
你现在收手还为时不晚，如果执迷不悟就会酿成大祸。
Nǐ xiànzài shōushǒu hái wéishí bùwǎn，rúguǒ zhímí búwù jiùhuì niàngchéng dàhuò。
It\'s still not too late if you stop now, there will be serious consequences if you keep to your errors.
他真是个书迷，一天到晚就知道买书看书！
Tā zhēnshì gè shūmí，yì tiān dào wǎn jiù zhīdào mǎishū kànshū！
He is really a bookworm, just buying and reading books all day long!
他每天都要听评书，都快成书迷啦。
Tā měitiān dōuyào tīng píngshū，dōu kuài chéng shūmí la。
He listens to the storytelling program every day, and has almost become an addict to it.
由于沉迷于网络游戏，他养成了晚睡晚起的顽习。
Yóuyú chénmí yú wǎngluò yóuxì，tā yǎngchéng le wǎnshuì wǎnqǐ de wánxí。
Indulging in on-line games, he got into the inveterate habit of sleeping late at night and getting up late in the morning.
他很迷信，每逢有大事情发生，他都会先去问卦。
Tā hěn míxìn，měiféng yǒu　dàshìqing fāshēng，tā dōuhuì xiānqù wènguà。
He is very supersititious, and goes to pray to the gods whenever something big happens.
他天天去舞厅，是个不折不扣的舞迷。
Tā tiāntiān qù wǔtīng，shì gè bùshébúkòu de wǔmí。
He went to the ballroom every day and is a real dance fan.
虽然双方球迷都喊破了嗓子，但下半时双方仍踢成1：1。
Suīrán shuāngfāng qiúmí dōu hǎnpò le sǎngzǐ，dàn xiàbànshí shuāngfāng réng tīchéng yībǐyī。
Though fans of both sides shouted at the top of their lungs.  The two teams tied the game with the result of 1 to 1 in the second half of the game.
皇家马德里队下塌的希尔顿饭店被球迷围得水泄不通。
Huángjiā mǎdélǐduì xiàtà de xīěrdùn fàndiàn bèi qiúmí wéi de shuǐxiè bùtōng。
The Hillton Hotel where the Madrid team stayed was surrounded by football fans.
布兰妮鲜甜悦耳的歌声让歌迷们为她疯狂。
Bùlánnī xiāntián yuè\'ěr de gēshēng ràng gēmímen wèi tā fēngkuáng。
Britney Spears makes her fans crazy for her with her sweet songs.
表姐拿着勺子闲雅地搅着咖啡的样子很迷人。
Biǎojiě názhe sháozi xiányǎ de jiǎozhe kāfēi de yàngzi hěn mírén。
The way my cousin holds her spoon to mix her coffee is very charming.
迷信的说法认为看见喜鹊是祥瑞的征兆。
Míxìn de shuōfǎ rènwéi kànjiàn xǐquè shì xiángruì de zhēngzhào。
Superstitious people believe that the sight of magpie is a good omen.
我从不迷信，但这件事说起来还真够邪乎的。
Wǒ cóngbùmíxìn，dàn zhèjiànshì shuōqǐlái hái zhēn gòu xiéhū de。
I am not a superstitious person, but this thing sounds really weird.
对封建迷信可不能盲目信从。
Duì fēngjiàn míxìn kě bùnéng mángmù xìncóng。
We shouldn\'t blindly believe in superstition.
玄武门在哪里啊，我迷路了。
Xuánwǔmén zài nǎlǐ a，wǒ mílù le。
Where is the Xuanwu gate? I\'m lost.
托福考试的错选项很多都是迷惑你的。
Tuōfú kǎoshì de cuòxuǎn xiàng hěnduō dōushì míhuò nǐ de。

小王是个迷信的人，他一直相信世界有幽魂。
Xiǎo Wáng shì gè míxìn de rén，tā yìzhí xiāngxìn shìjiè yǒu yōuhún。
Xiaowang is a susperstitious person and believes that there are ghosts.
从迷信的说法看，这是冤孽作祟。
Cóng míxìn de shuōfǎ kàn，zhèshì yuānniè zuòsuì。
According to superstitious belief, this is because of retribution for bad deeds.
来北京为四川队助阵的都是成都的铁杆球迷。
Lái Běijīng wèi Sìchuānduì zhùzhèn de dōushì Chéngdōu de tiěgǎn qiúmí。
All the diehard fans who came to Beijing to cheer for the Sichuan Team are from Chengdu.
自我标榜的人往往会在别人的奉承中迷失自我。
Zìwǒ biāobǎng de rén wǎngwǎng huì zài biérén de fèngchéng zhōng míshī zìwǒ。
People who sing their own praises always lose themselves in others\' praise.
配阴婚完全是封建迷信思想在作俑。

我有很多非洲朋友，他们的活力让我为之着迷。

首先，我要感谢所有歌迷对我的支持。

据2006年中国计算机大会的一项研究显示，18岁以下网民中有13%的人过度沉迷于网络。
I\'m not a sports\' fan.
我不是体育迷。

一些动物看见镜子里自己的影像时很迷惑。
He is such a movie nut.
他是一个狂热的电影迷。

功进决胜一球后，球迷涌进球场庆祝。

这位电影明星经常关注她的影迷。

今年，72000名歌迷将欣赏到重金属乐队的精选曲目。

意大利队进了一个球后，德国球迷鸦雀无声。

她稍微年轻点儿时，总是沉溺于迷幻药带来的快感中。

主队输掉了比赛，令球迷们大失所望。

万一你迷路了，两小时后到动物园的猴馆吧，我在那儿等你。

在过去，这名歌手总是能吸引本城的大批歌迷。

我们迷路了，所以两个小时后才停下来休息。

俄罗斯是个迷人的国家，我非常喜欢那里。

坦率地说，我认为你的想法会把你引入迷途。

我想我迷路了，在我面前只有一堵砖墙。

她担心在森林里迷路。

他们国家的经济低迷，与美国的关系冷淡。

他们小时候没跳过舞，但教师培训后，他们都迷上了跳舞。

是个软件更新迷，因为及时更新各种元部件会更加方便使用。
to have a blackout
[医] 暂时性昏迷
it takes your breath away
使人心醉神迷
I\'ve got {or} been bitten by the travel bug
[inf] 我迷上了旅游
to be in a coma
处于昏迷状态
it\'s compulsive reading/viewing
这是本/部令人着迷的书/片子
to be crazy about sth/doing sth
对某事/做某事着迷
It\'s easy to get lost in this part of town.
在镇子的这边容易迷路。
They are Celtic fans, and attend all home games.
他们是凯特人队的球迷，观看所有的主场比赛。
miniskirts are in again this year
迷你裙今年又流行了
to be lost
迷路
to get lost
迷路
to be mad about {or} on sb
[inf] 迷恋某人
to be nuts about sth/sb

to be obsessive about sth
对某物着迷
to sink into depression/a coma
陷入消沉/昏迷
to cast a spell on sb
[witch+] 用咒语迷惑某人
to be/fall under sb\'s spell
被某人迷住
to be thrown into turmoil/confusion
陷入混乱/迷惑
to be in/go into a trance
在/陷入迷睡状态
to lose one\'s way
迷路

在黑暗的森林中迷路的女孩向着光的源头走，希望能在那找到人。

迷信起源于恐惧和无知。

经济低迷引起的混乱导致了多起抗议。

他的公司会受到员工低迷的士气的困扰。

Qiúmí jǐjìn tǐyùchǎng。

Zhège quánjīshǒu hūnmí le。

Zhège mí shì kěyǐ jiěkāi de。

Tā shì rúhé xièlòu chūqù de yīrán shì yí gè mí。

完好无缺
wánhǎowúquē 
intact; undamaged
完美无缺的人只存在于人们的想像之中。
Wánměiwúquē de rén zhǐ cúnzài yú rénmen de xiǎng xiàng zhī zhōng。
A flawless person exists only in imagination.
隋唐两代王朝统一了天下，真是金瓯无缺。
Suí Táng liǎngdài wángcháo tǒngyī le tiānxià，zhēnshì jīnōu wúquē。
The Sui and Tang Dynasties united China and achieved national integration.
世界上没有完美无缺的人，每个人都会有各种缺陷和不足。
Shìjièshàng méiyǒu wánměiwúquē de rén，měi gè rén dōuhuì yǒu gèzhǒng quēxiàn hé búzú。
There is no perfect person in the world, everyone has their own shortcomings.
不得无故缺席。
Bùdé wúgù quēxí。
Nobody may be absent without reason.
互通有无，调剂余缺

each making up the other\'s deficiency from his own surplus

Their articles read awkwardly and don\'t even have unity and coherence, lacking in both ideas and art.
人无完人，每个人都有自己的缺点。

quēyī shǎoyào

a saving grace
可取之处，足以补偿其他缺点的长处

虽然他有诸多缺点，但确实是个诚实的人。

good/bad points
[of person] 优/缺点

该缺点已经被改正。

粗心是他的一个缺点。

Wǒ jiāng jǐnliàng lièchū tāmen de yōuquēdiǎn。
我将尽量列出他们的优缺点。
The weakness in the solution is unavoidable and there is no help for it.
Jiějué fāng\'àn de quēdiǎn shì bùkě-bìmiǎn érqiě wúfǎ-wǎnhuí de。
解决方案的缺点是不可避免而且无法挽回的。
He knows my bad points as well as my good points.
Wǒ de quēdiǎn hé yōudiǎn tā dōu zhīdào。
我的缺点和优点他都知道。
Shortcomings inherent in our approach.
Wǒmen de fāngfǎ zhōng yǐnhán quēdiǎn。
我们的方法中隐含缺点。
He had his flaws but he was great nonetheless.
Jǐnguǎn tā yě yǒu quēdiǎn，dàn tā réngrán hěn wěidà。
尽管他也有缺点，但他仍然很伟大。
He knew his own faults much better than she did.
Tā duì zìjǐ quēdiǎn de liǎojiě bǐ tā suǒ shuō de gèng qīngchu。
他对自己缺点的了解比她所说的更清楚。
He was quick to point out his wife\'s failings.
Tā hěnkuài zhǐchū qīzǐ de quēdiǎn。
他很快指出妻子的缺点。
It is my task to look critically and constructively at the flaws and the failures.
Wǒ de rènwù shì yǐ pīpàn de tàidù hé jiànshèxìng de yǎnguāng lái kàndài quēdiǎn hé shībài。
我的任务是以批判的态度和建设性的眼光来看待缺点和失败。
Her sense of humor has to be a saving grace.
Tā de yōumògǎn bìxū chéngwéi yíxiàng kěyǐ míbǔ quēdiǎn de yōudiǎn。
她的幽默感必须成为一项可以弥补缺点的优点。
They discussed the merits and demerits of her novel.
Tāmen tǎolùnle tā de xiǎoshuō de yōuquēdiǎn。
他们讨论了她的小说的优缺点。
He was forced to listen to a recital of his many shortcomings.
Tā bèipò tīng rén lièjǔ tā de xǔduō quēdiǎn。
他被迫听人列举他的许多缺点。
He was keenly aware of his own shortcomings.
Tā nénggòu mǐngǎn de yìshídào zìjǐ de quēdiǎn。
他能够敏感地意识到自己的缺点。
Ten demerits and he loses his privileges.
Yīnwèi shí xiàng quēdiǎn，tā shīqùle zìjǐ de tèquán。
因为十项缺点，他失去了自己的特权。
The one drawback: at the moment, Chenggong is almost completely empty.
wéiyī de quēdiǎn shì ： cǐkè de Chénggòng jīhū shì yízuò kōng chéng。
唯一的缺点是：此刻的呈贡几乎是一座空城。

这个任何事物都可以并且必须通过性别研究的中心观点缺乏实用性。
Their views frequently are less innovative than the next generation.

与下一代相比，他们观点常常缺乏前瞻性。

但是数据依然面临缺乏均匀数据点分布的问题。
The navy\'s real weakness, as always, was its lack of funding.
Hǎijūn zhēnzhèng de ruòdiǎn，shǐzhōng dōushì quēfá zījīn。

The teacher takes attendance every day to chase up absentees.
Nà wèi lǎoshī měi tiān diǎnmíng yǐ cháchū quēkèzhě。
那位老师每天点名以查出缺课者。
Getting through that small opening was a tight squeeze.
Cóng nàgè quēkǒu zhōng jǐ guòqù yào fèi diǎn lìqi。

缺乏一致性意见这一点反映出了理论界存在分歧。
The argument is clear and intelligent, but wanting in evidence.
Lùndiǎn qīngxī ér míng zhì，dànshì quēfá zhèngjù。
论点清晰而明志，但是缺乏证据。

yǒu yìshi de kèfú zìjǐ de quēdiǎn

缺陷
quēxiàn
defect; drawback; flaw; blemish
我缺的是南风啊，不需要白板！
Wǒ quē de shì nánfēng a，bùxūyào báibǎn！
What I need is a south wind tile, not a white dragon tile!

At the last stage of our preparation for the test, we will focus on locating and making up for deficiencies.
考前的一个星期，就是查漏补缺的时间。
Kǎoqián de yígè xīngqī，jiùshì chálòu bǔquē de shíjiān。
A week before the test is the time for locating and making up the deficiencies.
现在许多京剧流派都缺乏优秀的传人，这对京剧的发展很不利。

你工作很踏实，就是缺少创造性。

Because of lack of calcium, old people\'s bones are very brittle.
这次讲演缺乏互动，我提问下面都没人答言。
Zhècì jiǎngyǎn quēfá hùdòng，wǒ tíwèn xiàmiàn dōu méi rén dáyán。
The lecture induced no participation, when I asked questions the audience remained silent.
今年影坛缺少大动作。
Jīnnián yǐngtán quēshǎo dà dòngzuò。
The film circle lacks strong growth this year.
缺乏胆魄，难成大器。
Quēfá dǎnpò，nánchéng dàqì。
He is not brave enough to amount to anything big.
由于缺雨，这块土地很干松。
Yóuyú quēyǔ，zhèkuài tǔdì hěngānsōng。
This stretch of land is dry and soft because the lack of rain here.
本旅游公司的“小语种”导游告缺。
Běn lǚyóugōngsī de“xiǎoyǔzhǒng”dǎoyóu gàoquē。
Our tourist company is short of guides who are able to speak minor languages.
由于缺钙，老年人容易患骨质疏松症。
Yóuyú quēgài，lǎoniánrén róngyì huàn gǔzhì shūsōngzhèng。
Due to a lack of calcium, old people can easily get osteoporosis.
在缺水的地方，我们只能种植旱作。
Zài quēshuǐ de dìfāng，wǒmen zhǐnéng zhòngzhí hànzuò。
We can only plant dry crops in places short of water.
由于长时间缺水，河身干裂了。
Yóuyú cháng shíjiān quē shuǐ，héshēn gānliè le。
Lacking in water for a long time, the riverbed is dry and cracked.
他的文章是胡编乱造的，所以缺乏生动性。
Tā de wénzhāng shì húbiān luànzào de，suǒyǐ quēfá shēngdòngxìng。
His article is made up, so it lacks vitality.
他们的文章佶屈聱牙，甚至文理不通，既缺思想性，又无艺术性。
Tāmen de wénzhāng jíqū áoyá，shènzhì wénlǐ bùtōng，jì quē sīxiǎngxìng，yòu wú yìshùxìng。
Their articles read awkwardly and don\'t even have unity and coherence, lacking in both ideas and art.
他做事总是急不可耐，缺乏理性。
Tā zuòshì zǒngshì jíbùkěnài，quēfá lǐxìng。
He is always impatient in doing things, lacking reason.
皇帝鼓励大臣谏诤，以戒除自己的缺点。
Huángdì gǔlì dàchén jiànzhèng，yǐ jièchú zìjǐ de quēdiǎn。
The emperor encouraged his ministers to point out his faults frankly so that he could correct them.
隋唐两代王朝统一了天下，真是金瓯无缺。
Suí Táng liǎngdài wángcháo tǒngyī le tiānxià，zhēnshì jīnōu wúquē。
The Sui and Tang Dynasties united China and achieved national integration.
朋友们说他过分谨慎，究其实，他是缺少自信。
Péngyoumen shuō tā guòfèn jǐnshèn，jiū qíshí，tā shì quēshǎo zìxìn。
His friends say that he is too prudent, but he actually lacks confidence.
发生这样的事故绝非偶然，都是工作人员平时太缺乏安全意识了！
Fāshēng zhèyàng de shìgù juéfēi ǒurán，dōushì gōngzuò rényuán píngshí tài quēfá ānquán yìshí le！
This kind of accident is not accidental at all. It is all because that working staff lack safety awareness in their daily work.
她气得咒骂起来：这么缺德害人，将来让你绝门！
Tā qì de zhòumà qǐlái：zhème quēdé hàirén，jiānglái ràng nǐ juémén！
She was very angry and began to curse: you are so wicked that you will have no children!
工地上缺人手，他拿了个镢头就帮忙去了。
Gōngdì shàng quē rénshǒu，tā ná le gè juétóu jiù bāngmáng qù le。
The construction site has a lack of labor, so he took a pickaxe and went there to help.
自从班长转学走了以后，我们班班长的位子就开缺了。
Zìcóng bānzhǎng zhuǎnxué zǒu le yǐhòu，wǒmen bān bānzhǎng de wèizi jiù kāiquē le。
Since the monitor transferred to another school, there has been no monitor in our class.
现在的有些电视剧，情节夸诞，缺乏生活中的真实性。
Xiànzài de yǒuxiē diànshìjù，qíngjié kuādàn，quēfá shēnghuó zhōng de zhēnshíxìng。
Some TV shows are full of exaggeration and lack trueness to life.
这里水资源极度匮缺。
Zhèlǐ shuǐ zīyuán jídù kuìquē。
This area is extremely short of water.
拉管是交响乐队不可缺少的乐器之一。
Lāguǎn shì jiāoxiǎngyuèduì bùkě quēshǎo de yuèqì zhīyī。
The trombone is an essential musical instrument for a symphony orchestra.
咱们现在缺少的是力证，已有的证据都有很明显的漏洞。
Zánmen xiànzài quēshǎo de shì lìzhèng，yǐyǒu de zhèngjù dōu yǒu hěnmíngxiǎn de lòudòng。
What we lack now is cogent evidence. All the evidence we have obtained has obvious flaws.
亮丑不是坏事，能够刺激我们改正缺点。
Liàngchǒu búshì huàishì，nénggòu cìjī wǒmen gǎizhèng quēdiǎn。
Revealing mistakes is not a bad thing. It can stimulate us to correct our shortcomings.
他一直有生理缺陷，对自己的朋友也难以启齿。
Tā yìzhí yǒu shēnglǐ quēxiàn，duì zìjǐ de péngyou yě nányǐ qǐchǐ。
He has a physical defect, and is too shy to speak out even to his friends.
她觉得交朋友应该宁缺勿滥，要交就交个优秀的朋友。
Tā juédé jiāopéngyou yīnggāi níngquē wùlàn，yào jiāo jiù jiāo gè yōuxiù de péngyou。
She holds the view that it\'s better not to make friends than to make an unsuitable friend.
这孩子缺少家教，说话办事特气人。
Zhè háizi quēshǎo jiājiào，shuōhuà bànshì tè qìrén。
The child is ill-bred, he annoys people with both his words and behavior.
他写的故事过于缺略，应该再增加些细节。
Tā xiě de gùshì guòyú quēlüè，yīnggāi zài zēngjiā xiē xìjié。
The stories he writes are incomplete, they need more details.
直到救援物资到达，灾区的群众已经缺食近一个月了。
Zhídào jiùyuán wùzī dàodá，zāiqū de qúnzhòng yǐjing quēshí jìn yígèyuè le。
By the time relief arrived, the people in the disaster area had already suffered from insufficient food for a month.
老李患上了脑缺血，时常头晕。
Lǎo Lǐ huànshàng le nǎoquēxuè，shícháng tóuyūn。
Lao Li has a lack of blood flow to the head, and often feels dizzy.
开玩笑也不看场合，真是缺心少肺的家伙。
Kāiwánxiào yě búkàn chǎnghé，zhēnshì quēxīn shǎofèi de jiāhuǒ。
He is really a simple-minded fellow as he jokes whatever the situation.
这本古书虽有缺页，仍很珍贵。
Zhèběn gǔshū suī yǒu quēyè，réng hěnzhēnguì。
The ancient book is still valuable, although it lacks a few pages.
如果想把企业经营好，这两个条件缺一不可。
Rúguǒ xiǎng bǎ qǐyè jīngyíng hǎo，zhè liǎnggè tiáojiàn quēyī bùkě。
If you want to run the enterprise well, none of these two qualifications is dispensable.
这是一家刚成立的公司，缺员严重。
Zhè shì yìjiā gāng chénglì de gōngsī，quēyuán yánzhòng。
The company is newly opened and is short of employees.
这家公司刚刚贴出招聘启事，就有五个人愿来填补缺员。
Zhèjiā gōngsī gānggāng tiēchū zhāopìn qǐshì，jiù yǒu wǔ gè rén yuànlái tiánbǔ quēyuán。
The company had just put up a wanted advertisement, when five people came who were willing to fill the vacancy.
由于主力缺阵，他们输掉了这场比赛。
Yóuyú zhǔlì quēzhèn，tāmen shūdiào le zhèchǎng bǐsài。
The absence of their ace striker led to the team\'s defeat.
全家就这一个孩子，怎么舍得让他缺嘴呢？
Quánjiā jiù zhè yígè háizi，zěnme shědé ràng tā quēzuǐ ne？
There is only one child in this family, who is willing to let him to be unhappy with his snacks?
这部全书尚未完善，还有需要拾遗补缺的地方。
Zhèbù quánshū shàngwèi wánshàn，háiyǒu xūyào shíyí bǔquē de dìfāng。
This book is not complete yet, there is still much to be added.
售缺的商品我们会尽快补齐，请您耐心等待。
Shòuquē de shāngpǐn wǒmen huì jìnkuài bǔqí，qǐng nín nàixīn děngdài。
We will supply the products that are out of stock as soon as possible, please wait patiently.
水能短缺已经是全球性的问题了。
Shuǐnéng duǎnquē yǐjing shì quánqiúxìng de wèntí le。
The shortage of water has become a global problem.
我们的工作现在缺少的就是司南，所以找不到目标和方向。
Wǒmen de gōngzuò xiànzài quēshǎo de jiùshì sīnán，suǒyǐ zhǎobúdào mùbiāo hé fāng xiàng。
What we lack in our work now is a guideline, and that\'s why we can\'t find an aim and direction.
她是个算盘珠似的人，从来做事都是缺乏主动性的。
Tā shì gè suànpanzhū sì de rén，cónglái zuòshì dōushì quēfá zhǔdòngxìng de。
She is a passive person like an abacus, lacking initiative in everything.
我不得不提前索还我借给你的钱，因为我现在缺钱。
Wǒ bùdébùtíqián suǒhuán wǒ jiègěi nǐ de qián，yīnwèi wǒ xiànzài quēqián。
I have to ask you for the money I lent you ahead of time, since I lack money now.
这个摊主很会做生意，对顾客热情且从不缺斤短两，所以大伙儿都爱买他的菜。
Zhège tānzhǔ hěnhuì zuò shēngyì，duì gùkè rèqíng qiě cóng bùquējīn duǎnliǎng，suǒyǐ dàhuǒr dōu ài mǎi tā de cài。
That vendor knows how to do business. He is always warm to his customers and never gives short weight. That\'s why everybody buys from him.
这孩子从小就体弱多病，这都是缺乏体育锻炼造成的。
Zhè háizi cóng xiǎo jiù tǐruò duōbìng，zhè dōushì quēfá tǐyù duànliàn zàochéng de。
The child has a weak constitution and is struck ill from time to time. Lack of exercise is part of the reason.
你能从这个桯子观察出植物缺少哪种元素吗？
Nǐ néng cóng zhège tīngzi guānchá chū zhíwù quēshǎo nǎ zhǒng yuánsùma？
Can you see from its flora axis which element the plant is lacking?
这个戏还缺一位娃娃生演员，你可以去试试。
Zhège xì hái quē yíwèi wáwáshēng yǎnyuán，nǐ kěyǐ qù shìshì。
This play is still lacking a young male actor, you can go to have a try.
你的想法很具体，只不过缺乏现实性。
Nǐ de xiǎngfǎ hěn jùtǐ，zhǐbúguò quēfá xiànshíxìng。
Your ideas are quite specific, but they are not realistic.
你就是缺点雅气，整个一土匪。
Nǐ jiùshì quēdiǎn yǎqì，zhěnggè yì tǔfěi。
You lack refined manners and are like a barbarian.
我们都明白严教在教育中也是不可缺少的。
Wǒmen dōu míngbai yánjiào zài jiàoyù zhōng yěshì bùkě quēshǎo de。
We all understand that strict education is necessary.
空调缺货，连样子货都卖了。
Kōngtiáo quēhuò，lián yàngzihuò dōu mài le。
Air conditioners are out of stock. Even the samples have been sold.
老王突发心脏病去世了，他的遗缺至今无人顶替。
Lǎo Wáng tūfā xīnzàngbìng qùshì le，tā de yíquē zhìjīn wúrén dǐngtì。
Lao Wang had a sudden heart attack and died, his vacancy hasn\'t been filled yet.
村子里缺水，村民们每次印牲口都要去很远的地方。
Cūnzi lǐ quēshuǐ，cūnmínmen měicì yìn shēngkou dōuyào qù hěn yuǎn de dìfāng。
Because of a lack of water, the villagers have to water their horses at a place far from their village.
人无完人，每个人都有自己的缺点。
Rénwú wánrén，měigèrén dōu yǒu zìjǐ de quēdiǎn。
No one is perfect; everyone has his own shortcomings.
国家将对部分紧缺商品预征一定的税收。
Guójiā jiāng duì bùfen jǐnquē shāngpǐn yùzhēng yídìng de shuìshōu。
The state will levy certain taxes in advance on some commodities in short supply.
凿岩机是煤炭采掘不可缺少的工具。
Záoyánjī shì méitàn cǎijué bùkě quēshǎo de gōngjù。
The rock drill is indispensable for digging coal mines.
如今的儿童文学缺少好的作品。
Rújīn de értóng wénxué quēshǎo hǎo de zuòpǐn。
Great works of children\'s literature are hard to find today.
歼击机是空中作战不可或缺的武器。
Jiānjījī shì kōng zhōng zuòzhàn bùkě huòquē de wǔqì。
Fighter planes are indispensable arms for wars in the sky.
医疗站的药品奇缺，给人民看病带来不便。
Yīliáozhàn de yàopǐn qíquē，gěi rénmín kànbìng dàilái búbiàn。
The health clinic is short of medicine, which is inconvenient for treating people\'s illnesses.
姥姥为了防止小贩缺斤短两，每次出去买菜都要带个弹簧秤。
Lǎolao wèile fángzhǐ xiǎofàn quējīnduǎnliǎng，měicì chūqù mǎicài dōu yào dài gè tánhuángchèng。
Grandma takes a spring balance with her every time she goes to the grocery store, in case the vendors give her short weight.
缺乏微量元素的植物是不容易长好的。
Quēfá wēiliàng yuánsù de zhíwù shì bù róngyì cháng hǎo de。
It\'s hard for plants that lack trace elements to grow well.
稀有金属是航空工业发展不可或缺的原材料。
Xīyǒujīnshǔ shì hángkōng gōngyè fāzhǎn bùkěhuòquē de yuáncáiliào。
Rare metal is indispensable for the aircraft industry.
要强化创新意识，不能抱残守缺。
Yào qiánghuà chuàngxīnyìshí，bùnéng bàocánshǒuquē。
We must emphasize creativity, and break the pattern of clinging to the past.
植物生长，水和阳光两者缺一不可。
Zhíwùshēngzhǎng，shuǐ hé yángguāng liǎngzhě quēyībùkě。
For plants to grow they must have both sun and water.
企业管理存在严重的缺陷。
Qǐyèguǎnlǐ cúnzài yánzhòngde quēxiàn。
There are serious failings in the management of this enterprise.
会议独缺山姆一人。
Huìyì dúquē Shānmǔ yìrén。
Only Sam was missing from the meeting.
短缺商品
duǎnquēshāngpǐn
commodities in short supply
恋爱中的男女很少介意对方的缺点。
Liàn\'àizhōngde nánnǚ hěnshǎo jièyì duìfāngde quēdiǎn。
People who are in love rarely mind about their partner\'s weaknesses.

quēfá fǔ\'àide tóngnián
a loveless childhood

gǎizhèngquēdiǎn

bùkěhuòquē

néngyuán duǎnquē

Duìyú mǎi yīfu，wǒ de yuánzé shì nìngquēwúlàn.
When buying clothes, I go by the principle of quality over quantity.
这地方缺水。
Zhè dìfāng quēshuǐ.
This place is short of water.

Zhèběnshū quē liǎng yè。

quē rénshǒu

Zhèpiān wénzhāng quēfá shēndù。

她的缺点和优点相比可以说是瑕不掩瑜。

quēxiàn

bùkěhuòquē

风暴会何时停息？
Outside a storm raged; rain lashed against the windows.
Chuāngwài kuángfēngbàoyǔ，yǔshuǐ qiāodǎzhe chuānghu。
窗外狂风暴雨，雨水敲打着窗户。
The ship was put about during the storm.
Zài fēngbào qījiān，zhè sōu chuán gǎibiànle hángxiàng。
在风暴期间，这艘船改变了航向。
The storm forced us to steer into the weather the whole time.
Fēngbào pòshǐ wǒmen yìzhí zài huài tiānqì lǐ jiàshǐ chuánzhī。
风暴迫使我们一直在坏天气里驾驶船只。
They rested to wait out the storm.
Tāmen xiēle xiàlái，ānjìng de děngdài fēngbào de tíngxī。
他们歇了下来，安静地等待风暴的停息。
We were able to weather the storm.
Wǒmen nénggòu ānrán dùguò fēngbào。
我们能够安然度过风暴。
He tried to balloon around the earth but storms forced him to land in China.
Tā shìtú chéng qìqiú zuò huánqiúlǚxíng，dàn fēngbào pòshǐ tā jiàngluò zài Zhōngguó。
他试图乘气球做环球旅行，但风暴迫使他降落在中国。
The storm grounded the ship.
Fēngbào shǐ zhè sōu chuán gēqiǎn le。
风暴使这艘船搁浅了。
The sky cleared after the storm.
Fēngbào guòhòu，tiān fàngqíng le。
风暴过后，天放晴了。
This storm is certainly a change for the worse.
Wúyōngzhìyí，zhè chǎng fēngbào jiāng zàochéng gèng huài de hòuguǒ。
毋庸置疑，这场风暴将造成更坏的后果。
They were in the eye of the storm.
Tāmen chǔzài fēngbào de zhōngxīn。
他们处在风暴的中心。
The barometer gave clear indications of an approaching storm.
Qìyābiǎo de dúshù qīngchu de biǎomíng yìchǎng fēngbào jíjiāng dàolái。
气压表的读数清楚地表明一场风暴即将到来。
The spanish ships had superior speed and weatherliness.
Xībānyá chuánzhī de sùdù hé kàng fēngbào nénglì jiào yōu。
西班牙船只的速度和抗风暴能力较优。
The hikers got into a storm and had to turn back.
Zhèxiē túbùlǚxíng zhě yùdàole fēngbào，bùdébù fǎnhuí。
这些徒步旅行者遇到了风暴，不得不返回。
The storm was responsible for many blocked roads and bridges.
Fēngbào zàochéngle xǔduō dàolù hé dàqiáo de dǔsè。
风暴造成了许多道路和大桥的堵塞。
There is little likelihood of a meltdown comparable to the American banking collapse in march 1933.
Hěnshǎo yǒu jīnróng fēngbào néng yǔ 1933 nián 3 yuè měiguó yínhángyè de bēngkuì xiāngbǐ。
很少有金融风暴能与1933年3月美国银行业的崩溃相比。
The storm caused complete immobilization of the rescue team.
Fēngbào bǎ jiùyuánduì wánquán kùnzhù le。
风暴把救援队完全困住了。
He dreaded the storminess of the north Atlantic in winter.
Tā hàipà běidàxīyáng dōngtiān de fēngbàoqī。
他害怕北大西洋冬天的风暴期。
The sea was churning in the storm.
Hǎishuǐ zài fēngbào zhōng fāngǔn。
海水在风暴中翻滚。
Coastwise winds contributed to the storm.
Yán\'àn fēng yǒuzhù yú bàofēng de xíngchéng。
沿岸风有助于暴风的形成。
The storm leveled the tree.
暴风雨刮倒了那棵树。
He flew on, notwithstanding the storm.
尽管有暴风雨，他还是继续飞行。
the teeth of the storm
暴风雨的破坏力
a boat tossed by a storm
一条在暴风雨中颠簸的船只
to venture a storm
冒着暴风雨
a violent storm
猛烈的暴风雨
Those black clouds on the horizon announce an imminent storm.
地平线上的那些乌云，预示着一场暴风雨就要来临。
According to the weather balloon data, a big storm will reach the East coast next Monday.
根据气象气球收集的数据，下周一东海岸将有一场暴风雨。
The storm beached all the boats near the rocks yesterday.
昨天的暴风雨使所有船只都搁浅在岩石边了。
The storm yesterday was awful but at least it cleaned the air, don\'t you think?
昨天的暴风雨是很猛烈，但至少让空气很清新，你不这么认为吗？
After the storm the sky became blue and clear.
暴风雨过后天空变得蔚蓝而清澈。
The storm stripped the trees of their branches.
暴风雨刮断了很多树枝。
There was a lot of lightning during the storm.
暴风雨中夹杂着阵阵闪电。
Our building lost power during the storm.
暴风雨时，我们的楼停电了。
My mother is always sea-sick if the weather is rough.
有暴风雨的话，我妈妈就会晕船。
The storm began to pick up.
暴风雨开始变得更猛烈了。
The storm wrecked that ship to pieces.
暴风雨将船体击成碎片。
The airport was closed because of the heavy snow storm.
由于暴风雪的影响，机场被迫关闭了。
Besides the storm, the ship held its course.
除了碰到暴风雨的时候，这艘船一直都在按原定路线航行。
I wouldn\'t have braved the storm to come here if I didn\'t love you so much.
若非深爱着你，我才不会冒着暴风雪来到这里。
The town suffered serious damage during the storm.
暴风雪使这个城镇遭受了严重损毁。
The plane lost contact with the airport during the fierce storm.
由于猛烈的暴风雨，飞机失去了与机场的联络。
I got caught in the storm.
我被暴风雨困住了。
Storms knock out power, but don\'t cool off southern Asia.
暴风雨突然来袭，但没有给南亚天气带来凉意。
Snowstorms are common during winter.
暴风雪在冬天是常见的。
It was terribly cold weather, a blizzard in fact.
天气异常冷，事实上，是暴风雪。
The rainstorm kept us withindoors.
暴风雨使我们待在家里。
All these efforts were made in preparation for the upcoming storm.
所有这些努力都是为了防备即将来临的暴风雨。
The stay on the mast was broken during the storm.
桅杆的支索在暴风雨中折断了。
The storm caused a stay of the race.
比赛因暴风雨而中止了。
The storm with violence knocked over a lot of trees.
猛烈的暴风雨吹倒了很多大树。
She said the situation could worsen if storms move north and threaten winter grain supplies.
她说，如果暴风雪向北方移动，将威胁到冬季粮食的供应，局势将进一步恶化。
The sailors decided to tack their direction due to the storm.
Yóuyú yùdàole bàofēngyǔ，shuǐshǒu juédìng línshí tiáozhěng tāmen de hángxiàng。
由于遇到了暴风雨，水手决定临时调整他们的航向。
Trim the sails before the storm.
Zài bàofēngyǔ dàolái qián yào tiáozhěng hǎo fānxiàng。
在暴风雨到来前要调整好帆向。
The ship turtled over in the big storm.
Lúnchuán zài bàofēngyǔ zhōng qīngfù le。
轮船在暴风雨中倾覆了。
The ship dragged her anchor during the storm.
Chuánbó zài bàofēngyǔ zhōng tuōzhe máo yídòng。
船舶在暴风雨中拖着锚移动。
They anticipated a thunderstorm as the sun was shining.
Hái zài yángguāng míngmèi de shíhou tāmen yǐjīng yùcèdàole huì yǒu yì chǎng bàofēngyǔ。
还在阳光明媚的时候他们已经预测到了会有一场暴风雨。
The window broke in the storm.
Chuānghu bèi bàofēngyǔ dǎsuì le。
窗户被暴风雨打碎了。
A great storm broke across the lake in the hour following his death.
Zài tā sǐhòu de yì xiǎoshí nèi，yì chǎng měngliè de bàofēngyǔ xíjuǎnle zhège húpō。
在他死后的一小时内，一场猛烈的暴风雨席卷了这个湖泊。
At that moment a clap of thunder exploded directly overhead as the storm burst.
Zài nàgè shíhòu，bàofēngyǔ tūrán láixí，yí gè xiǎngléi zài tóudǐng zhíjiē zháxiǎng le。
在那个时候，暴风雨突然来袭，一个响雷在头顶直接炸响了。
All over the island tall old trees crashed down in the storm.
Zhěnggè dǎoshàng suǒyǒu gāodà de lǎoshù dōu zài bàofēng zhōng dǎoxià le。
整个岛上所有高大的老树都在暴风中倒下了。
The coming storm is stirring fear in the community.
Jíjiāng dàolái de bàofēngyǔ zhèngzài tiǎoqǐ gōngzhòng de kǒngjù。
即将到来的暴风雨正在挑起公众的恐惧。
The remainder were driven back by a violent storm to the village.
Cányú bùfen bèi yízhèn bàofēng juàn huíle cūnzi lǐ。
残余部分被一阵暴风卷回了村子里。
They walked slowly, innocent of the coming storm.
Tāmen zǒu de hěn màn，duì jíjiāng dàolái de bàofēngyǔ háowú chájué。
他们走的很慢，对即将到来的暴风雨毫无察觉。
A fierce thunderstorm passed through the city.
Yí zhèn měngliè de bàofēngyǔ xíjuǎnle zhè zuò chéngshì。
一阵猛烈的暴风雨席卷了这座城市。
The storm battered up our boat pretty badly.
Bàofēngyǔ yánzhòng sǔnhuàile wǒmen de chuánzhī。
暴风雨严重损坏了我们的船只。
A great storm broke over this town.
Zhènzi shàngfāng tūrán chūxiànle bàofēngyǔ。
镇子上方突然出现了暴风雨。
A storm brewed up while they were talking.
Tāmen tánhuà de shíhou，bàofēngyǔ zhèngzài yùnniàng。
他们谈话的时候，暴风雨正在酝酿。
The sky clouded over and the storm broke.
Tiānkōng bùmǎnle wūyún，bàofēngyǔ xílái。

在暴风雨季，这东西被用作喷管来排水。
Electrical storms raged in the clouds, bombarding the land and the sea with lightning.

暴风雨在高空中肆虐着，电闪照亮了海面和陆地。
There is a legend in Greek mythology about an old sailor who was piloting his ship through the rough waters of a stormy sea.
Xīlà shénhuà zhōng yǒu gè chuánshuō shì guānyú yí gè lǎo shuǐshǒu zài bàofēngyǔ de hǎishàng jià chuán chuānyuè bōtāoxiōngyǒng de dàhǎi de gùshi。

Tā suǒyào zuò de quánbù jiùshì jīngshòu zhù ǒurán de bàofēngyǔ。

The trees were cleaned of apples by the storm.

There was a lull in the storm.

Cows were strawed to weather the snowstorm.

平静的表面下孕育着一场政治风暴。

反动政权暴虐无道，激起民变，气数已尽。
a people ground by tyranny
受暴政压迫的民族

暴政引起造反。

这个独裁者不断地向人民实行暴政，就是在自取灭亡。

Xià le yízhèn bàoyǔ。
There was a heavy downpour.
暴雨成灾。
Bàoyǔ chéngzāi。
The heavy rainstorm caused a disastrous flood.
过去一下暴雨，这条河就发大水。

This river used to get flooded whenever there was a rainstorm.
这场农民运动如急风暴雨，势不可挡。

狂风夹着暴雨
kuángfēngjiā zhe bàoyǔ 
a violent wind accompanied by a torrential rain
他们向敌人展开了狂风暴雨似的攻击。
Tāmen xiàng dírén zhǎnkāi le kuángfēngbàoyǔ shì de gōngjī。
They launched a furious whirlwind attack on the enemy.
倏然一阵暴雨。
Shūrán yízhèn bàoyǔ。
A rainstorm came on suddenly.
暴雨过后，整个村子的地都被水淹了。
Bàoyǔ guòhòu，zhěnggè cūnzi de dì dōu bèi shuǐ yān le。
The heavy rains flooded all the fields of the village.
这场大暴雨来得可真突然。
Zhèchǎng dàbàoyǔ lái de kě zhēn tūrán。
The heavy downpour took people by surprise.
连日暴雨使大水有漫过堤围的危险。
Liánrì bàoyǔ shǐ dàshuǐ yǒu mànguò dīwéi de wēixiǎn。
Continuous rainstorms might cause the flood to overflow the bank.
刚才明明还是晴天，俄而暴雨骤降。
Gāngcái míngmíng háishi qíngtiān，é\'ér bàoyǔ zhòujiàng。
It was sunny just now, and the next moment a rainstorm came.
暴雨过后，天际出现了一抹飞虹。
Bàoyǔ guòhòu，tiānjì chūxiàn le yìmǒ fēihóng。
A rainbow presented itself after the storm.
华南地区最近普降暴雨，灾情严重。
Huánán dìqū zuìjìn pǔjiàng bàoyǔ，zāiqíng yánzhòng。
Recently, areas in South China are generally suffering from rainstorms, and the situation is very serious.
连日来，江苏省境内普降暴雨。
Liánrì lái，Jiāngsū Shěng jìngnèi pǔjiàng bàoyǔ。
The rainstorm occurred over much of Jiangsu Province for several days.
今晚预报有雷暴雨，你路上一定要小心开车。
Jīnwǎn yùbào yǒu léibàoyǔ，nǐ lùshàng yídìng yào xiǎoxīn kāichē。
According to the weather report, there is thunderstorm tonight. Take care while driving on the road.
这棵大树在狂风暴雨中傲然挺立。
Zhè kē dàshù zài kuángfēng bàoyǔ zhōng àorán tǐnglì。
The big tree stands tall in the rainstorm.
一阵暴雨

a burst of rain
暴雨终于停了。
Bàoyǔ zhōngyú tíngle。

bàofēngyǔ bān de zhǎngshēng 
stormy (or thunderous) applause

yùshàng bàofēngyǔ 
be caught in a storm

Yúchuán yú bàofēngyǔ zhōng chénmò。

暴风雨快要来了，鸟儿都躲藏起来。

As the storm approached, the birds were seeking shelter.
暴风雨快来了，你还是赶紧跑吧！
Bàofēngyǔ kuài lái le，nǐ háishi gǎnjǐn pǎo ba！
A storm is coming up. You\'d better cut and run.
日内将有一场暴风雨。
Rìnèi jiāng yǒu yìcháng bàofēngyǔ。
There will be a heavy storm in a day or two.
暴风雨停息了。
Bàofēngyǔ tíngxī le。
The storm has subsided.
暴风雨席卷大草原。
Bàofēngyǔ xíjuǎn dàcǎoyuán。
A blizzard swept across the prairie.
响雷了，暴风雨快来了。
Xiǎngléi le，bàofēngyǔ kuài lái le。
It\'s thundering. There\'s a storm coming on.
暴风雨眼看就要来了。
Bàofēngyǔ yǎnkàn jiùyào lái le。
The storm will start any moment.
今夜有暴风雨，渔民们已经将船停入了避风港。
Jīnyè yǒu bàofēngyǔ，yúmínmen yǐjing jiāng chuán tíngrù le bìfēnggǎng。
The fishermen have already put their boats in the shelter, because there is going to be a tempest tonight.
风势不小，看这样子暴风雨就要来临了！
Fēngshì bùxiǎo，kàn zhè yàngzi bàofēngyǔ jiùyào láilín le！
The wind is so strong! It looks like a storm is coming.
暴风雨的海面上，小船在巨浪间忽隐忽现。
Bàofēngyǔ de hǎimiàn shàng，xiǎochuán zài jùlàng jiān hūyǐn hūxiàn。
On the stormy ocean, the little boat was hardly discernible among the waves.
暴风雨来临，激浪猛烈地敲打船梢。

A storm has come and surging waves are beating against the rudder end of the boat.

How could such a tender bud survive the thunderstorm?
暴风雨使货船偏离了主航道。
Bàofēngyǔ shǐ huòchuán piānlí le zhǔhángdào。
The storm has driven the cargo ship off of its main course.
在钻井平台上工作的工人要注意暴风雨的袭击。

Workers working on the drilling platform should be careful about storms.
突如其来的暴风雨使我恐惧万分。

The sudden thunderstorm really frightened me.

其势如暴风骤雨

上午十点左右，暴雨挟着浓雾骤然而至。

暴雨毁掉了其前进方向上的一切。

云正在我们上空汇集，我知道就要下暴雨了。

Tāmen yǐ bǎ tāmen de xuè pō dào dìmiàn shàng，hǎosì bàoyǔ。

hàiréntīngwén de bàoxíng
horrifying atrocities
种族主义者的暴行激怒了人民。
Zhǒngzúzhǔyìzhě de bàoxíngjīnù le rénmín。
The atrocities committed by the racists enraged the people.
灭绝人性的暴行
mièjué rénxìng de bàoxíng
inhuman atrocities
这份笔供揭露了侵略者的暴行。
Zhè fèn bǐgòng jiēlòu le qīnlüèzhě de bàoxíng。
His written confession discloses the ferocity of the invaders.
面对当权者的暴行，他大声疾呼大家起来反抗。
Miànduì dāngquánzhě de bàoxíng，tā dàshēng jíhū dàjiā qǐlái fǎnkàng。
Faced with the rulers\' atrocities, he called on the public to revolt.
侵略者的暴行引发了人民战争的高潮。
Qīnlüèzhě de bàoxíng yǐnfā le rénmín zhànzhēng de gāocháo。
The aggressors\' atrocities aroused a surge in the people\'s war.
他的暴行引起了公愤。
Tāde bàoxíng yǐnqǐle gōngfèn。
There was public outcry at his atrocious behaviour.
暴行
Bàoxíng
act of cruelty
暴力行为
bàolì xíngwéi 
an act of violence
粗暴的行为
cūbào de xíngwéi 
crude behaviour
举行暴动
jǔxíng bàodòng 
raise an insurrection; stage a riot
犯罪嫌疑人对那个女子施暴的罪行已经得到证实。
Fànzuì xiányírén duì nàge nǚzǐ shībào de zuìxíng yǐjing dédào zhèngshí。
The evidence of the criminal suspect\'s rape of the girl has been verified.
随意诛杀百姓是暴君的行径。
Suíyì zhūshā bǎixìng shì bàojūn de xíngjìng。
Killing the common people at will is the behavior of a tyrant.
暴行
暴行。
敌人的暴行令人怒火中烧。
揭露殖民主义者的暴行。
法西斯的暴行，使全世界人民无比愤慨
说起日本军国主义的暴行，老人们都有切肤之痛。
行为凶暴。
行仁义，驱暴恶。
行为如此强暴。
Atrocities of a similar pattern have been perpetrated with no fear of a corrective international response.
无视国际上要求纠正的呼声，类似的暴行正在不断发生。
Vlad the Impaler is infamous for his cruel deeds.
弗拉德公爵因其残忍暴行而臭名昭彰。
allegations of brutality/corruption
对暴行/腐败的指控
The president condemned the violence of the invaders.
总统谴责了侵略者的暴行。
Starvation is an atrocity, and should never happen in the modern world.
Èsǐ rénmìng shì yì zhǒng bàoxíng，juébúyīng fāshēng zài xiàndài shèhuì。
饿死人命是一种暴行，绝不应发生在现代社会。
The paper reported rather tendentiously on the war atrocities.
Zhèjiā bàozhǐ duì zhànzhēng bàoxíng de bàodào cúnzàizhe hěn dà qīngxiàngxìng。
这家报纸对战争暴行的报道存在着很大倾向性。
There was a conspiracy of silence about police brutality.
Yǒuguān jǐngchá de cánbào xíngwéi，cúnzài yí fèn bǎochí jiānmò de mìmì yuēdìng。
有关警察的残暴行为，存在一份保持缄默的秘密约定。
Much force was involved in the robbery.
抢劫过程中夹带了许多暴力行为。
The gangs usually recurred to threats and violence after a period of peace.
Yíduànshíjiān de ānníng zhīhòu，gāi tuánhuǒ yòu kāishǐ fùzhū wēixié yǔ bàolì xíngdòng。
一段时间的安宁之后，该团伙又开始付诸威胁与暴力行动。
I ended up in prison for a violent act.
Tā zuìzhōng yīnwèi bàolì xíngwéi jìnle jiānyù。
他最终因为暴力行为进了监狱。
The dictator was on his way to grave for his constant violence against people.
这个独裁者不断地向人民实行暴政，就是在自取灭亡。
He is in prison for committing violent crimes.
Tā yīn fànxià bàolì zuìxíng ér rùyù。
他因犯下暴力罪行而入狱。
Two red cards for violent or abusive conduct will automatically eliminate a player from remainder of tournament.
若因暴力和谩骂行为招致两张红牌，球员就会自动被罚下赛场。
Her husband treats her rough and prevents her from meeting her family.
Tā de zhàngfu duì tā xíngwéi cūbào，bìng zǔzhǐ tā hé tā jiārén jiànmiàn。
她的丈夫对她行为粗暴，并阻止她和她家人见面。
He considered misrule a justification for revolution.
Tā bǎ bàozhèng shìwéi jìnxíng gémìng de lǐyóu。
他把暴政视为进行革命的理由。
They feared exposure of their campaign plans.
Tāmen dānxīn bàolù zìjǐ de xíngdòng jìhuà。
他们担心暴露自己的行动计划。
He tried to balloon around the earth but storms forced him to land in China.
Tā shìtú chéng qìqiú zuò huánqiúlǚxíng，dàn fēngbào pòshǐ tā jiàngluò zài Zhōngguó。
他试图乘气球做环球旅行，但风暴迫使他降落在中国。
He behaved abusively toward his children.
Tā duì tā háizi de xíngwéi hěn bàonüè。
他对他孩子的行为很暴虐。
The hikers got into a storm and had to turn back.
Zhèxiē túbùlǚxíng zhě yùdàole fēngbào，bùdébù fǎnhuí。
这些徒步旅行者遇到了风暴，不得不返回。
He flew on, notwithstanding the storm.
尽管有暴风雨，他还是继续飞行。
Her action tells us a lot about her motives.
她的行为在很大程度上暴露了她的动机。
There is little likelihood of a meltdown comparable to the American banking collapse in march 1933.
Hěnshǎo yǒu jīnróng fēngbào néng yǔ 1933 nián 3 yuè měiguó yínhángyè de bēngkuì xiāngbǐ。
很少有金融风暴能与1933年3月美国银行业的崩溃相比。
The riot police suppressed the student demonstrations quickly.
Fángbàojǐngchá hěnkuài de zhènyāle xuéshēngmen de shìwēi yóuxíng。
防暴警察很快的镇压了学生们的示威游行。
Besides the storm, the ship held its course.
除了碰到暴风雨的时候，这艘船一直都在按原定路线航行。
从暴徒手上夺下刀子
cóng bàotú shǒu shàng duóxià dāozi
wrest a knife from a hooligan
他冲着那帮匪徒暴吼一声。
Tā chòng zhe nà bāng fěitú bàohǒu yìshēng。
He shouted at the gangsters with fury.
那个歹徒当街施暴无辜百姓，引起了公愤。

That ruffian bullied innocent people right in the street, which triggered public anger.

a turbulent mob

暴徒们砸烂了警察岗亭，把警车付之一炬，并洗劫了这些大楼。
He\'s into something big with some Russian mobster.

She was killed by the mob only because of some evidence they heard on the cry.

她被暴徒杀害，仅仅由于一些道听途说的证据。
The mob careered through the streets.
Bàotú chōng guò jiēdào。
暴徒冲过街道。
Thugs beat him up when he walked down the street late at night.
Tā shēnyè zǒuguò dàjiē shí bèi bàotú tòngdǎle yí dùn。
他深夜走过大街时被暴徒痛打了一顿。
The control of the mob by the police was admirable.
Jǐngchá duì bàotú de kòngzhì lìng rén qīnpèi。
警察对暴徒的控制令人钦佩。
The mob boss wanted his rival out of the way.
Bàotú tóuzi xiǎng bǎ tā de duìshǒu nòng xiàqù。
暴徒头子想把他的对手弄下去。
Police used a sternutatory to subdue the mob.
Jǐngchá shǐyòng cuītìjì zhìfú le bàotú。
警察使用催嚏剂制服了暴徒。
The fell criminal was sentenced to death for his two murders.
残暴的歹徒因两起谋杀案被判死刑。
He never disciplined his apprentices with violence.
他从来不用暴力惩罚学徒。

Tīngdào zhège xiāoxi tā lièzì bàonù。
Hearing the news, he burst into fury with his eyes staring open widely.

a fit of anger
勃然大怒，暴怒发作
to see red
[inf] 暴怒
We got on with our game of chess and I exploded with anger when he cheated.

He changed from his normal calm into a frenzy.
Tā cóng zhèngcháng de lěngjìng zhuàngtài biàn de bàonù。
他从正常的冷静状态变得暴怒。

他粗暴的态度激怒了众人。

美国空军袭击了阿富汗之后，暴乱分子激怒了巴基斯坦。

The fishermen have already put their boats in the shelter, because there is going to be a tempest tonight.

The atrocities committed by the racists enraged the people.

This peasant movement carried all before it like a hurricane.

Zhèchǎng bàofēngxuě yāngjí shù qiān mùmín。
The snowstorm was a disaster to thousands of herdsmen.

píngxī bàoluàn

The incident touched off (or sparked off) a riot.

Man cuts trees at random, finally causing a deplorable consequence --- the sand storm.

暴露思想
bàolù sīxiǎng 
lay bare one\'s thoughts
暴露目标
bàolù mùbiāo 
give away one\'s position
暴露在光天化日之下
bàolù zài guāngtiānhuàrì zhīxià 
be exposed to the light of day
我要把他们的伪善面貌暴露在光天化日之下。
Wǒ yào bǎ tāmen de wěishàn miànmào bàolù zài guāngtiānhuàrì zhī xià。
I\'ll expose their hypocrisy to the light of the day.
由于有人揭秘，丑闻才暴露于光天化日之下。
Yóuyú yǒurén jiēmì，chǒuwén cái bàolù yú guāngtiānhuàrì zhī xià。
The scandal did not see the light of day until somebody disclosed some secret dealings.
他们推三阻四，正好暴露了他们做贼心虚。
Tāmen tuīsānzǔsì，zhènghǎo bàolù le tāmen zuòzéi xīnxū。
In making so many excuses, they revealed their own guilty conscience.
这部暴露文学确实凸现了一些社会现实问题。
Zhè bùbàolù wénxué quèshí tūxiàn le yìxiē shèhuì xiànshí wèntí。
This literary work is revealing. It exposes some serious social problems.
人们见多了穿着暴露的女孩，如今再看到已经是见怪不怪了。
Rénmen jiànduō le chuānzháo bàolù de nǚhái，rújīn zài kàndào yǐjing shì jiànguài búguài le。
Today, people are longer surprised by girls who wear little in public.
作弊抄袭的事情一经暴露，立刻使他名誉扫地。
Zuòbì chāoxí de shìqing yìjīng bàolù，lìkè shǐ tā míngyù sǎodì。
The disclosure of cheating, and plagiary discredited him thoroughly.
与韩国队的比赛中，中国足球队员暴露了自身体能上的弱点。
Yǔ Hánguóduì de bǐsài zhōng，Zhōngguó zúqiú duìyuán bàolù le zìshēn tǐnéng shàng de ruòdiǎn。
The match against the Korean team exposed the Chinese footballers\' weakness in physique.
长时间暴露在阳光下，我的后背都有些脱皮了。
Chángshíjiān bàolù zài yángguāng xià，wǒ de hòubèi dōu yǒuxiē tuōpí le。
Long exposure to the sun made my back peel.
一看到那只兔子，笼中老虎的野性立刻暴露无遗。
Yí kàndào nàzhī tùzi，lóng zhōng lǎohǔ de yěxìng lìkè bàolù wúyí。
At the sight of that rabbit, the caged tiger could not help but show its wild nature.

to expose o.s.
[法] 性暴露
to come {or} be brought to light
[fact，information+] 暴露
to be unprotected from sth
未经保护地暴露于某物
A serious problem of food security emerged after the flood.
洪水过后，食品安全的严重问题就暴露了出来。

性暴露电影激起了他的性欲。

多数物质如果长期暴露于空气中或者长期埋藏于土地中，都会腐烂。
Even a casual inspection of the project reveals many mistakes.
Jíshǐ shì duì zhège xiàngmù suíyì de yí cì jiǎnchá，jiù bàolù chū hěn duō wèntí。

Dòuzhēng de jiéguǒ jiāng huì shì bàolì de 、pòhuàixìng de。
斗争的结果将会是暴力的、破坏性的。
I skipped it because it was too much aggro.
Wǒ zhīsuǒyǐ tiàoguò tā shì yīnwèi tā tài bàolì le。
我之所以跳过它是因为它太暴力了。
The government was overthrown nonviolently, but the dictator was killed.
Zhège zhèngfǔ bèi yǐ fēibàolì de xíngshì tuīfānle，dànshì dúcáizhě què bèi shā le。
这个政府被以非暴力的形式推翻了，但是独裁者却被杀了。
I horripilate when I see violence on television.
Zài diànshì shàng kàndào bàolì chǎngmiàn shí，wǒ gǎndào máogǔsǒngrán。
在电视上看到暴力场面时，我感到毛骨悚然。
The spanish ships had superior speed and weatherliness.

seek exorbitant profits; reap staggering (or colossal) profits

xītú móuqǔ bàolì 
go after quick profits
他们在高档黄金饰品中掺假以牟取暴利。

They adulterated the high-quality gold ornaments to reap fabulous profits.
这些犯罪分子以猎杀野生动物获取暴利。

These criminals obtain huge profits from hunting, and killing wild animals.
犯罪分子靠偷猎藏羚羊来牟取暴利。

Criminals earn colossal profits by stealthily poaching antelope.

He made enormous profits by dishonest methods.
暴饮暴食对健康不利，也容易发胖啊。

Binge-eating is bad for one\'s health. Besides, it will make you fat.

His stoppage of the flow resulted in a flood.

由于他拦阻水流而导致了洪水暴发。

A serious problem of food security emerged after the flood.
洪水过后，食品安全的严重问题就暴露了出来。
这次暗访一定要把社会的阴暗面全部暴光。
Zhècì ànfǎng yídìng yào bǎ shèhuì de yīnànmiàn quánbùbàoguāng。
The secret enquiry this time is aimed at completely exposing the underside of society.
暴露在光天化日之下
bàolù zài guāngtiānhuàrì zhīxià 
be exposed to the light of day
我要把他们的伪善面貌暴露在光天化日之下。
Wǒ yào bǎ tāmen de wěishàn miànmào bàolù zài guāngtiānhuàrì zhī xià。
I\'ll expose their hypocrisy to the light of the day.
由于有人揭秘，丑闻才暴露于光天化日之下。
Yóuyú yǒurén jiēmì，chǒuwén cái bàolù yú guāngtiānhuàrì zhī xià。
The scandal did not see the light of day until somebody disclosed some secret dealings.
长时间暴露在阳光下，我的后背都有些脱皮了。
Chángshíjiān bàolù zài yángguāng xià，wǒ de hòubèi dōu yǒuxiē tuōpí le。
Long exposure to the sun made my back peel.
His face was browned by exposure to the Syrian sun.
Zài Xùlìyà yángguāng de bàoshài xià，tā de liǎn biàn hēi le。
在叙利亚阳光的暴晒下，他的脸变黑了。
I was sitting on the beach, with my back exposed to the sun.

我坐在海滩上，我的背部暴露在阳光下。
Too much sun is harmful to the skin.

在阳光下暴晒对皮肤有害。
They anticipated a thunderstorm as the sun was shining.

a rags-to-riches story
从赤贫到暴富的故事

遇上暴风雨
yùshàng bàofēngyǔ 
be caught in a storm
渔船于暴风雨中沉没。
Yúchuán yú bàofēngyǔ zhōng chénmò。
The fishing boat foundered in a hurricane.
暴风雨快要来了，鸟儿都躲藏起来。

As the storm approached, the birds were seeking shelter.
暴风雨快来了，你还是赶紧跑吧！
Bàofēngyǔ kuài lái le，nǐ háishi gǎnjǐn pǎo ba！
A storm is coming up. You\'d better cut and run.
日内将有一场暴风雨。
Rìnèi jiāng yǒu yìcháng bàofēngyǔ。

暴风雨停息了。
Bàofēngyǔ tíngxī le。
The storm has subsided.

Bàofēngyǔ xíjuǎn dàcǎoyuán。
A blizzard swept across the prairie.
响雷了，暴风雨快来了。
Xiǎngléi le，bàofēngyǔ kuài lái le。
It\'s thundering. There\'s a storm coming on.
暴风雨眼看就要来了。
Bàofēngyǔ yǎnkàn jiùyào lái le。
The storm will start any moment.
今夜有暴风雨，渔民们已经将船停入了避风港。
Jīnyè yǒu bàofēngyǔ，yúmínmen yǐjing jiāng chuán tíngrù le bìfēnggǎng。
The fishermen have already put their boats in the shelter, because there is going to be a tempest tonight.
风势不小，看这样子暴风雨就要来临了！
Fēngshì bùxiǎo，kàn zhè yàngzi bàofēngyǔ jiùyào láilín le！
The wind is so strong! It looks like a storm is coming.
暴风雨的海面上，小船在巨浪间忽隐忽现。
Bàofēngyǔ de hǎimiàn shàng，xiǎochuán zài jùlàng jiān hūyǐn hūxiàn。
On the stormy ocean, the little boat was hardly discernible among the waves.
暴风雨来临，激浪猛烈地敲打船梢。

A storm has come and surging waves are beating against the rudder end of the boat.

How could such a tender bud survive the thunderstorm?
暴风雨使货船偏离了主航道。
Bàofēngyǔ shǐ huòchuán piānlí le zhǔhángdào。
The storm has driven the cargo ship off of its main course.
在钻井平台上工作的工人要注意暴风雨的袭击。
Zài zuànjǐng píngtái shàng gōngzuò de gōngrén yào zhùyì bàofēngyǔ de xíjī。
Workers working on the drilling platform should be careful about storms.
突如其来的暴风雨使我恐惧万分。

在暴风雨季，这东西被用作喷管来排水。

Bàofēngyǔ zài gāokōng zhōng sìnuèzhe，diànshǎn zhàoliàngle hǎimiàn hé lùdì。
暴风雨在高空中肆虐着，电闪照亮了海面和陆地。
There is a legend in Greek mythology about an old sailor who was piloting his ship through the rough waters of a stormy sea.
Xīlà shénhuà zhōng yǒu gè chuánshuō shì guānyú yí gè lǎo shuǐshǒu zài bàofēngyǔ de hǎishàng jià chuán chuānyuè bōtāoxiōngyǒng de dàhǎi de gùshi。
希腊神话中有个传说是关于一个老水手在暴风雨的海上驾船穿越波涛汹涌的大海的故事。
All she has to do is ride out the occasional storm.
Tā suǒyào zuò de quánbù jiùshì jīngshòu zhù ǒurán de bàofēngyǔ。
她所要做的全部就是经受住偶然的暴风雨。

There was a lull in the storm.

It was storming all night.
Bàofēngyǔ yìwǎnshàng dōu méi tíng。
暴风雨一晚上都没停。
If it storms，we\'ll need shelter.
Rúguǒ láile bàofēngyǔ，wǒmen jiù xūyào zhǎo dìfang duǒbì yíxià。
如果来了暴风雨，我们就需要找地方躲避一下。
In stormy weather the stars are out of sight.
Zài bàofēngyǔ de tiānqì xià xīngxing dōu kàn bú jiàn le。
在暴风雨的天气下星星都看不见了。
The storm left a wake of badly damaged buildings.
Bàofēngyǔ shǐ jiànzhùwù yánzhòng shòusǔn。

暴风雨过后，小船漂浮着。

The basement was inundated after the storm.
Bàofēngyǔ zhīhòu，dìxiàshì zāo shuǐyān le。
暴风雨之后，地下室遭水淹了。
The sudden storm immobilized the traffic.
Bùqī\'érzhì de bàofēngyǔ shǐ jiāotōng xiànrù tānhuàn。
不期而至的暴风雨使交通陷入瘫痪。
The storm abated.
Bàofēngyǔ jiǎnruò le。
暴风雨减弱了。
A tempest swept over the island.
Yí zhèn bàofēngyǔ xíguò xiǎodǎo。
一阵暴风雨袭过小岛。
a bad storm
狂风暴雨
a fierce storm

the fury of a storm

inclement weather

The rushing wind and rain dashed against the thick stone walls.
Kuángfēngbàoyǔ zhuàngjīzhe hòuhòu de shíqiáng。
狂风暴雨撞击着厚厚的石墙。
The tackle on the boat was badly damaged after the storm.

狂风暴雨之后，船上的帆具与绳索遭到了严重的损坏。

Zài yì tiān de kuángfēngbàoyǔ hòu，wǒ yǐjīng chéngle luòtāngjī。
在一天的狂风暴雨后，我已经成了落汤鸡。
Outside a storm raged; rain lashed against the windows.
Chuāngwài kuángfēngbàoyǔ，yǔshuǐ qiāodǎzhe chuānghu。
窗外狂风暴雨，雨水敲打着窗户。
The violent windstorms are frequently accompanied by rain, snow, or hail.
强烈的风暴经常伴随雨、雪或冰雹。
暴风雪铺天盖地而来。
Bàofēngxuě pūtiāngàidì érlái。
The blizzard blotted out the sky and the earth.
这场暴风雪殃及数千牧民。
Zhèchǎng bàofēngxuě yāngjí shù qiān mùmín。
The snowstorm was a disaster to thousands of herdsmen.
这么大的暴风雪，是近五年来所仅见的。

It is the severest snow storm in the last five years.
这场暴风雪来头不善，要作好防灾准备。

狂暴的风雪持续了一天。
The airport was closed because of the heavy snow storm.
由于暴风雪的影响，机场被迫关闭了。
I wouldn\'t have braved the storm to come here if I didn\'t love you so much.
若非深爱着你，我才不会冒着暴风雪来到这里。

暴风雪使这个城镇遭受了严重损毁。
Snowstorms are common during winter.
暴风雪在冬天是常见的。
It was terribly cold weather, a blizzard in fact.
天气异常冷，事实上，是暴风雪。

Cows were strawed to weather the snowstorm.

暴风雨般的掌声
bàofēngyǔ bān de zhǎngshēng 
stormy (or thunderous) applause
遇上暴风雨
yùshàng bàofēngyǔ 
be caught in a storm
其势如暴风骤雨
qí shì rú bàofēngzhòuyǔ 
with the force of a hurricane
渔船于暴风雨中沉没。
Yúchuán yú bàofēngyǔ zhōng chénmò。
The fishing boat foundered in a hurricane.
暴风雨快要来了，鸟儿都躲藏起来。
Bàofēngyǔ kuàiyào lái le，niǎor dōu duǒcáng qǐlái。
As the storm approached, the birds were seeking shelter.
暴风雨快来了，你还是赶紧跑吧！
Bàofēngyǔ kuài lái le，nǐ háishi gǎnjǐn pǎo ba！

暴风雨停息了。

Bàofēngyǔ xíjuǎn dàcǎoyuán。

响雷了，暴风雨快来了。
Xiǎngléi le，bàofēngyǔ kuài lái le。

暴风雨眼看就要来了。
Bàofēngyǔ yǎnkàn jiùyào lái le。

这场暴风雪殃及数千牧民。

The snowstorm was a disaster to thousands of herdsmen.
今夜有暴风雨，渔民们已经将船停入了避风港。

The fishermen have already put their boats in the shelter, because there is going to be a tempest tonight.
风势不小，看这样子暴风雨就要来临了！

The wind is so strong! It looks like a storm is coming.

On the stormy ocean, the little boat was hardly discernible among the waves.
暴风雨来临，激浪猛烈地敲打船梢。

The sailors decided to tack their direction due to the storm.

The coming storm is stirring fear in the community.

即将到来的暴风雨正在挑起公众的恐惧。
The remainder were driven back by a violent storm to the village.
Cányú bùfen bèi yízhèn bàofēng juàn huíle cūnzi lǐ。
残余部分被一阵暴风卷回了村子里。

他们走的很慢，对即将到来的暴风雨毫无察觉。

The storm battered up our boat pretty badly.

在暴风雨季，这东西被用作喷管来排水。
Electrical storms raged in the clouds, bombarding the land and the sea with lightning.
Bàofēngyǔ zài gāokōng zhōng sìnuèzhe，diànshǎn zhàoliàngle hǎimiàn hé lùdì。
暴风雨在高空中肆虐着，电闪照亮了海面和陆地。

希腊神话中有个传说是关于一个老水手在暴风雨的海上驾船穿越波涛汹涌的大海的故事。

Tā suǒyào zuò de quánbù jiùshì jīngshòu zhù ǒurán de bàofēngyǔ。
她所要做的全部就是经受住偶然的暴风雨。
A high tension wire，brought down by a storm，can continue to spark.
Bèi bàofēng chuīduàn de gāoyāxiàn kěnéng huì búduàn de mào huǒxīng。
被暴风吹断的高压线可能会不断地冒火星。
The trees were cleaned of apples by the storm.
Shùshàng de píngguǒ yīn bàofēngyǔ ér quánbù diàoluò xiàlái。
树上的苹果因暴风雨而全部掉落下来。
There was a lull in the storm.
Bàofēngyǔ tíngle yīhuìr yòu kāishǐ le。
暴风雨停了一会儿又开始了。
Cows were strawed to weather the snowstorm.

给牛群铺上草以抵御暴风雪。

暴风雨击倒了输电干线。
It was storming all night.
Bàofēngyǔ yìwǎnshàng dōu méi tíng。
暴风雨一晚上都没停。
If it storms，we\'ll need shelter.
Rúguǒ láile bàofēngyǔ，wǒmen jiù xūyào zhǎo dìfang duǒbì yíxià。
如果来了暴风雨，我们就需要找地方躲避一下。
Trying to drive through a blizzard is the height of folly.
