试图驾车穿越暴风雪简直是荒唐之极。
In stormy weather the stars are out of sight.

在暴风雨的天气下星星都看不见了。
The storm left a wake of badly damaged buildings.

The storm abated.
Bàofēngyǔ jiǎnruò le。
暴风雨减弱了。
A tempest swept over the island.
Yí zhèn bàofēngyǔ xíguò xiǎodǎo。
一阵暴风雨袭过小岛。

The storm wasn\'t long but it was a snorter.

Because of overindulgence in food and drink, he is  really fat now.
经常暴饮暴食对消化道有不良影响。
Jīngcháng bàoyǐn bàoshí duì xiāohuàdào yǒu bùliáng yǐngxiǎng。
Often eating and drinking too much is bad for the digestive system.
经常暴饮暴食使他的体重增至200斤。
Jīngcháng bàoyǐn bàoshí shǐ tā de tǐzhòng zēngzhì èrbǎijīn。
His weight increased to 200 jin, because he eats and drinks too much at each meal.
暴风雨般的掌声
bàofēngyǔ bān de zhǎngshēng 
stormy (or thunderous) applause
脾气暴
píqi bào 
have a hot temper
急得头上的青筋都暴出来了
jí dé tóu shàng de qīngjīn dōu bào chūlái le
be so agitated that the veins on one\'s forehead stand out
得暴病
dé bàobìng 
be suddenly seized with a severe illness
暴病而死
bàobìng érsǐ
die of a sudden illness
股票价格暴跌。
Gǔpiào jiàgé bàodiē。
There was a slump in share prices.
举行暴动
jǔxíng bàodòng 
raise an insurrection; stage a riot
山洪暴发。
Shānhóngbàofā。
Torrents of water rushed down the mountain.
暴发户
bàofāhù 
upstart
遇上暴风雨
yùshàng bàofēngyǔ 
be caught in a storm
其势如暴风骤雨
qí shì rú bàofēngzhòuyǔ 
with the force of a hurricane
暴力行为
bàolì xíngwéi 
an act of violence
电影里的暴力镜头
diànyǐng lǐ de bàolì jìngtóu 
violence (or violent scenes) shown in films
暴力革命
bàolì gémìng 
violent revolution
性情暴烈
xìngqíng bàoliè 
have a fiery temper
暴露思想
bàolù sīxiǎng 
lay bare one\'s thoughts
暴露目标
bàolù mùbiāo 
give away one\'s position
暴露在光天化日之下
bàolù zài guāngtiānhuàrì zhīxià 
be exposed to the light of day
气得暴跳如雷
qì de bàotiàorúléi 
stamp frantically in anger
他暴跳如雷地发了一顿脾气。
Tā bàotiàorúléi de fā le yídùn píqi。
He stormed and raged in a fit of temper.
下了一阵暴雨。
Xià le yízhèn bàoyǔ。
There was a heavy downpour.
脾气暴躁
píqi bàozào 
be irritable by nature; be hot-tempered
河水暴涨。
Héshuǐ bàozhǎng。
The river suddenly rose.
物价暴涨。
Wùjià bàozhǎng。
Prices soared (or skyrocketed).
惨绝人寰的暴行
cǎnjuérénhuán de bàoxíng
an atrocity of unparalleled savagery
渔船于暴风雨中沉没。
Yúchuán yú bàofēngyǔ zhōng chénmò。
The fishing boat foundered in a hurricane.
暴雨成灾。
Bàoyǔ chéngzāi。
The heavy rainstorm caused a disastrous flood.
磁暴记录器
cíbào jìlùqì 
magnetic storm monitor
粗暴的态度
cūbào de tàidu 
a rude attitude
粗暴的行为
cūbào de xíngwéi 
crude behaviour
粗暴地违反国际惯例
cūbào de wéifǎn guójì guànlì 
gross violation of international practice
从暴徒手上夺下刀子
cóng bàotú shǒu shàng duóxià dāozi
wrest a knife from a hooligan
暴风雨快要来了，鸟儿都躲藏起来。
Bàofēngyǔ kuàiyào lái le，niǎor dōu duǒcáng qǐlái。
As the storm approached, the birds were seeking shelter.
渔船厄于风暴。
Yúchuán è yú fēngbào。
The fishing boat was caught in a storm.
过去一下暴雨，这条河就发大水。
Guòqù yíxià bàoyǔ，zhè tiáo hé jiù fādàshuǐ。
This river used to get flooded whenever there was a rainstorm.
海上风暴
hǎi shàngfēngbào
a storm at sea
革命风暴
gémìng fēngbào
the storm of revolution
我要把他们的伪善面貌暴露在光天化日之下。
Wǒ yào bǎ tāmen de wěishàn miànmào bàolù zài guāngtiānhuàrì zhī xià。
I\'ll expose their hypocrisy to the light of the day.
骇人听闻的暴行
hàiréntīngwén de bàoxíng
horrifying atrocities
利用独裁权力横征暴敛
lìyòngdúcái quánlì héngzhēngbàoliǎn
use one\'s dictatorial powers to extort taxes and levies
荒时暴月，他们就向亲友乞哀告怜。
Huāngshíbàoyuè，tāmen jiù xiàng qīnyǒu qǐ\'āigàolián。
In hard times, they piteously beg help from relatives and friends.
火暴性子
huǒbào xìngzi 
a hot temper
牡丹开得真火暴。
Mǔdān kāi de zhēn huǒbào。
The peonies are in full bloom.
这出戏的场面很火暴。
Zhè chū xì de chǎngmiàn hěn huǒbào。
The play is full of action and excitement.
获取暴利
huòqǔ bàolì 
reap staggering (or colossal) profits
种族主义者的暴行激怒了人民。
Zhǒngzúzhǔyìzhě de bàoxíngjīnù le rénmín。
The atrocities committed by the racists enraged the people.
他们在海上遇上了大风暴，至今尚无消息，吉凶未卜。
Tāmen zài hǎi shàngyùshàng le dà fēngbào，zhì jīn shàngwú xiāoxi，jíxiōngwèi bǔ。
They\'ve met with a storm at sea, and we haven\'t had any news of them yet. Their fate is still unknown.
这场农民运动如急风暴雨，势不可挡。
Zhè chángnóngmín yùndòngrú jífēngbàoyǔ，shìbùkědǎng。
This peasant movement carried all before it like a hurricane.
狂风夹着暴雨
kuángfēngjiā zhe bàoyǔ 
a violent wind accompanied by a torrential rain
简单粗暴
jiǎndān cūbào 
do things in an oversimplified and crude way
由于有人揭秘，丑闻才暴露于光天化日之下。
Yóuyú yǒurén jiēmì，chǒuwén cái bàolù yú guāngtiānhuàrì zhī xià。
The scandal did not see the light of day until somebody disclosed some secret dealings.
攫取暴利
juéqǔ bàolì
rake in exorbitant profits
狂暴的山洪
kuángbào de shānhóng
raging mountain torrents
他们向敌人展开了狂风暴雨似的攻击。
Tāmen xiàng dírén zhǎnkāi le kuángfēngbàoyǔ shì de gōngjī。
They launched a furious whirlwind attack on the enemy.
灭绝人性的暴行
mièjué rénxìng de bàoxíng
inhuman atrocities
牟取暴利
móuqǔ bàolì 
seek exorbitant profits; reap staggering (or colossal) profits
他只是脾气暴躁些，并不难处。
Tā zhǐshì píqi bàozào xiē，bìngbùnán chǔ。
He\'s a bit quick-tempered, but not difficult to get along with.
暴风雨快来了，你还是赶紧跑吧！
Bàofēngyǔ kuài lái le，nǐ háishi gǎnjǐn pǎo ba！
A storm is coming up. You\'d better cut and run.
平息暴乱
píngxī bàoluàn
put down a riot
暴风雪铺天盖地而来。
Bàofēngxuě pūtiāngàidì érlái。
The blizzard blotted out the sky and the earth.
不畏强暴敢于斗争的英雄气概
búwèi qiángbào gǎnyú dòuzhēng de yīngxióngqìgài
the heroic spirit of daring to struggle against brute force
河水可能暴涨，得立即抢渡。
Héshuǐ kěnéngbàozhǎng，děi lìjí qiǎngdù。
The river may suddenly rise. We must make a swift crossing immediately.
他额角上暴起了青筋。
Tā éjiǎo shàng bàoqǐ le qīngjīn。
Blue veins stood out on his temples.
日内将有一场暴风雨。
Rìnèi jiāng yǒu yìcháng bàofēngyǔ。
There will be a heavy storm in a day or two.
煽动暴乱
shāndòngbàoluàn
incite rebellion
倏然一阵暴雨。
Shūrán yízhèn bàoyǔ。
A rainstorm came on suddenly.
暴风雨停息了。
Bàofēngyǔ tíngxī le。
The storm has subsided.
希图牟取暴利
xītú móuqǔ bàolì 
go after quick profits
暴风雨席卷大草原。
Bàofēngyǔ xíjuǎn dàcǎoyuán。
A blizzard swept across the prairie.
响雷了，暴风雨快来了。
Xiǎngléi le，bàofēngyǔ kuài lái le。
It\'s thundering. There\'s a storm coming on.
性情暴躁
xìngqíngbàozào
have an irascible temperament; be short-tempered
暴雨过后，整个村子的地都被水淹了。
Bàoyǔ guòhòu，zhěnggè cūnzi de dì dōu bèi shuǐ yān le。
The heavy rains flooded all the fields of the village.
暴风雨眼看就要来了。
Bàofēngyǔ yǎnkàn jiùyào lái le。
The storm will start any moment.
这场暴风雪殃及数千牧民。
Zhèchǎng bàofēngxuě yāngjí shù qiān mùmín。
The snowstorm was a disaster to thousands of herdsmen.
那个事件引发了一场暴乱。
Nàge shìjiàn yǐnfā le yìcháng bàoluàn。
The incident touched off (or sparked off) a riot.
暴日的蒸烤
bàorì de zhēngkǎo 
scorching sun
他们推三阻四，正好暴露了他们做贼心虚。
Tāmen tuīsānzǔsì，zhènghǎo bàolù le tāmen zuòzéi xīnxū。
In making so many excuses, they revealed their own guilty conscience.
残暴
cánbào
cruel and ferocious; brutal; savage
自暴自弃
zìbàozìqì
give oneself up as hopeless; have no urge to make progress; be resigned to one\'s backwardness
除暴安良
chúbào\'ānliáng
get rid of bullies and bring peace to good people
暴虐
bàonüè
brutal; tyrannical
他脾气火暴。
Tā píqì huŏbào。
市场很火暴。
Shìchǎng hĕnhuŏbào。
火暴的场面只存在了一小会儿。
Huŏbào de chǎngmiàn zhǐ cúnzàile yìxiǎohuìr。
某球员暴毙球场，让人惊讶和意外。
Mǒu qiúyuán bàobì qiúchǎng，ràng rén jīngyà hé yìwài。
A footballer died suddenly on the field, which shocked millions of people.
他是个不折不扣的暴发户。
Tā shì gè bùzhébúkòu de bàofāhù。
He is a complete upstart.
他冲着那帮匪徒暴吼一声。
Tā chòng zhe nà bāng fěitú bàohǒu yìshēng。
He shouted at the gangsters with fury.
真正的强者不是暴虎冯河，而是审时度势。
Zhēnzhèng de qiángzhě búshì bàohǔfénghé，ér shì shěnshíduóshì。
A really strong player is not just brawn but no brain.
这样的暴力游戏对孩子的成长不利。
Zhèyàng de bàolì yóuxì duì háizi de chéngzhǎng búlì。
Such violent games are not good for children\'s development.
封建政府长期横征暴敛激起百姓的反抗。
Fēngjiàn zhèngfǔ chángqī héngzhēng bàoliǎn jīqǐ bǎixìng de fǎnkàng。
The collection of illegal fees on the part of the feudal government let to fierce objections from the public.
这部暴露文学确实凸现了一些社会现实问题。
Zhè bùbàolù wénxué quèshí tūxiàn le yìxiē shèhuì xiànshí wèntí。
This literary work is revealing. It exposes some serious social problems.
他给我讲了一个最近暴热的笑话。
Tā gěi wǒ jiǎng le yígè zuìjìn bàorè de xiàohuà。
The joke he just told me has been very popular recently.
长时间的户外暴晒，对皮肤和头发都不好。
Chángshíjiān de hùwài bàoshài，duì pífū hé tóufa dōu bùhǎo。
Exposing to the sun for a long time is bad for both the skin and hair.
战争年代，暴尸野外的无名小卒不计其数。
Zhànzhēng niándài，bàoshī yěwài de wúmíng xiǎozú bújìqíshù。
In the wartime, countless unnamed soldiers died on the battlefield.
小狗突然暴死，我们都很心疼。
Xiǎogǒu tūrán bàosǐ，wǒmen dōu hěnxīnténg。
The little dog died without any warning, breaking our hearts.
得知这个消息，他暴跳起来。
Dézhī zhège xiāoxi，tā bàotiào qǐlái。
He jumped up to the ceiling on hearing the news.
他瘦瘦的胳膊上青筋暴突。
Tā shòushòu de gēbo shàng qīngjīn bàotū。
His bony arm is roped with prominent veins.
你应该改一改自己的暴性子了。
Nǐ yīnggāi gǎiyigǎi zìjǐ de bàoxìngzi le。
You should think about changing your hot temper.
这份笔供揭露了侵略者的暴行。
Zhè fèn bǐgòng jiēlòu le qīnlüèzhě de bàoxíng。
His written confession discloses the ferocity of the invaders.
人们主张为遭受家庭暴力的妇女设立庇护所。
Rénmen zhǔzhāng wèi zāoshòu jiātíng bàolì de fùnǚ shèlì bìhùsuǒ。
People suggest that care centers should be established for women who suffer from domestic violence.
今夜有暴风雨，渔民们已经将船停入了避风港。
Jīnyè yǒu bàofēngyǔ，yúmínmen yǐjing jiāng chuán tíngrù le bìfēnggǎng。
The fishermen have already put their boats in the shelter, because there is going to be a tempest tonight.
他们在高档黄金饰品中掺假以牟取暴利。
Tāmen zài gāodàng huángjīn shìpǐn zhōng chānjiǎ yǐ móuqǔ bàolì。
They adulterated the high-quality gold ornaments to reap fabulous profits.
像他这样集残暴和可耻于一身，实在是我们社会的丑类。
Xiàng tā zhèyàng jí cánbào hé kěchǐ yú yìshēn，shízai shì wǒmen shèhuì de chǒulèi。
A person like him who is the combination of cruelty and disgrace is really villain in our society.
国家对于沙尘暴的治理已经初见成效。
Guójiā duìyú shāchénbào de zhìlǐ yǐjing chūjiàn chéngxiào。
The country\'s measures to prevent sandstorms have begun to show their effects.
在正午太阳的暴晒下锄禾，农民的汗水都滴落在泥土上。
Zài zhèngwǔ tàiyáng de bàoshài xià chúhé，nóngmín de hànshuǐ dōu dīluò zài nítǔ shàng。
Working in the standing grain field under the midday sun, the farmer\'s sweat dropped down to the earth.
北方的春城景色虽美，但经常有沙尘暴。
Běifāng de chūnchéng jǐngsè suī měi，dàn jīngcháng yǒu shāchénbào。
Though spring cities in the north are very beautiful, sand storms strike there frequently.
今年春上的沙尘暴很严重。
Jīnnián chūnshàng de shāchénbào hěnyánzhòng。
The sand storms are very serious this spring.
这场大暴雨来得可真突然。
Zhèchǎng dàbàoyǔ lái de kě zhēn tūrán。
The heavy downpour took people by surprise.
连日暴雨使大水有漫过堤围的危险。
Liánrì bàoyǔ shǐ dàshuǐ yǒu mànguò dīwéi de wēixiǎn。
Continuous rainstorms might cause the flood to overflow the bank.
明天东瀛海域将有一场热带风暴。
Míngtiān dōngyíng hǎiyù jiāng yǒu yìcháng rèdài fēngbào。
There is going to be a tropical storm in the East China sea.
刚才明明还是晴天，俄而暴雨骤降。
Gāngcái míngmíng háishi qíngtiān，é\'ér bàoyǔ zhòujiàng。
It was sunny just now, and the next moment a rainstorm came.
暴雨过后，天际出现了一抹飞虹。
Bàoyǔ guòhòu，tiānjì chūxiàn le yìmǒ fēihóng。
A rainbow presented itself after the storm.
风势不小，看这样子暴风雨就要来临了！
Fēngshì bùxiǎo，kàn zhè yàngzi bàofēngyǔ jiùyào láilín le！
The wind is so strong! It looks like a storm is coming.
暴力影片会给孩子的成长带来负面作用。
Bàolì yǐngpiàn huì gěi háizi de chéngzhǎng dàilái fùmiàn zuòyòng。
Violent movies have an unfavorable influence on children.
造成沙尘暴的主要原因是地面覆被严重破坏。
Zàochéng shāchénbào de zhǔyào yuányīn shì dìmiàn fùbèi yánzhòng pòhuài。
The main cause of sand storms is that vegetation has been badly damaged.
植草固沙是防止沙尘暴的有效措施。
Zhícǎo gùshā shì fángzhǐ shāchénbào de yǒuxiào cuòshī。
Planting grass and fixing the sand is an effective way of preventing sand storms.
故态难改，他还是那样暴躁。
Gùtài nángǎi，tā háishì nàyàng bàozào。
As it is hard to change old attitudes, he is as hot-tempered as he used to be.
他的业务能力过得硬，只是脾气有点暴躁。
Tā de yèwù nénglì guòdéyìng，zhǐshì píqi yǒu diǎn bàozào。
He has first-rate professional competence, but also a volcanic temper.
他脾气暴躁，动不动就呵叱别人。
Tā píqi bàozào，dòngbudòng jiù hēchì biérén。
He has an explosive temper, and always yells at others.
暴风雨的海面上，小船在巨浪间忽隐忽现。
Bàofēngyǔ de hǎimiàn shàng，xiǎochuán zài jùlàng jiān hūyǐn hūxiàn。
On the stormy ocean, the little boat was hardly discernible among the waves.
华南地区最近普降暴雨，灾情严重。
Huánán dìqū zuìjìn pǔjiàng bàoyǔ，zāiqíng yánzhòng。
Recently, areas in South China are generally suffering from rainstorms, and the situation is very serious.
由于刮起了沙尘暴，整个城市黄沙漫天。
Yóuyú guāqǐ le shāchénbào，zhěnggè chéngshì huángshā màntiān。
Because of the sweep of the sandstorm, sand was all over the sky of the entire city.
暴风雨来临，激浪猛烈地敲打船梢。
Bàofēngyǔ láilín，jīlàng měngliè de qiāodǎ chuánshāo。
A storm has come and surging waves are beating against the rudder end of the boat.
他性格急暴但心地善良，是个大好人。
Tā xìnggé jíbào dàn xīndì shànliáng，shì gè dàhǎorén。
Although short-tempered, he is a good person who is full of kindness.
面对当权者的暴行，他大声疾呼大家起来反抗。
Miànduì dāngquánzhě de bàoxíng，tā dàshēng jíhū dàjiā qǐlái fǎnkàng。
Faced with the rulers\' atrocities, he called on the public to revolt.
人们见多了穿着暴露的女孩，如今再看到已经是见怪不怪了。
Rénmen jiànduō le chuānzháo bàolù de nǚhái，rújīn zài kàndào yǐjing shì jiànguài búguài le。
Today, people are longer surprised by girls who wear little in public.
我那个脾气暴躁的好友就要来了，大家准备接驾。
Wǒ nàge píqi bàozào de hǎoyǒu jiùyào lái le，dàjiā zhǔnbèi jiējià。
An ill-tempered friend of mine is coming to see me, let\'s get ready to receive him.
这么大的暴风雪，是近五年来所仅见的。
Zhème dà de bàofēngxuě，shì jìn wǔ nián lái suǒ jǐnjiàn de。
It is the severest snow storm in the last five years.
连日来，江苏省境内普降暴雨。
Liánrì lái，Jiāngsū Shěng jìngnèi pǔjiàng bàoyǔ。
The rainstorm occurred over much of Jiangsu Province for several days.
春节期间，铁路、公路、航空的客运量全都暴增。
Chūnjié qījiān，tiělù、gōnglù、hángkōng de kèyùnliàng quándōu bàozēng。
During Spring Festival, passenger transport volume for railways, highways and airways increases rapidly.
人类乱砍滥伐，终于酿成了沙尘暴这杯苦酒！

lièshì yígǔ

yígǔ

遗嘱将所有财产转让给了各种慈善组织。
A devise is the act of disposing property.
Yízèng shì yì zhǒng chǔlǐ cáichǎn de xíngwéi。
遗赠是一种处理财产的行为。
the residuary clause in a will
遗嘱中关于处理剩余财产的条款
The will provides that each child should receive half of the money.
Yízhǔ guīdìng，měi gè háizi jìchéng zhèxiē cáichǎn de yíbàn。
遗嘱规定，每个孩子继承这些财产的一半。
草案中仍然遗留几个问题。
Cǎo\'àn zhōng réngrán yíliú jǐgè wèntí。
There are still a few points to clear up in the draft.
罪犯作案时遗留下的指纹。
为规范遗嘱继承，各国都建立了遗嘱继承法。
Wèi guīfàn yízhǔ jìchéng，gèguó dōu jiànlì le yízhǔ jìchéngfǎ。
In order to standardize inheritance by will, every country has formulated an inheritance act.
把他的遗骸送回去安葬。
Bǎ tā de yíhái sònghuíqù ānzàng。
escort his remains back to his home town for burial
《文选》补遗
《Wénxuǎn》 bǔyí 
Supplement to the Wenxuan (a book title)
不胜遗憾
búshèngyíhàn 
be very sorry; much to one\'s regret
道不拾遗，夜不闭户。
Dàobùshíyí，yèbúbìhù。
People do not take any articles left by the wayside and doors are not bolted at night.
凡属我国文化遗产中有用的东西，都应当继承。
Fán shǔ wǒguó wénhuà yíchǎn zhōng yǒuyòng de dōngxi，dōu yīngdāng jìchéng。
All of our cultural heritage which is useful should be inherited.
这件事结局没想到是这样，我真感到遗憾。
Zhèjiànshì jiéjú méi xiǎngdào shì zhèyàng，wǒ zhēn gǎndào yíhàn。
I never thought it would turn out this way. I do regret it.
向遗体告别
xiàng yítǐ gàobié
pay one\'s last respects to the deceased
遗像前供着鲜花。
Yí xiàng qián gòng zhe xiānhuā。
Fresh flowers were laid out before the portrait of the deceased.
脑震荡后遗症
nǎozhèndànghòuyízhèng
sequelae of cerebral concussion

Fūqī yǒu xiānghù jìchéngyíchǎn de quánlì。
Husband and wife have the right to inherit each other\'s property.

lì yízhǔ

qiāngǔ yíhèn

身败名裂，遗臭万年
Shēnbàimíngliè，yíchòuwànnián
bring ruin and eternal shame on oneself
她深情地望着她母亲的遗像。
Tā shēnqíng de wàng zhe tā mǔqīn de yí xiàng。
She gazed with deep feeling at the portrait of her deceased mother.
《本草纲目拾遗》
《Běncǎo Gāngmù Shíyí》
Supplementary Amplifications of the &quot;Compendium of Materia Medica&quot;
继承文化遗产要吸取精华，剔除糟粕
Jìchéngwénhuà yíchǎn yào xīqǔ jīnghuá，tīchú zāopò。

yíchòuwànnián

文化遗址

荡涤旧社会遗留下来的污泥浊水

破坏无遗
pòhuài wúyí 
be totally destroyed
她遭人遗弃，一时想不开就自杀了。
Tā zāo rén yíqì，yìshí xiǎngbu kāi jiù zìshā le。
She was deserted by her lover, and in despair she took her own life.
爸爸刚咽气，几个子女就争开了遗产。
Bàba gāngyànqì，jǐgè zǐnǚ jiù zhēngkāi le yíchǎn。
No sooner had the father died than the sons and daughters started to quarrel over the inheritance.
留下(继承)遗产
liúxià（jìchéng）yíchǎn

lìshǐ yíchǎn

yíchuán tèzhēng

Zhèxiē shíkè yícún zhì jīn yǐ qiān yú nián。
These stone inscriptions have been in existence for over a thousand years.

kǒnglóng de huàshí yícún 
the fossil remains of a dinosaur

yífàn yóu cún

Tā xuéguò de zhīshi，hěnduō dōu yǐjing yíwàng le。

bùyíyúlì

展柜里这个陶瓷瓶是半坡遗址出土的。
Zhǎnguì lǐ zhège táocípíng shì bànpō yízhǐ chūtǔ de。
The ceramic bottle in the exhibition display was excavated from the Ban Po village remains.
还没等他闭眼，子女们就开始争遗产了。
Hái méi děng tā bìyǎn，zǐnǚmen jiù kāishǐ zhēng yíchǎn le。
His children had started to fight for the legacy before he passed away.
你真是沧海遗珠，栋梁之材呀！
Nǐ zhēnshì cānghǎi yízhū，dòngliáng zhī cái ya！
You are a neglected genius!
这是图纸的底样，一定不能遗失。
Zhè shì túzhǐ de dǐyàng，yídìng bùnéng yíshī。
This is the rough draft of the blueprint and mustn\'t be lost.
敦煌的古烽燧遗迹，诉说着历史的沧桑。
Dūnhuáng de gǔfēngsuì yíjì，sùshuō zhe lìshǐ de cāngsāng。
The ancient beacon fire and smoke relics tell people about the changes of time.
我们去参观了楼兰古国遗址。
Wǒmen qù cānguān le lóulán gǔguó yízhǐ。
We went to visit the ruins of the ancient country of Loulan.
豌豆和果蝇都是常见的遗传学研究对象。
Wāndòu hé guǒyíng dōushì chángjiàn de yíchuánxué yánjiū duì xiàng。
Peas, and fruit flies are traditional objects for genetics study.
父母遗弃了她，是好心人把她养大的。
Fùmǔ yíqì le tā，shì hǎoxīnrén bǎ tā yǎngdà de。
Abandoned by her parents, she was brought up by a kind-hearted person.
桌上的那个号筒是他爷爷的遗物。
Zhuō shàng de nàge hàotǒng shì tā yéye de yíwù。
The bugle on the table is relics from his grandparents age.
核苷酸可参与遗传物质的合成与代谢。
Hégānsuān kě cānyǔ yíchuán wùzhì de héchéng yǔ dàixiè。
Nucleotide takes part in the synthesis, and metabolism of genetic materials.
有些事情是可以遗忘的，有些事情是不需要记念的。
Yǒuxiē shìqing shì kěyǐ yíwàng de，yǒu xiē shìqing shì bùxūyào jìniàn de。
Some things can be forgotten. They don\'t need to be commemorated.
保洁员在草坪上捡拾被人遗漏的垃圾。
Bǎojiéyuán zài cǎopíng shàng jiǎnshí bèi rén yílòu de lājī。
A cleaner is picking up the litter on the lawn.
最后检场的时候一定要收拾干净，不要遗漏什么东西。
Zuìhòu jiǎnchǎng de shíhou yídìng yào shōushi gānjìng，búyào yílòu shénme dōngxi。
Make sure that we leave nothing behind when you tidy up.
教科文组织把我国的昆曲评为“人类口头和非物质文化遗产”。
Jiàokēwén zǔzhī bǎ wǒguó de kūnqǔ píngwéi“rénlèi kǒutóu hé fēiwùzhì wénhuà yíchǎn”。
Kunqu Opera is rated by UNESCO as Oral and Non-material Heritage of Mankind.
古生代的动物现今已鲜有孑遗。
Gǔshēngdài de dòngwù xiànjīn yǐ xiānyǒu jiéyí。
There are few survivors of the animals that lived in the Paleozoic period.
古生物学家发现了距今1亿年的孑遗植物。
Gǔshēngwùxuéjiā fāxiàn le jùjīn yíyìnián de jiéyí zhíwù。
Paleontologists found the living fossils of plants that were one hundred million years old
中国功夫举世无双，是独特的物质文化遗产。
Zhōngguó gōngfu jǔshìwúshuāng，shì dútè de wùzhì wénhuà yíchǎn。
Peerless Chinese Kung fu is a unique material culture heritage.
距今6000-8000年前的裴李岗遗址，曾是我国先民的聚落。
Jùjīn liùqiān-bāqiān niánqián de péilǐgǎng yízhǐ，céngshì wǒguó xiānmín de jùluò。
The Feiligang Ruins, which have a history of 6000-8000 years, used to be a settlement of the ancestors of our country.
那里在古时候曾经是军屯驻地，至今我们还能看到一些相关的遗迹。
Nàlǐ zài gǔshíhou céngjīng shì jūntún zhùdì，zhìjīn wǒmen hái néng kàndào yìxiē xiāngguān de yíjì。
That place used to be a military station in ancient times. We can still see some remains of it now.
令人遗憾的是这块美玉上有一道明显的裂璺。
Lìngrén yíhàn de shì zhèkuài měiyù shàng yǒu yídào míngxiǎn de lièmén。
Unluckily there is a obvious crack on the jade.
寺庙后院的灵塔，存放着这位高僧的遗骨。
Sìmiào hòuyuàn de língtǎ，cúnfàng zhe zhèwèi gāosēng de yígǔ。
Inside the pagoda in the backyard of the temple, there lay the remains of the dignitary.
幸亏有录音遗嘱，他才能胜诉。
Xìngkuī yǒu lùyīn yízhǔ，tā cáinéng shèngsù。
Thanks to the recorded will or won the lawsuit.
昆曲已被联合国教科文组织列入非物质遗产名录。
Kūnqǔ yǐ bèi liánhéguó jiàokēwén zǔzhī lièrù fēiwùzhì yíchǎn mínglù。
Kunqu opera has been listed in the nonmaterial heritage roster by UNESCO.
在福建泉州，至今还能看到古代摩尼教遗迹呢！
Zài Fújiàn Quánzhōu，zhìjīn hái néng kàndào gǔdài móníjiào yíjì ne！
In Quanzhou Fujian Province, relics of ancient Manichaeism still can be seen.
男尊女卑是封建社会遗留下来的思想观念，它错误地认为男人比女人高贵。
Nánzūn nǚbēi shì fēngjiànshèhuì yíliú xiàlái de sīxiǎng guānniàn，tā cuòwù de rènwéi nánrén bǐ nǚrén gāoguì。
The ideology of male domination, and female subordination is handed down from feudal society. It wrongly holds that males are nobler than females.
在这个农耕文明遗址中，考古人员发现了3000年前的农具。
Zài zhège nónggēng wénmíng yízhǐ zhōng，kǎogǔ rényuán fāxiàn le sānqiānniánqián de nóngjù。
In this farming culture site, the archaeologists discovered farm tools from 3000 years ago.
他家那个钱串子，是他爷爷遗留下来的。
Tā jiā nàge qiánchuànzi，shì tā yéye yíliú xiàlái de。
The cash string of his family was left by his grandpa.
这些人防工程都是战争年代遗留下来的。
Zhèxiē rénfáng gōngchéng dōushì zhànzhēng niándài yíliú xiàlái de。
These air defense works were inherited from the war years.
继承了一大笔遗产后他就过上了奢糜的生活。
Jìchéng le yí dàbǐ yíchǎn hòu tā jiù guòshàng le shēmí de shēnghuó。
He began to lead a luxurious life after inheriting a large amount of property.
这部全书尚未完善，还有需要拾遗补缺的地方。
Zhèbù quánshū shàngwèi wánshàn，háiyǒu xūyào shíyí bǔquē de dìfāng。
This book is not complete yet, there is still much to be added.
私分遗产是件很不道德的事，同时也是违法的。
Sīfēn yíchǎn shì jiàn hěnbú dàodé de shì，tóngshí yěshì wéifǎ de。
Privately dividing inheritance is immoral, and illegal at the same time.
我国的寺观庙宇很多都是人文历史遗产，要有步骤地进行保护。
Wǒ guó de sìguān miàoyǔ hěnduō dōushì rénwén lìshǐ yíchǎn，yào yǒu bùzhòu de jìnxíng bǎohù。
Most temples in our country are a cultural and historical inheritance, which should be protected gradually.
这些资料对遗失文化的探赜索隐是非常有价值的。
Zhèxiē zīliào duì yíshī wénhuà de tàn赜 suǒyǐn shì fēicháng yǒu jiàzhí de。
The reference materials are of great value in that they look into the lost culture.
据说，舞蹈症是一种具有家庭遗传性的罕见病症。
Jùshuō，wǔdǎozhèng shì yìzhǒng jùyǒu jiātíng yíchuánxìng de hǎnjiàn bìngzhèng。
It is said that cholera is a rare hereditary disease.
遗传性心脏病很难治愈。
Yíchuánxìng xīnzàngbìng hěn nán zhìyù。
It is hard to treat genetic heart disease.
我们决不可养痈遗患，一定要斩草除根。
Wǒmen jué bùkě yǎngyōng yíhuàn，yídìng yào zhǎncǎo chúgēn。
We can never leave evil unchecked, we must remove the source of the trouble.
她总是野心勃勃地想得到遗产。
Tā zǒngshì yěxīn bóbó de xiǎng dédào yíchǎn。
She is always burning with desire to inherit the legacy.
遗传工程是21世纪最有发展前途的专业之一。
Yíchuán gōngchéng shì èrshíyī shìjì zuì yǒu fāzhǎn qiántú de zhuānyè zhīyī。
Genetic engineering is one of the most promising specialties in the 21st century.
现代人应该注意不能遗落先人的优良传统。
Xiàndàirén yīnggāi zhùyì bùnéng yíluò xiānrén de yōuliáng chuántǒng。
People living in modern times shouldn\'t throw away our ancestor\'s fine traditions.
虽然他翻译了全文，但却遗落了最重要的部分。
Suīrán tā fānyì le quánwén，dàn què yíluò le zuì zhòngyào de bùfēn。
Although he translated the full text, he left out the most important part.
洛丽塔是为数不多的古楼兰国遗民之一。
Luòlìtǎ shì wéishù bùduō de gǔlóulánguó yímín zhīyī。
Lolita is one of the small number of survivors from the country of Loulan.
作为前朝遗民，他总有更多的兴亡之感。
Zuòwéi qiáncháo yímín，tā zǒngyǒu gèngduō de xīngwáng zhī gǎn。
As an adherent of the former dynasty, he always has more feelings about the rise and fall of the country.
老王突发心脏病去世了，他的遗缺至今无人顶替。
Lǎo Wáng tūfā xīnzàngbìng qùshì le，tā de yíquē zhìjīn wúrén dǐngtì。
Lao Wang had a sudden heart attack and died, his vacancy hasn\'t been filled yet.
抢劫犯在慌乱逃窜时把抢来的珠宝遗撒一地。
Qiǎngjiéfàn zài huāngluàn táocuàn shí bǎ qiǎnglái de zhūbǎo yísǎ yí dì。
Stolen jewels littered the floor when the robbers fled in a hurry.
小张的爷爷不喜欢与人交往，有点遗世独立。
Xiǎo Zhāng de yéye bùxǐhuan yǔ rén jiāowǎng，yǒudiǎn yíshì dúlì。
Xiao Zhang\'s grandpa doesn\'t like to be with people, he lives in seclusion.
遗闻说这个地方有野人生存，但科学家们并不相信。
Yíwén shuō zhège dìfāng yǒu yěrén shēngcún，dàn kēxuéjiāmen bìngbùxiāngxìn。
According to old tales, savages live here, but scientists don\'t believe this.
屋子正中挂着的爷爷的遗影足足有12寸。
Wūzi zhèng zhōng guà zhe de yéye de yíyǐng zúzú yǒu shí\'èrcùn。
My grandpa\'s portrait, which is hung in the center of the wall, is over twelve cun in size.
皇帝在遗诏中指明要第二个儿子继位。
Huángdì zài yízhào zhōng zhǐmíng yào dìèr gè érzi jìwèi。
In the edict, the dying emperor designated his second son to ascend to the throne.
科考队一直致力于找寻原始人类的遗踪。
Kēkǎoduì yìzhí zhìlìyú zhǎoxún yuánshǐ rénlèi de yízōng。
The scientific investigation team devote themselves to seeking for traces of primitive man.
虽然张家家境贫寒，却是前朝皇室遗族。
Suīrán zhāng jiā jiājìng pínhán，quèshì qiáncháo huángshì yízú。
Although Xiao Zhang\'s family is poor, they are descended from royalty.
你是我们家的一份子，当然有份继承遗产。
Nǐ shì wǒmen jiā de yífènzǐ，dāngrán yǒu fèn jìchéng yíchǎn。
You are a member of our family; of course you have the right to inherit the legacy.

My father left a lot of money when he died.

liúxià（jìchéng）yíchǎn
bequeath (inherit) a legacy
他死后留下很多遗产。
Tā sǐhòu liúxià hěnduō yíchǎn.
When he died he left behind a considerable legacy.

遗留。

罪犯作案时遗留下的指纹。
解决历史遗留问题。
前人为我们留下了无比丰富的文化遗产。
The dead leave their wealth behind them.
死者留下遗产。
He had remembered me in his will.
他在遗嘱中给我留下了遗赠。
a hangover from the past
遗留物
The use of ashes in church is a survival from an ancient rite.
Jiàotáng shǐyòng huījìn shì yì zhǒng gǔdài yíshì de yíliúwù。
教堂使用灰烬是一种古代仪式的遗留物。
Their education and social policies are undoubtedly their most important legacy.

他们的教育和社会政策无疑是他们最重要的遗留。

Zài lǎowō bèi chēngwéi“bombies”de yíliú wèi bàozhà zhàdàn shǐde nóngmín hàipà gēngzuò tāmen de tiándì。

the deceased leaves a widow
死者留下一位遗孀
The heritage from his father is enough to give him a rich and decent life.
他父亲留给她的遗产足够他过上富有、体面的生活。

历史遗产
lìshǐ yíchǎn 
a legacy of history
我国的寺观庙宇很多都是人文历史遗产，要有步骤地进行保护。
Wǒ guó de sìguān miàoyǔ hěnduō dōushì rénwén lìshǐ yíchǎn，yào yǒu bùzhòu de jìnxíng bǎohù。
Most temples in our country are a cultural and historical inheritance, which should be protected gradually.
One unfortunately sees historic features carelessly lost when estates fall into unsympathetic hands.
Yídàn lìshǐ yíchǎn luòrù lěngmòwúqíng zhī rén shǒuzhōng，rénmen biàn huì búxìng de kàndào jùyǒu lìshǐ yìyì de dōngxi bèi suíyì mǒshā le。
一旦历史遗产落入冷漠无情之人手中，人们便会不幸地看到具有历史意义的东西被随意抹杀了。
The palace is an invaluable historical legacy.
这座宫殿是无比珍贵的历史遗产。

不遗余力。
不遗余力。

Watermelons are selling well in the market this winter, so we\'ll supply more next year in a planned way.

接着而来的信(常指推销员连续兜售商品的信)，接连发出的广告信
Retail sales account for only 40 per cent of consumer spending.
Língshòu\'é zhàn xiāofèizhě kāixiāo de bǎifēnzhī sìshí。
零售额占消费者开销的40%。
The publishers offered their best selling children\'s stories together in one library for $27.99.
出版商将最畅销的儿童故事编为丛书，售价为27.99美元。
你要的型号已售完，请到别家去看看吧。
Nǐ yào de xínghào yǐ shòuwán，qǐng dào biéjiā qù kànkan ba。
The goods of your specifications are all sold out. Please try (your luck in) some other stores.
售完
shòu wán
be sold out
本次航班经济舱的机票已全部售完。
Běncì hángbān jīngjìcāng de jīpiào yǐ quánbùshòuwán。
The economy class tickets for this flight are already sold out.
票已售完
货已经售完，只留下了两件底样
现货不多，售完为止。
过去对超额完成粮食征购任务的农户奖售平价化肥。
The conditional sale will not be complete until the full purchase price is paid.
Dāng jiàkuǎn quánbù fùqīng hòu，fù tiáojiàn xiāoshòu cáinéng wánchéng。
当价款全部付清后，附条件销售才能完成。
All the salesmen met their quota for the month.
Xiāoshòurényuán dōu wánchéngle tāmen měi gè yuè de zhǐbiāo。
销售人员都完成了他们每个月的指标。
The new employee was excused for not meeting the sales quota.
Lǎobǎn jiēshòule zhè míng xīn gùyuán wèi wánchéng xiāoshòu rènwù de lǐyóu。
老板接受了这名新雇员未完成销售任务的理由。
They had to complete the sale before the banks closed.
Tāmen bìxū zài yínháng tíngzhǐ yíngyè qián wánchéng xiāoshòu。
他们必须在银行停止营业前完成销售。
He has just made his first sale.
Tā gāng wánchéng tā de shǒucì xiāoshòu。
他刚完成他的首次销售。
这个车组包括3个司机和六个售票员。
Zhège chēzǔ bāokuò sāngè sījī hé liùgè shòupiàoyuán。
The entire crew includes three drivers, and six conductors.
售票员。
I had some really dirty looks from people in the shops，bus conductors，you know.
Nǐ zhīdào，wǒ shícháng zāoshòu shāngdiàn shòuhuòyuán hé gōngjiāo shòupiàoyuán de báiyǎn。
你知道，我时常遭受商店售货员和公交售票员的白眼。
Some conductors allowed passengers to ride for free when they didn\'t have the exact fare.
如果乘客没零钱，一些售票员会允许他们免费乘车。
The bus conductor was in bad mood today.
这个公交售票员今天的心情不太好。
The ticket agent was collecting the transfers.
Shòupiàoyuán zhèngzài shōu huànchéng piào。
售票员正在收换乘票。
A little old lady bought a ticket from the bus conductor.
Yì míng shòuxiǎo de lǎo fùrén cóng shòupiàoyuán nàlǐ mǎile yì zhāng piào。
一名瘦小的老妇人从售票员那里买了一张票。
She was sure the conductor would put him off the train.
Tā kěndìng shòupiàoyuán huì ràng tā xià huǒchē。
她肯定售票员会让他下火车。
There\'s nothing quite like a real...train conductor to add color to a quotidian commute.
Méiyǒu shénme néng xiàng yí wèi zhēnzhèng de lièchē shòupiàoyuán nàyàng nénggòu wèi rìcháng de shàngxiàbān jiāotōngxiàn zēngtiān sècǎi de le。
没有什么能像一位真正的列车售票员那样能够为日常的上下班交通线增添色彩的了。
他到售票窗口买了站台票。
Tā dào shòupiào chuāngkǒu mǎi le zhàntáipiào。
He bought a platform ticket at the ticket window.
售票窗口
shòupiàochuāngkǒu
ticket window
急巴巴地望着售票窗口，生怕买不上票。
售票窗口
Tickets are now on sale at usual outlets.
现在可以在普通售票口买到票。
Once the Will Call window closes, unclaimed tickets will not be available.
预定零售窗口一旦关闭，那些没人认领的票就不能使用了。
我想去售票处看看还有没有零票出售。
Wǒ xiǎng qù shòupiàochù kànkàn hái yǒuméiyǒu língpiào chūshòu。
I’d like to go to the ticket office to see if there are any tickets left.
我们赶到电影院，售票处恰好还有两张票。
Wǒmen gǎndào diànyǐngyuàn，shòupiàochù qiàhǎo háiyǒu liǎngzhāngpiào。
We got to the cinema just in time to buy the last two tickets left at the box office.
售票处还留有200张这场比赛的门票。
Shòupiàochù hái liúyǒu èrbǎizhāng zhèchǎng bǐsài de ménpiào。
Two hundreds tickets for the match have not yet been sold in the ticket office.
从影院售票处排起的长队来看，这部电影非常叫座儿。
Cóng yǐngyuàn shòupiàochù páiqǐ de chángduì láikàn，zhèbù diànyǐng fēicháng jiàozuòr。
Judging from the long queue in front of the cinema\'s ticket office, this movie is a great draw.
此处代售邮票。
Cǐchù dàishòu yóupiào。
Stamps sold here.
本处只售站票。
Běnchù zhǐshòu zhànpiào。
Standing room only.
Many people were waiting outside the ticket office.
很多人正在售票处外面等着。
这些茶具成套出售，不零卖。
Zhèxiē chájù chéngtào chūshòu，bùlíngmài。
These tea things are sold by the set, not separately.
餐馆最近出售野禽的菜肴，卖得很好。
Cānguǎn zuìjìn chūshòu yěqín de càiyáo，mài de hěnhǎo。
The restaurant sells dishes made of wild fowl, they sell well.
这家公司专门售卖高级服装。
I\'ll sell it to you retail only.
Wǒ zhǐnéng ànzhào língshòujià bǎ tā mài gěi nǐ。
我只能按照零售价把它卖给你。
door-to-door selling
挨门挨户地叫卖(或兜售)
The wholesale agent distributed the products to these retail vendors.
批发商将商品卖给零售商。
I cleared a lot of products in the sales this year.
Jīnnián de xiāoshòu huódòng zhōng，wǒ màidiàole yí dà pī huò。
今年的销售活动中，我卖掉了一大批货。
The landlords were given a bonus of twelve per cent to induce them to sell.
Bǎi fēn zhī shí\'èr de lìrùn zuòwéi hónglì fēngěi dìzhǔ，cùshǐ tāmen màilì xiāoshòu。
百分之十二的利润作为红利分给地主，促使他们卖力销售。
Such pills are on sale in London for £4 for a bottle of 50.
Zhèxiē yàopiàn zài Lúndūn liánjià chūshòu，wǔshí lì yì píng de mài sì yīngbàng。
这些药片在伦敦廉价出售，五十粒一瓶的卖四英镑。
He got the beer concession at the ball park.
Tā huòdéle zài bàngqiúchǎng zhōng xiāoshòu píjiǔ de tèxǔ zhuānmàiquán。
他获得了在棒球场中销售啤酒的特许专卖权。
That car salesman has a silver tongue and he can sell any car off the lot.
Nà wèi qìchē xiāoshòuyuán kǒucái hěn hǎo，tā néng màidiào chǎngdì lǐ de rènhé yí liàng chē。
那位汽车销售员口才很好，他能卖掉场地里的任何一辆车。
Stoves sold at cost in a sale.
炉子在拍卖中按成本费出售。
It\'s a winter sale, and all the clothes are 50% off.
正值冬季特卖，所有服装五折销售。
The house has been on the market almost a year and is still unsold.
Fángzi zài shìchǎng shàng màile yì nián le hái wèi chūshòu chūqù。
房子在市场上卖了一年了还未出售出去。
Sales department is obliged to sell out the inventory by the end of the year.
销售部必须在年底前将存货卖出去。
I discovered the salesman\'s trick that he sells display products to customers as new ones.
我认清了这个销售员的把戏，他把陈列品当作新的卖给顾客。
The auction house would not disclose the price at which the van gogh had sold.
Pāimàiháng búhuì tòulòu zhè fú fàngāo huìhuà de shòujià。
拍卖行不会透漏这幅梵高绘画的售价。
本店售价略低于时价。
Běndiàn shòujià lüèdīyú shíjià。
Our listed prices are slightly lower than the current prices.
销售价格
xiāoshòu jiàgé
selling price
这个小独院的售价大概是一百万元。
Zhège xiǎo dúyuàn de shòujià dàgài shì yìbǎi wànyuán。
The house with a yard is going to be sold for about one million yuan.
这是公司制定的统一销售价，不会有二价。
Zhè shì gōngsī zhìdìng de tǒngyī xiāoshòujià，bú huì yǒu èrjià。
This is the uniform retail price determined by the company and there shall be no other prices.
这些临海别墅的售价都很高。
Zhèxiē línhǎi biéshù de shòujià dōu hěngāo。
The villas that are close to the sea are all sold at high prices.
这件衣服在全市都有统一的零售价。
Zhèjiàn yīfu zài quánshì dōu yǒu tǒngyī de língshòujià。
This dress has a single retail price in the whole city.
半价出售
bànjià chūshòu 
sell at half price
贬价出售
biǎnjià chūshòu 
sell at a reduced price
变价出售
biànjià chūshòu 
sell at the current price
这一档的羊毛可低价出售。
Zhè yí dàng de yángmáo kě dījià chūshòu。
This grade of wool can be sold at a lower price.
减价出售
jiǎnjià chūshòu 
sell at a reduced prices
廉价出售
liánjià chūshòu 
sell at a low price; sell cheap
特价出售
tèjià chūshòu 
sell at a bargain price
压价出售
yājià chūshòu
undersell
仓库里有些处理品要拿出来贱价销售。
Cāngkù lǐ yǒuxiē chǔlǐpǐn yào náchūlái jiànjià xiāoshòu。
Substandard goods in the storehouse are to be sold at a low price.
这批货他打算低于进价出售。
Zhè pī huò tā dǎsuàn dīyú jìnjià chūshòu。
He decided to sell the products at a price lower than his  purchasing price.
我们商店的库房里积压着大量冷门货，正准备降价销售。
Wǒmen shāngdiàn de kùfáng lǐ jīyā zhe dàliàng lěngmén huò，zhèng zhǔnbèi jiàngjià xiāoshòu。
In our depot, there overstocks a lot of outdated goods. We are preparing to sell them at a lowered price.
部分商人囤积惜售造成物价飞涨。
Bùfen shāngrén túnjī xīshòu zàochéng wùjià fēizhǎng。
Some of the businessmen\'s over stocking of goods, and reluctance to sell caused an increase in prices.
快要过期的食品会贬价出售。
Kuàiyàoguòqīde shípǐn huì biǎnjiàchūshòu。
Foodstuffs getting close to their sell-by date need to be reduced in price.
这家商场出售的玉兰片价格都很高。
Zhèjiā shāngchǎng chūshòu de yùlánpiàn jiàgé dōu hěngāo。
The dried slices of tender bamboo shoots sold in this shop are very expensive.
按原价折半出售
àn yuánjià zhébàn chūshòu 
sell at 50% discount; sell at half price
按牌价打八折出售
àn páijià dǎbāzhé chūshòu
goods sold at a discount of 20% off the list prices
这次出售的都是成畜，所以价钱要高一些。
Zhècì chūshòu de dōushì chéngchù，suǒyǐ jiàqián yào gāoyìxiē。
We are selling full-grown animals this time, so the price is higher.
这个食品公司春节期间出售的货品将按有关规定核价，以防乱涨价。
Zhège shípǐn gōngsī chūnjié qījiān chūshòu de huòpǐn jiāngàn yǒuguānguīdìnghé jià，yǐfángluàn zhǎngjià。
To prevent random price hikes, the prices of goods sold by this company during Spring Festival will be verified in accordance with the regulations.
本产品售价统一，没有二价。
这种电视机各商场售价有高低，但均价是平稳的。
楼房的层次不同，售价也不同
过去对超额完成粮食征购任务的农户奖售平价化肥。
廉价销售
这批货全部按厂价出售。
顺价销售。
这幢楼房变价出售。
高价转售
按官价出售
廉价出售。
让价出售。
忍痛削价出售。
按实价出售
限价出售。
削价出售。
销路不畅，不得不压价出售。
溢价销售彩票。
清仓处理，优价销售。
这批木耳按统货价格出售。
商品尚未标价，暂不出售。
在这家零售店买东西可以打价。
These commodities will be retailed at a price of one hundred dollars.
这种产品会以一百元的售价零售。
a flat rate
统售价格；统一收费率
books that retail at a dollar
零售价为一美元的书
belts selling for two dollars
售价为二美元的裤腰带子
The box set sells for $50.
这个套装售价50美元。
The simple fact is that the price is so high because their rent is very expensive.
纯粹是因为租金太贵，所以他们的售价才会那么高。
they cost 5 pounds each
每个售价5镑
to sell at {or} for 10 pounds
售价10英镑
The publishers offered their best selling children\'s stories together in one library for $27.99.
出版商将最畅销的儿童故事编为丛书，售价为27.99美元。
I really appreciate the store with a merit of low price.
我很喜欢这家店售价便宜这个优点。
We sell our products at a very competitive price.
我们在售价方面很有优势。
The suggested retail price on the ticket was too expensive.
Biāoqiān shàng de jiànyì língshòujià tài guì le。
标签上的建议零售价太贵了。
This dress costs 10000rmb.
Zhè jiàn yīfu shòujià 10000 yuán rénmínbì。
这件衣服售价10000元人民币。
Both the men\'s and ladies shoes retail for ¥49.99.
Nán xié hé nǚ xié de língshòujià dōushì sìshíjiǔ diǎn jiǔjiǔ yuán yì shuāng。
男鞋和女鞋的零售价都是49.99元一双。
I bought the car retail for more than I wanted to spend.
Wǒ yǐ língshòujià mǎile chē，huāfèi bǐ wǒ yùjì de duō。
我以零售价买了车，花费比我预计的多。
A figure of 130RMB was suggested for the retail price.
Jiànyì língshòujià wéi yìbǎi sānshí yuán Rénmínbì。
建议零售价为130元人民币。
Many of the prices have been reduced from their normal retail price.
Xǔduō jiàgé dōu dīyú tāmen zhèngcháng de língshòujià。
许多价格都低于它们正常的零售价。
This levy would be set at around 1 per cent of the selling price.
Zhège shuìkuǎn kěnéng huì dìng dào xiāoshòu jiàgé de bǎifēnzhī yī zuǒyòu。
这个税款可能会定到销售价格的１％左右。
The auction house would not disclose the price at which the van gogh had sold.
Pāimàiháng búhuì tòulòu zhè fú fàngāo huìhuà de shòujià。
拍卖行不会透漏这幅梵高绘画的售价。
I\'ll sell it to you retail only.
Wǒ zhǐnéng ànzhào língshòujià bǎ tā mài gěi nǐ。
我只能按照零售价把它卖给你。
These gems retail at thousands of dollars each.
Zhèxiē bǎoshí měi gè de língshòujià yǒu shù qiān měiyuán。
这些宝石每个的零售价有数千美元。
Eggs bring a high price today.
今天鸡蛋售高价。
a storewide sale
全部商品的减价出售
When we bought our home, it was on sale!
当时我们买这所房子时，它正减价出售！
Tickets are still available, but at a price.
门票依然有售，只是票价很高。
We won\'t be going cheap.
我们不会廉价出售的。
A week after release they will be going cheap in the online store.
上市一周后，网上商店就会降价出售。
The price of notebooks is decreasing in some models.
有些型号的笔记本电脑正在降价出售。
These products were undersold.
这些商品被低价出售了。
Ears of corn were on sale at the market.
Yùmǐ suì zài shìchǎng shàng jiǎnjià chūshòu。
玉米穗在市场上减价出售。
They are rarely, if ever, at bargain prices.
Tāmen zhèngzài yǐ tèjià chūshòu，jīhuì nándé。
它们正在以特价出售，机会难得。
Such pills are on sale in London for £4 for a bottle of 50.
Zhèxiē yàopiàn zài Lúndūn liánjià chūshòu，wǔshí lì yì píng de mài sì yīngbàng。
这些药片在伦敦廉价出售，五十粒一瓶的卖四英镑。
We would not sell off land without proper public consultation.
Méiyǒu gōngpíng de gōnggòng cuōshāng，wǒmen búhuì liánjià chūshòu tǔdì。
没有公平的公共磋商，我们不会廉价出售土地。
All these securities are sold at a discount to their par value.
Suǒyǒu zhèxiē zhèngquàn dōu yǐ àn qí piàomiàn jiàzhí zhéjià chūshòu。
所有这些证券都已按其票面价值折价出售。
The publisher remaindered the books.
Zhèjiā chūbǎnshè liánjià chūshòu shèngyú shūjí。
这家出版社廉价出售剩余书籍。
They held a sale to reduce their inventory.
Tāmen kāizhǎn jiàngjià xiāoshòu lái jiǎnshǎo kùcún。
他们开展降价销售来减少库存。
He went all over town looking for undersellers.
Tā zài quánchéng xúnzhǎo dījià chūshòu shāngpǐn de rén。
他在全城寻找低价出售商品的人。
He\'s basically selling a product at a fair price.
Tā yǐ jīběn hélǐ de jiàgé xiāoshòu shāngpǐn。
他以基本合理的价格销售商品。
It\'s not so brilliant for any shareholders who sold at the float price.
Rènhé gǔdōng yǐ mùjí jiàgé chūshòu gǔpiào dōu hěn bù míngzhì。
任何股东以募集价格出售股票都很不明智。
The salesperson drove a hard bargain.
Zhème xiāoshòuyuán jílì tǎojiàhuánjià。
这么销售员极力讨价还价。
The store closed out all it\'s winter clothes for 50% off the normal price.
Zhè jiā diàn yǐ wǔ zhé de jiàgé pāoshòu suǒyǒu dōngzhuāng。
这家店以五折的价格抛售所有冬装。
How much does the villa go for?
Zhè zuò biéshù jiāng yǐ shénme jiàwèi chūshòu ？
这座别墅将以什么价位出售？
They will continue to retail at the same great low price.
Zhèxiē chǎnpǐn jiāng jìxù yǐ jí dī de jiàgé língshòu。
这些产品将继续以极低的价格零售。
In Hong Kong, jewellery sells at favourable prices.
Zài Xiānggǎng，zhūbǎo yǐ yōuhuì de jiàgé chūshòu。
在香港，珠宝以优惠的价格出售。
When this product is not branded it sells for a lower price.
Zài bú guàpái de qíngkuàng xià，gāi chǎnpǐn huì yǐ gèng dī de jiàgé lái xiāoshòu。
在不挂牌的情况下，该产品会以更低的价格来销售。
The price stayed, but sales volume surged.
价格没变，销售量却激增了。
Three big shopping retail companies have been involved in a price war.
三大零售公司卷入了一场价格战。
I got some great bargains at their annual sale.
Wǒ zài tāmen de niándù rànglì xiāoshòu zhōng huòdéle yìxiē liánjià de jiāoyì。
我在他们的年度让利销售中获得了一些廉价的交易。
Sales were climbing after prices were lowered.
Jiàgé xiàjiàng hòu，xiāoshòuliàng yìzhí pānshēng。
价格下降后，销售量一直攀升。
The conditional sale will not be complete until the full purchase price is paid.
Dāng jiàkuǎn quánbù fùqīng hòu，fù tiáojiàn xiāoshòu cáinéng wánchéng。
当价款全部付清后，附条件销售才能完成。
In most markets, houses are taking longer to sell, and consequently owners are offering incentives and showing a willingness to negotiate.
在大多数情况下，房屋销售的周期比较长，因此房主往往会提供价格上的优惠，以显出协商的诚意。
Special offers are quoted in good faith based on information supplied by retailers.
Jīyú língshòushāng tígōng de xìnxī，wǒmen zhēnchéng de gěichūle zhège tèbié bàojià。
基于零售商提供的信息，我们真诚地给出了这个特别报价。
我想去售票处看看还有没有零票出售。
Wǒ xiǎng qù shòupiàochù kànkàn hái yǒuméiyǒu língpiào chūshòu。
I’d like to go to the ticket office to see if there are any tickets left.
邮售是一种很有发展潜力的新型销售方式。
Yóushòu shì yìzhǒng hěn yǒu fāzhǎn qiánlì de xīnxíng xiāoshòu fāngshì。
Selling by post is a new type of marketing with high potential.

bànjià chūshòu 
sell at half price
贬价出售
biǎnjià chūshòu 
sell at a reduced price
变价出售
biànjià chūshòu

你要的型号已售完，请到别家去看看吧。
Nǐ yào de xínghào yǐ shòuwán，qǐng dào biéjiā qù kànkan ba。

仓储销售商店
cānɡchǔ xiāoshòu shānɡdiàn

Zhèběnshū yǐ xiāoshòu shíwàn cè。

lùn dá chūshòu

这一档的羊毛可低价出售。

dōushòu lièhuò

dōushòu jūnhuǒ
peddle munitions

Zhèxiē zázhì zài quánguógèdì shūdiàn jūn yǒu fāshòu。
These magazines are sold at bookstores throughout the country.
新的纪念邮票将于下星期发售。

The new commemorative stamps will be put on sale next week.
货物售出，概不退换。
Huòwù shòuchū, gài bú tuìhuàn。
Goods sold are not returnable.
这个食品公司春节期间出售的货品将按有关规定核价，以防乱涨价。
Zhège shípǐn gōngsī chūnjié qījiān chūshòu de huòpǐn jiāngàn yǒuguānguīdìnghé jià，yǐfángluàn zhǎngjià。
To prevent random price hikes, the prices of goods sold by this company during Spring Festival will be verified in accordance with the regulations.
减价出售
jiǎnjià chūshòu 
sell at a reduced prices

yǒngyuè xiàng guójiā jiāoshòu yóucàizǐ

Jiàocān xiāoshòuliàngzuì dà。
The sales volume of reference material for teaching is the largest.

agency

这些茶具成套出售，不零卖。

这套家具不能零售。

我只想买这套茶具中的杯子，但是他们不拆零出售。

这个车组包括3个司机和六个售票员。

这次出售的都是成畜，所以价钱要高一些。

这是一件疵品，可以便宜出售。

This is a defective product, that\'s why it\'s on sale.

Jìnzhǐ dāchē xiāoshòu zhèxiē guòqī shāngpǐn！

昨晚，一个非法爆竹销售点发生了大爆炸。

Last night, a big explosion happened in an illegal firecracker shop.
大毛的市场销售情况真不错。
Dàmáo de shìchǎng xiāoshòu qíngkuàng zhēn búcuò。
Long-haired pelts are selling well.

Xiànzài shì yǔróngfú xiāoshòu de dànyuè。

由于市场上供大于求，这些苹果只能低利出售了。

商场拒绝出售这些低质产品。

这些豆粉可以加工成豆奶进行出售。

玉泉营有个花木市场，那里有很多盆景出售。

这家商店出售花秧，可以自己买回家种植。

他的画选正在图书大厦出售，销量火爆。

他在销售部门上班，却不懂回销是什么意思。

He is working in the marketing department, yet he doesn\'t know what reselling means.
这家电影院的服务很好，销售非常火爆。

股民们总是逢低建仓，逢高就抛售。

仓库里有些处理品要拿出来贱价销售。

Substandard goods in the storehouse are to be sold at a low price.

The shop sells all kinds of form-fitting pants.
这批高档蚕丝布由于印错了花形只能降等出售了。
Zhè pī gāodàng cánsībùyóuyú yìncuò le huāxíng zhǐnéng jiàngděng chūshòu le。
Because these high-grade silks were printed with the wrong design, they have to be sold as a substandard products.
这批货他打算低于进价出售。
Zhè pī huò tā dǎsuàn dīyú jìnjià chūshòu。
He decided to sell the products at a price lower than his  purchasing price.
工商局明文规定过期食品一律禁售。
Gōngshāngjú míngwén guīdìng guòqī shípǐn yílǜ jìnshòu。

Běncì hángbān jīngjìcāng de jīpiào yǐ quánbùshòuwán。
The economy class tickets for this flight are already sold out.

The net profit of the rice is 0.5 yuan per jin, so dealers enjoy a very high profit.
作为一名售货员，对顾客要掬诚以待。
Zuòwéi yìmíng shòuhuòyuán，duì gùkè yào jūchéng yǐdài。
A salesperson should be sincere and polite to customers.
我们商店的库房里积压着大量冷门货，正准备降价销售。
Wǒmen shāngdiàn de kùfáng lǐ jīyā zhe dàliàng lěngmén huò，zhèng zhǔnbèi jiàngjià xiāoshòu。
In our depot, there overstocks a lot of outdated goods. We are preparing to sell them at a lowered price.
这些临海别墅的售价都很高。
Zhèxiē línhǎi biéshù de shòujià dōu hěngāo。
The villas that are close to the sea are all sold at high prices.
我打算开一家服装零售店。
Wǒ dǎsuàn kāi yìjiā fúzhuāng língshòudiàn。
I’m going to open a retail outlet for clothing.
由于季节的变化，我公司的零售额有所下降。
Yóuyú jìjié de biànhuà，wǒ gōngsī de língshòué yǒusuǒ xiàjiàng。
The retail sales of our company are down due to the change of seasons.
这件衣服在全市都有统一的零售价。
Zhèjiàn yīfu zài quánshì dōu yǒu tǒngyī de língshòujià。
This dress has a single retail price in the whole city.
售票处还留有200张这场比赛的门票。
Shòupiàochù hái liúyǒu èrbǎizhāng zhèchǎng bǐsài de ménpiào。
Two hundreds tickets for the match have not yet been sold in the ticket office.
他将自制的柳编成品拿来出售。
Tā jiāng zìzhì de liǔbiān chéngpǐn nálái chūshòu。
He takes out his self-made wickerwork and sells it.
药房里有驴皮胶出售。
Yàofáng lǐ yǒu lǘpíjiāo chūshòu。
E-gelatin is sold in drug stores.
超市有出售绿色植物的专柜。

There is a special counter selling green plants in the supermarket.
那家市场里有罗汉豆出售，你去那里买。

Broad beans are sold in that market, you can buy some there.
这些毛茶要经过复杂的工序加工后才能出售。

These raw tea leaves can be sold only after complex processing.
仓库里还有2万元的毛货没有销售出去。

There are still 20,000 yuan worth of unsold woolens remaining in the storehouse.
这些毛条会被加工成绿茶然后出售。

These raw tea leaves will be processed into green tea to sell.

经过检验这些都是米猪，不能继续出售了。

公司给我们每个人都派定了销售任务量。

The company assigned everybody a sales task.

这家军用品商店经国家批准可出售骑枪。
Zhèjiā jūnyòngpǐn shāngdiàn jīng guójiā pīzhǔn kě chūshòu qíqiāng。
The military supplies store is approved by the government to sell cabin guns.
They sold arms to both sides.
他们向双方出售军火。
The company secretly sells military equipment to foreign nations.
这家公司向国外秘密销售军火。
Ivan\'s great sales technique won him salesman of the month.
伊万出色的销售技能使他成为了当月销售冠军。
Certain items may be supplied on a sale or return basis.
Mǒuxiē chǎnpǐn yǐ jìshòu de xíngshì tígōng。
某些产品以寄售的形式提供。
这些杂志在全国各地书店均有发售。
Zhèxiē zázhì zài quánguógèdì shūdiàn jūn yǒu fāshòu。
These magazines are sold at bookstores throughout the country.
新的纪念邮票将于下星期发售。
Xīn de jìniàn yóupiào jiāng yú xiàxīngqī fāshòu。
The new commemorative stamps will be put on sale next week.
昨晚，一个非法爆竹销售点发生了大爆炸。
Zuówǎn，yígè fēifǎ bàozhú xiāoshòudiǎn fāshēng le dàbàozhà。
Last night, a big explosion happened in an illegal firecracker shop.
警方发现了销售盗版光盘的黑线。
Jǐngfāng fāxiàn le xiāoshòu dàobǎn guāngpán de hēixiàn。
The police found black thread of selling pirated compact disks.
邮售是一种很有发展潜力的新型销售方式。
Yóushòu shì yìzhǒng hěn yǒu fāzhǎn qiánlì de xīnxíng xiāoshòu fāngshì。
Selling by post is a new type of marketing with high potential.
限额发售。
限量发售。
这里只批发不零售。
零售、批发两种业态并举。
The new disc will be out by next weekend.
这张新碟将于下周公开发售。
Some have been sacked for issuing false tickets.
Yìxiē rén yīnwèi fāshòu jiǎpiào ér bèi jiěgù。
一些人因为发售假票而被解雇。
Possible distribution channels are wholesalers or small retailers or retail chains or direct mailers or your own stores.
Kěnéng de xiāoshòu qúdào bāokuò pīfāshāng、xiǎoxíng língshòushāng、língshòuliàn、zhíjiē yóujiàn yǐjí nǐ zìjǐ de shāngdiàn。
可能的销售渠道包括批发商、小型零售商、零售链、直接邮件以及你自己的商店。
We do not supply to the general public or to retail outlets.
Wǒmen bù xiàng gōngzhòng huò língshòu pīfāshāng gònghuò。
我们不向公众或零售批发商供货。
The wholesale agent distributed the products to these retail vendors.
批发商将商品卖给零售商。
We retail to the general public and we also supply wholesalers.
Wǒmen xiàng dàzhòng língshòu，tóngshí yě wèi pīfāshāng gòng huò。
我们向大众零售，同时也为批发商供货。
a follow-up letter
接着而来的信(常指推销员连续兜售商品的信)，接连发出的广告信
Normally, retail profit rate is much higher than that of wholesale.
一般来说，零售的利润率比批发大很多。
The salesman faxed the sales agreement to his home office.
Nà wèi xiāoshòuyuán bǎ xiāoshòu xiéyì tōngguò chuánzhēn fāgěile zǒngbù。
那位销售员把销售协议通过传真发给了总部。

yājià chūshòu

这是一件疵品，可以便宜出售。

This is a defective product, that\'s why it\'s on sale.

转折点
Zhuǎnzhédiǎn
turning point
遵义会议是中国共产党历史上的一个转折点。
1949年10月1日，是我国现代史上的一个转折点。
For the nurses, however, the negotiations proved to be a historic turning-point.

然而，对于护士，谈判被证明是一个历史性的转折点。
The desperate gallantry of our naval task forces marked the turning point in the Pacific war.
Wǒmen hǎijūn bèishuǐyízhàn de yǒngqì chéngwéi tàipíngyángzhàn chǎng shàng de zhuǎnzhédiǎn。
我们海军背水一战的勇气成为太平洋战场上的转折点。
急剧转折
jíjù zhuǎnzhé 
abrupt turn
戏剧性的转折
xìjùxìng de zhuǎnzhé 
a dramatic turn
转折点
Zhuǎnzhédiǎn
turning point
天气转暖了，羊毛衫开始打折了。
Tiānqì zhuǎnnuǎn le，yángmáoshān kāishǐ dǎzhé le。
The weather is getting warm, knitted sweaters are being sold at a discount.
历史的转折关头。
两个分句有转折关系。
遵义会议是中国共产党历史上的一个转折点。
1949年10月1日，是我国现代史上的一个转折点。
In &quot;John or Bob may go, but their sister may not.&quot;, &quot;or&quot; and &quot;but&quot; are disjunctive conjunctions.
在“John or Bob may go, but their sister may not.”句中，“or”和“but”是转折(或分离)连接词。
The development can be clearly understood by the audience.
Guānzhòng kěyǐ fēicháng qīngchu de lǐjiě zhè duàn yuèqǔ de zhuǎnzhé。
观众可以非常清楚地理解这段乐曲的转折。

àn páijià dǎbāzhé chūshòu
goods sold at a discount of 20% off the list prices
请勿攀折花木。
Qǐngwù pānzhé huāmù。
Please don\'t pick the flowers.
这种合成纤维折叠以后也不起皱。
Zhèzhǒng héchéng xiānwéi zhédié yǐhòu yě bù qǐzhòu。
This synthetic fabric won\'t crumple when folded.
他多次遇到挫折，但从不气馁。
Tā duō cì yùdào cuòzhé，dàn cóngbú qìněi。
He never lost heart despite repeated setbacks.
沿着池塘有一条曲折的小路。
Yán zhe chítáng yǒu yìtiáo qūzhé de xiǎolù。
There\'s a winding path following the edge of the pond.
这个剧本情节很曲折。
Zhège jùběn qíngjié hěn qūzhé。
The play has a very complicated plot.
这件事情里面还有不少曲折。
Zhèjiàn shìqing lǐmiàn háiyǒu bùshǎo qūzhé。
There are many complications in this matter.
百折不挠的韧力
bǎizhébùnáo de rènlì
unyielding will in the face of setbacks
他虽然遇到许多挫折，可是意志仍旧那样坚强。
Tā suīrán yùdào xǔduō cuòzhé，kěshì yìzhì réngjiù nàyàng jiānqiáng。
His determination remains as strong as ever despite all the setbacks he has encountered.
扁担折了。
Biǎndan shé le。
The shoulder pole broke.
他们太使劲，把绳子拉折了。
Tāmen tài shǐjìn，bǎ shéngzi lāshé le。
They pulled the rope so hard that it snapped.
折本生意
shéběn shēngyì 
a losing business; a bad bargain
受尽反动派的折磨
shòujìn fǎndòngpài de zhémó
suffer all kinds of tortures at the hands of the reactionaries
他摔了一跤，把腿给摔折了。
Tā shuāi le yì jiāo，bǎ tuǐ gěi shuāishé le。
He had a fall and broke his leg.
外币折合率
wàibì zhéhélǜ 
foreign currency conversion rate
谈判中途夭折。
Tánpàn zhōng tú yāozhé。
The negotiations came to a premature end.
百折不回的毅力
bǎizhébùhuí de yìlì 
indomitable will
银行存折
yínhángcúnzhé 
bankbook; passbook
他们百折不挠，再接再厉，终于达到了目的。
Tāmen bǎizhébùnáo，zàijiēzàilì，zhōng yú dádào le mùdì。
The goal has been finally attained through their dauntless and persistent efforts.
几遭挫折
jǐ zāo cuòzhé
suffer repeated setbacks
折叠式照相机
zhédiéshì zhào xiàng jī 
folding camera
他折腾了好几个钟头才睡着。
Tā zhēténg le hǎo jǐgè zhōng tóu cái shuìzháo。
He tossed about in bed for hours before he got to sleep.
徒工把旧机器拆了又安，安了又拆，折腾了好多回。
Túgōngbǎ jiùjīqì chāi le yòu ān，ān le yòu chāi，zhēténg le hǎoduō huí。
The young apprentice again and again took the old machine apart and then put it together.
牙疼真折腾人。
Yá téngzhēn zhēténgrén。
A toothache can get you down.
没多久他就把那份家产折腾光了。
Méi duō jiǔ tā jiù bǎ nà fèn jiāchǎn zhēténgguāng le。
It didn\'t take him long to squander away his family fortune.
折断一根树枝
zhéduàn yìgēn shùzhī 
break off a branch
折断腿
zhéduàn tuǐ 
fracture (or break) one\'s leg
边界由此折向西南。
Biānjiè yóucǐ zhéxiàng xī\'nán。
From here the boundary turns southwestward.
心折
xīnzhé

这笔外币折成人民币是多少？
Zhèbǐ wàibì zhéchéngRénmínbì shì duōshǎo?

bǎ xìn zhéhǎo

bà zhǐ duìzhé qǐlái

àn yuánjià zhébàn chūshòu

zhéchōngyùwǔ

Qiángcíduólǐ bùnéng zhéfú rén。

lìngrén zhéfú

把美元折合成瑞士法郎
bǎ Měiyuán zhéhé chéng Ruìshìfǎláng

Yì yìngbàngzhéhé chéngrénmínbì shì duōshǎo?

水泥每包50公斤，折合100市斤。
Shuǐní měibāo wǔshí gōngjīn，zhéhé yìbǎi shìjīn。
Each bag of cement weighs 50 kilogrammes, that is, 100 jin.
他刚走出不远又折回来了。
Tā gāngzǒuchū bùyuǎn yòu zhéhuí lái le。
He hadn\'t gone very far when he turned back.

Zhè jiàqián yǐjing dǎ le zhékòu le。
This is the discounted price.
执行上级指示不打折扣

shòu jíbìng de zhémó

故事曲折有致。
Gùshi qūzhé yǒuzhì。
The story with its many twists and turns is very intriguing.
树枝经不起雪的重压，终于折断了。
Shùzhī jīngbu qǐ xuě de zhòngyā，zhōng yú zhéduàn le。

这事恐怕要费一番周折。
Zhè shì kǒngpà yào fèi yì fān zhōuzhé。

xìjùxìng de zhuǎnzhé

zhégēntou

sǔnbīngzhéjiàng

qūzhé
tortuous; winding

cúnzhé

我昨天着实被酒精折腾了一宿。
Wŏ zuótiān zhuóshí bèi jiŭjīng zhēténgle yìxiǔr。
他百折不回的坚强意志值得我们学习。
Tā bǎizhébùhuí de jiānqiáng yìzhì zhídé wǒmen xuéxí。
We must learn from his indomitable spirit.
他是个不折不扣的暴发户。
Tā shì gè bùzhébúkòu de bàofāhù。
He is a complete upstart.
挫折教育要成为孩子们的一门必修课。
Cuòzhé jiàoyù yào chéngwéi háizimen de yìmén bìxiūkè。
Frustration education should be arranged as a required course for all children.
一次事故中她摔折了膑骨。
yícì shìgù zhōng tā shuāizhé le bìngǔ。
She broke her patella in an accident.
阳光洒在屋前的冰挂上，折射出七彩眩光。
Yángguāng sǎ zài wūqián de bīngguà shàng，zhéshèchū qīcǎi xuànguāng。
The sun shines on the glazed ice, and reflects wonderful colors.
这条河的河道曲折，汊流众多。
Zhè tiáo hé de hédào qūzhé，chàliú zhòngduō。
This river has a zigzagging watercourse and many branches.
这个老地主是个不折不扣的催命鬼。
Zhège lǎodìzhǔ shì gè bùzhébúkòu de cuīmìngguǐ。
This old landlord is always pressing others.
不受挫折教育，孩子永远长不大。
Búshòu cuòzhé jiàoyù，háizi yǒngyuǎn zhǎngbúdà。
Without being taught to accept defeat, children can never become mature.
遇到这么点挫折你就打蔫？
Yùdào zhème diǎn cuòzhé nǐ jiù dǎniān？
You will not be frustrated by the setback, will you?
过节了，超市的许多商品又要打折。
Guòjié le，chāoshì de xǔduō shāngpǐn yòu yào dǎzhé。
Since the festival is coming, many goods will be sold at a discount again in the supermarket.
商场的大件商品都在打折。
Shāngchǎng de dàjiàn shāngpǐn dōu zài dǎzhé。
All the big items in the store are discounted.
自从右臂骨折后，他一直戴着吊带。
Zìcóng yòubì gǔzhé hòu，tā yìzhí dài zhe diàodài。
He has always worn a bandage since the fracture of his right arm.
为这点挫折，犯得上寻死吗？
Wèi zhè diǎn cuòzhé，fàn deshàng xúnsǐ ma?
Is it worthwhile committing suicide due to such a trivial setback?
他打球的时候摔了一跤，腓骨骨折了。
Tā dǎqiú de shíhou shuāi le yì jiāo，féigǔ gǔzhé le。
He stumbled when playing on the field and injured his fibula.
他性格钢韧，从不怕挫折。
Tā xìnggé gāngrèn，cóngbú pà cuòzhé。
He has a strong, tenacious character, so he is never afraid of frustration.
我就是再有钱，也搁不住这么折腾。
Wǒ jiùshì zài yǒuqián，yě gēbúzhù zhème zhéténg。
No matter how much money I have, I can\'t stand being tormented like this.
公路回环于山间，蜿蜒曲折，好像一条巨蟒。
Gōnglù huíhuán yú shānjiān，wānyán qūzhé，hǎo xiàng yìtiáo jùmǎng。
The twists, and turns on the mountain road resemble the shape of a python.
这次任务他格外卖力，想将功折罪以弥补上次的失败。
Zhècì rènwù tā géwài màilì，xiǎng jiānggōng zhézuì yǐ míbǔ shàngcì de shībài。
This time he is going to do his utmost to make amends for the failure last time.
叫啸着的狂风把一棵大树都吹折了。
Jiàoxiào zhe de kuángfēng bǎ yì kē dàshù dōu chuīshé le。
The roaring wind damaged a big tree.
年轻人面对挫折不必惊怕，要学会镇定。
Niánqīngrén miànduì cuòzhé búbì jīngpà，yào xuéhuì zhèndìng。
Young people must learn to face challenges calmly.
没想到那个棍子太不结实，竟然咔喳一下折了。
Méi xiǎngdào nàge gùnzi tài bùjiēshi，jìngrán kāchā yíxià shé le。
It is surprising that the stick was so weak, it broke with a snap.
这家店一直亏折，生意实在是做不下去了！
Zhèjiā diàn yìzhí kuīzhé，shēngyì shízai shì zuò bú xiàqù le！
This shop has been running a deficit and can hardly continue with its business.
这个山区的山脉蜿蜒曲折，连绵不绝。
Zhège shānqū de shānmài wānyán qūzhé，liánmián bùjué。
The mountain ridges in this area twist and twine, stretching endlessly.
他屡遭挫折，但从不气馁。
Tā lǚzāo cuòzhé，dàn cóngbú qìněi。
He was thwarted time and again, but never became down-hearted.
孩子折了一截麦杆儿，在空地上比划着。
Háizi zhé le yì jié màigǎnr，zài kòngdìshàng bǐhuà zhe。
The child broke a straw of wheat and scratched on the clearing.
在经历了许多磨折之后，他终于取得了成功！
Zài jīnglì le xǔduō mózhé zhīhòu，tā zhōng yú qǔdé le chénggōng！
After much torment, he succeeded at last.
年轻人要朝气蓬勃，不能因为遇到一时的挫折就显得暮气沉沉的。
Niánqīngrén yào zhāoqì péngbó，bùnéng yīnwèi yùdào yìshí de cuòzhé jiù xiǎnde mùqì chénchén de。
Young people should be full of youthful spirit, and can not get lethargic due to temporary frustration.
骨折了真难办，只好打上夹板慢慢休养了！
Gǔzhé le zhēn nánbàn，zhǐhǎo dǎshàng jiábǎn mànmàn xiūyǎng le！
It is difficult to cope with a bone fracture. The only way is to put the injured part in splints, and rest till it is healed.
年轻力壮的大小伙子，怎么能一遇到挫折就叹气呢？
Niánqīng lìzhuàng de dàxiǎohuǒzi，zěnme néng yí yùdào cuòzhé jiù tànqì ne？
You are a young and vigorous man. How can you sigh when you meet a setback?
她在这部话剧里扮演一个受尽折磨的女奴。
Tā zài zhèbù huàjù lǐ bànyǎn yígè shòujìn zhémó de nǚnú。
She plays the role of a tortured woman slave in the drama.
只听啪啦一声，树枝被大风吹折了。
Zhǐtīng pālā yìshēng，shùzhī bèi dàfēng chuīshé le。
With a cracking sound, the branch was snapped off by the severe gale.
风太大了，伞骨都被吹折了。
Fēng tài dà le，sǎngǔ dōu bèi chuī shé le。
The wind was too strong. The framework of the umbrella was snapped by it.
他在这次车祸中筛骨骨折。
Tā zài zhècì chēhuò zhōng shāigǔ gǔzhé。
His ethmoid bone was broken in the accident.
我不小心弄断了这把折扇的扇骨。
Wǒ bùxiǎoxīn nòngduàn le zhè bǎ zhéshàn de shàngǔ。
I carelessly broke the framework of the folding fan.
我们都为教授这个深层的见解所折服。
Wǒmen dōu wéi jiàoshòu zhège shēncéng de jiànjiě suǒ zhéfú。
We were all filled with admiration at the professor\'s deep insight.
这个歹徒太手黑了，把他的骨头都打折了。
Zhège dǎitú tài shǒuhēi le，bǎ tā de gǔtou dōu dǎshé le。
This bandit was so cruel, he broke the man\'s bones.
不经历些霜雪怎能知道如何面对挫折呢？
Bù jīnglì xiē shuāngxuě zěnnéng zhīdào rúhé miànduì cuòzhé ne？
How can one know how to face setbacks if one hasn\'t gone through troubles?
我一不小心把这个锥桯子折断了。
Wǒ yíbùxiǎoxīn bǎ zhège zhuītīngzi zhéduàn le。
I accidentally broke the upper end of the awl.
这仅仅是一次小挫折，你绝不能因此而退坡。
Zhè jǐnjǐn shì yícì xiǎo cuòzhé，nǐ jué bùnéng yīncǐ ér tuìpō。
This is only a small setback, you shouldn\'t fall back just because of this.
老张一向不喜欢新事物，真是个不折不扣的顽固派！
Lǎo Zhāng yí xiàng bùxǐhuan xīn shìwù，zhēn shì gè bùzhébúkòu de wángùpài！
Senior Zhang has always hated new things, he\'s a real conservative!
他天天去舞厅，是个不折不扣的舞迷。
Tā tiāntiān qù wǔtīng，shì gè bùshébúkòu de wǔmí。
He went to the ballroom every day and is a real dance fan.
商场正在进行名牌消毒柜八折优惠活动。
Shāngchǎng zhèngzài jìnxíng míngpái xiāodúguì bā shé yōuhuì huódòng。
The mall is giving a 20% discount on some brand-name sterilizers.
新张营业当天，所有商品五折优惠。
Xīnzhāng yíngyè dāngtiān，suǒyǒu shāngpǐn wǔ shé yōuhuì。
We offer a 50% discount for all products on our opening day.
丫杈上的鸟窝早被他给掏了，你别折腾了。
Yāchà shàng de niǎowō zǎo bèi tā gěi tāo le，nǐ bié zhēteng le。
Save the trouble. The birds and eggs in the nest on that fork have already been taken away by him.
晚上他们吃的就是折箩。
Wǎnshàng tāmen chī de jiùshì zhéluó。
What they had at night is a mixture of leftovers.
干警缴获了歹徒用来行凶的折刀。
Gànjǐng jiǎohuò le dǎitú yònglái xíngxiōng de zhédāo。
The policmen seized the folding knife that was used by the scoundrels.
小明家里来了客人，今晚他只能睡折叠床了。
Xiǎo Míng jiā lǐ lái le kèrén，jīnwǎn tā zhǐnéng shuì zhédiéchuáng le。
There were guests at Xiaoming\'s house, so tonight he has to sleep in the folding bed.
他新买的折叠伞被小偷偷走了，
Tā xīnmǎi de zhédiésǎn bèi xiǎotōu tōuzǒu le。
The folding umbrella he just bought was stolen.
这是一款折叠式手机。
Zhè shì yì kuǎn zhédiéshì shǒujī。
This is a folding cellphone.
他外出钓鱼最喜欢带上折叠椅。
Tā wàichū diàoyú zuì xǐhuan dàishàng zhédiéyǐ。
He likes to bring the folding chair with him when he goes fishing.
他折断树枝给妈妈当拐杖用。
Tā zhéduàn shùzhī gěi māma dāng guǎizhàng yòng。
He brought a branch for his mother to use as a walking stick.
农村里普遍认为老人给年轻人下跪年轻人要折福。
Nóngcūn lǐ pǔbiàn rènwéi lǎorén gěi niánqīngrén xiàguì niánqīngrén yào zhéfú。
In rural areas, it is generally believed that young people would have their good fortune compromised if the eldely get down on their knees in front of them.
这种设备的折旧率太高。
Zhèzhǒng shèbèi de shéjiùlǜ tài gāo。
The rate of depreciation of this equipment is too high.
有劳将军亲自迎接，真是折杀小辈了。
Yǒuláo jiāngjūn qīnzì yíngjiē，zhēnshì zhéshā xiǎobèi le。
You honored general is really overwhelming me by welcoming me in person.
机器人的手臂有些折损，需要维修一下。
Jīqìrén de shǒubì yǒuxiē zhésǔn，xūyào wéixiū yíxià。
The arms of the robot can\'t be completely folded, so we need to repair them.
他这种行为折损了医务工作人员的形象。
Tā zhèzhǒng xíngwéi zhésǔn le yīwù gōngzuò rényuán de xíng xiàng。
His behaviour has damaged the image of medical workers.
他把折椅展开。
Tā bǎ zhéyǐ zhǎnkāi。
He unfolded the chair.
他为人中庸，喜欢折中主义。
Tā wèirén zhōng yōng，xǐhuan zhé zhōng zhǔyì。
He is quite ordinary, and prefers eclectisism.
这件事折衷来看，并不是件坏事。
Zhèjiànshì zhé zhōng láikàn，bìng búshì jiàn huàishì。
Judging from a compromised point of view, this is not totally a bad thing.
随着时间的流失，父母脸上出现了折皱。
Suí zhe shíjiān de liúshī，fùmǔ liǎnshàng chūxiàn le zhézhòu。
With the passage of time, there are wrinkles on his parents\' faces.
他这样一来就可以折罪立功了。
Tā zhèyàng yìlái jiù kěyǐ zhézuì lìgōng le。
In this way, he could atone for his crimes by doing good deeds.
我多么想抚平奶奶脸上的皱折。
Wǒ duōme xiǎng fǔpíng nǎinai liǎnshàng de zhòuzhé。
How I wish that I could smooth the wrinkles on grandma\'s face.
你这样粗心，会把文件皱折坏的！
Nǐ zhèyàng cūxīn，huì bǎ wénjiàn zhòuzhé huài de！
You are so careless that you may crumple the document.
她第一次骑马就坠马骨折了。
Tā dìyīcì qímǎ jiù zhuìmǎ gǔzhé le。
The first time she rode a horse, she fell off and broke a bone.

The memorial to the throne had been touched by many people when it was finally delivered to the emperor.

老师在这个故事的译文中添加了一层很有意思的转折。
The company matched the discount policy of its competitors.

该公司采取了与其竞争对手相同的折扣政策。

曲折
qūzhé
tortuous; winding

fěnsuìxìnggǔzhé
comminuted fracture
开放性骨折
kāifàngxìnggǔzhé
open (or compound) fracture

fold the sheet of paper in two

说到做到，不打折扣

inductive reasoning
归纳的推理
我们对于这种纷乱的数据最好采用归纳法进行分析。
Wǒmen duìyú zhèzhǒng fēnluàn de shùjù zuìhǎo cǎiyòng guīnàfǎ jìnxíng fēnxī。
The inductive method is the best approach for analyzing complicated data like this.
由此及彼、由表及理是一种有效的归纳演绎方法。
Yóucǐjíbǐ 、 yóubiǎojílǐ shì yìzhǒng yǒuxiào de guīnà yǎnyì fāngfǎ。
From one to the other and from outside to inside is an effective method of induction and deduction.

From one to the other and from outside to inside is an effective method of induction and deduction.

inductive reasoning
归纳的推理
a sweeping generalization
概括的归纳

我答应借他钱。
Wǒ dāyìng jiè tā qián。
I agreed to lend him money.
他就是一个瓷公鸡，怎么可能借给你钱呢。
Tā jiùshì yígè cí gōngjī，zěnme kěnéng jiègěi nǐ qián ne。
He is such a stingy person, how can it be possible that he would lend money to you?
我想向银行告借2000元钱。
Wǒ xiǎng xiàng yínháng gàojiè liǎngqiānyuánqián。
I want to go to the bank and borrow two thousand yuan.
他这个人很小气，别人朝他借点小钱就面露吝色。
Tā zhège rén hěnxiǎoqì，biérén cháo tā jiè diǎn xiǎoqián jiù miànlòu lìnsè。
He is very petty. Others even borrow a little money from him, he will show a grudging expression.
他们为了撑场面，借了很多钱大摆喜筵。
Tāmen wèi le chēng chǎngmiàn，jiè le hěnduō qián dà bǎi xǐyán。
In order to keep up appearances, they borrowed a lot of money to give a big wedding party.
我不得不提前索还我借给你的钱，因为我现在缺钱。
Wǒ bùdébùtíqián suǒhuán wǒ jiègěi nǐ de qián，yīnwèi wǒ xiànzài quēqián。
I have to ask you for the money I lent you ahead of time, since I lack money now.
他东拼西凑地借到了一笔钱。
Tā dōngpīnxīcòu de jièdào le yì bǐ qián。
He scraped together a sum of money by borrowing left and right.
跟人借钱
想向他借点钱，可又难以启齿。
手头方便的话，就借点钱给他
借了钱就得还，不能赖账。
这阵子闹饥荒，你能不能借点钱给我？
借了人家的钱就休想逃债。
买房子钱不够，需要挪借一部分。
to make a touch
讨钱；借钱

想跟他借钱，简直是门儿都没有。

比尔不得不抵押东西借钱来还债。

Tā xiàng tā jièqián。

zhìzào jièkǒu

勘探队员在牧民家里借宿了一夜。
Kāntàn duìyuán zài mùmín jiālǐ jièsù le yí yè。
Members of the prospecting team put up for one night in the homes of the herdsmen.

Shì jǔ shù lì，jièyǐ shuōmíngwèntí de yánzhòngxìng。
Let me give a few examples to show how serious the problem is.

Jièyòngyíxià nǐ de qiānbǐ。

jièyòngyíjù gǔshī biǎodá zìjǐ de xīnqíng
quote a line from classical poetry to express one\'s feelings

Tā zhǐ guǎn bàozhǐ jièyuè。
She is only responsible for lending newspapers.
借债度日
jièzhài dùrì
live by borrowing

Yǐhòu yào jièzhòngnín de dìfanghái duō zhe ne。

jièzhù wàngyuǎnjìngguānchá tiāntǐ
observe the celestial bodies with the aid of a telescope
借书卡片
jièshū kǎpiàn
library card

Tā lǎo gēn wŏ jiè qián。
He\'s always borrowing money from me.

Tā zhīdào wǒmen de mìmì，jiù jiè cǐ qiāo wǒmen de zhúgàng。

shàfèi kǔxīn de xúnzhǎo jièkǒu

shāngjiè qīwànyuán zījīn fāzhǎn lǚyóuyè

Gōnɡjùshū shù bú wàijiè。

Diànhuà bú wàijiè。

Wǒ qù wèn tā jiè nàběn shū。

jiè jiǔ xiāochóu

bǎ jiètiáo zhùxiāo

正误
zhèngwù
correct (typographical) errors
正误表中还有错误，说明此刊物质量不好。

改正错误
gǎizhèng cuòwù
correct one\'s mistakes
及时纠正错误
jíshí jiūzhèngcuòwù 
correct a mistake promptly
纠正错误
jiūzhèngcuòwù
correct a mistake; redress an error
切实改正错误
qièshí gǎizhèngcuòwù
correct one\'s mistakes in real earnest
随时纠正错误
suíshí jiūzhèng cuòwù
correct mistakes as soon as they occur
坚持真理，修正错误
jiānchí zhēnlǐ，xiūzhèngcuòwù 
uphold the truth and correct one\'s mistakes

Chāoxiě cuòwù zài xiàodìng xué zhōng jùyǒu juédìngxìng de zhòngyàoxìng。
抄写错误在校定学中具有决定性的重要性。
His advisers soft-pedaled the president\'s blunder.
Zǒngtǒng de gùwèn duì zǒngtǒng de cuòwù qīngmiáodànxiě。
总统的顾问对总统的错误轻描淡写。
The nurse spelt his name with a &quot;c&quot; instead of a &quot;k&quot;.
Hùshi zài pīnxiě tā de míngzi shí，wùyòng“c”dàitìle“k”。
护士在拼写他的名字时，误用“c”代替了“k”。
inadvertently transposed the e and the i in &quot;weird&quot;
误将“weird”中的e和i次序写颠倒
误伤
wùshāng
accidentally injure
误伤
wùshāng
accidentally injure
这一点小失误无伤大体，只是下次要注意了。
Zhè yìdiǎn xiǎo shīwù wúshāng dàtǐ，zhǐshì xiàcì yào zhùyì le。
This lapses is okay, but you must pay attention to it next time.
杯中之物不要多饮，否则既伤身体也容易误事。
Bēizhōngzhīwù búyào duōyǐn，fǒuzé jì shāngshēntǐ yě róngyì wùshì。
Too much wine can do harm to one\'s health. What\'s more, it may also cause mistakes.
误伤。
He was accidentally killed by friendly fire.
Tā hěn ǒurán de sǐ yú yǒujūn wùshāng。
他很偶然地死于友军误伤。

误杀。
guilty of murder/manslaughter
谋杀/误杀罪
Andy is serving a ten spot for manslaughter.
安迪因误杀要服刑十年。
误人子弟。

Wǒmen bùnéng zhǐ tíngliú zài biǎomiàn wèntí de fēnxī，nà kěnéng huì zǒu xiàng wùqū，érshì yào wājué lǐcéng guīlǜxìng de dōngxi。
We can\'t only analyze the surface of the problems, which may mislead us. Instead, we should dig into the underlying principles.
误入禁区。
Most criminals can\'t make a difference between right and wrong.

大多数罪犯不能区别对待正确和错误。
Several hundred AIDS activists protested in Washington DC, accusing US trade officials of wrongdoing.

几百名艾滋病激进分子在华盛顿特区示威，控诉美国贸易官员的错误行径。
The district attorney\'s office investigated reports of possible irregularities.
Dìqū jiǎncháguān bàngōngshì diàochále kěnéng chūxiàn miùwù de bàogào。
地区检察官办公室调查了可能出现谬误的报告。
原来的判决是错误的，应该翻案
弧线球易使裁判产生错误判断。
Húxiànqiú yì shǐ cáipàn chǎnshēng cuòwù pànduàn.
Arcing balls are inclined to mislead umpires to incorrect judgements.
观众对主裁判的两次误判表示严重不满。
Guānzhòng duì zhǔcáipàn de liǎng cì wùpàn biǎoshì yánzhòng bùmǎn.
The audience was extremely dissatisfied with the two incorrect rulings of the chief umpire.
主裁判又一次误判，只听场外传来一阵唏嘘声。
Zhǔcáipàn yòu yícì wùpàn，zhǐtīng chǎngwài chuánlái yízhèn xīxūshēng。

这些例子可能会让你误以为试卷要比看起来的容易。
I saw from the station clock that I had timed my arrival just about perfectly.

误会
wùhuì
misunderstand; mistake; misconstrue

有的时候，误用成语是会贻笑大方的。
Yǒu de shíhou，wùyòng chéngyǔ shì huì yíxiào dàfāng de。
You can make yourself a laughing stock by using idioms in a incorrect way.
我怕耽误他的时间，谈了一会儿就告辞了。
Wǒ pà dānwù tā de shíjiān，tán le yíhuìr jiù gàocí le。
I took leave after a brief talk so as not to take up too much of his time.
由于航班延误，原定明天一早的会议需改定时间。
Yóuyú hángbān yánwù，yuándìng míngtiān yìzǎo de huìyì xū gǎidìng shíjiān。
Due the flight delay, the meeting next morning needs to be rescheduled.

Duì gǔjí shǐliào de gōujī gōngzuò yào yánjǐn、kēxué de jìnxíng，yǐmiǎn wùdǎo hòurén。
We should proceed in the compilation of ancient books and files carefully and scientifically so as not to mislead later generations.
理论上的错误必然导致实践上的失败。
Lǐlùn shàng de cuòwù bìrán dǎozhì shíjiàn shàng de shībài。
Errors in theory inevitably result in failures in practice.
一个微小的计算错误将会导致失之毫厘，谬以千里的结果。
Yígè wēixiǎo de jìsuàn cuòwù jiāng huì dǎozhì shīzhīháolí，miùyǐqiānlǐ de jiéguǒ。
A minor mistake in calculation might lead to serious consequences.
这个错误由我们领导上负责。
Zhège cuòwù yóu wǒmen lǐngdǎoshangfùzé。
We of the leadership must accept responsibility for this mistake.
错误常常是正确的先导。
Cuòwù chángchángshì zhèngquè de xiāndǎo。
Error is often the precursor of what is correct.
有些领导凭长官意志在错误的道路上一错再错。
Yǒuxiē lǐngdǎo píng zhǎngguān yìzhì zài cuòwù de dàolù shàng yícuò zàicuò。
Some of the leaders made continual mistakes because they stuck to their individual ideas.
好的领导总是承认自己的错误。
Hǎo de lǐngdǎo zǒngshì chéngrèn zìjǐ de cuòwù.
A good leader always acknowledges his or her mistakes.
在老师的教导下，我深醒了自己的错误。
Zài lǎoshī de jiàodǎo xià，wǒ shēnxǐng le zìjǐ de cuòwù。
Under the teacher\'s instructions, I fully realized my mistakes.
尽管领导一再教育，他仍然不觉自己犯了一个严重的错误。
Jǐnguǎn lǐngdǎo yízài jiàoyù，tā réngrán bùjué zìjǐ fàn le yígè yánzhòng de cuòwù。
Though criticized by the leaders again and again, he still did no realize that he had made a big mistake.
误导。
目前许多所谓历史剧与史实出入很大，容易对青年造成误导。
耸动听闻，误导舆论。
广告不应误导消费者。
译者误译必将导致读者误解。
经过再三劝导，他终于改正了错误。
对误入歧途的年轻人要耐心引导。
He attacked the press for misleading the public.
他抨击新闻界误导公众。
to mislead sb about sth
在某事上误导某人

由于一个错误导致了肾上腺素的发现。
Chronical prejudice will mislead you in making judgment on this event.

那位助手没有故意误导原告。
His instructions deliberately gave them the wrong set.
Tā de zhǐdǎo shì yǒuyì duì tāmen de wùdǎo。
他的指导是有意对他们的误导。
Statistics can be presented in ways that are misleading.
Tǒngjìshùzì yě kěnéng yǐ wùdǎoxìng de fāngshì chéngxiàn chūlái。
统计数字也可能以误导性的方式呈现出来。
It was common practice to lead off the young ones, and teach them bad habits.
Chángjiàn de zuòfǎ shì，wùdǎo hé xiàng niánqīngrén chuánshòu huàixíguàn。
常见的做法是，误导和向年轻人传授坏习惯。
Conjurers are experts at misdirection.
Móshùshī shì wùdǎo fāngmiàn de hángjiā。
魔术师是误导方面的行家。
His plan of attack was misguided.
Tā de jìngōng jìhuà bèi wùdǎo le。
他的进攻计划被误导了。
The idealization of rural life was very misleading.
Duì nóngcūnshēnghuó de lǐxiǎng huà fēicháng jùyǒu wùdǎo zuòyòng。

But this is misleading.
dàn zhè jùyǒu wùdǎo xìng。

他的教导很明确，错误的思想导致错误的行为。
This mistake will bankrupt the firm.
Zhèzhǒng cuòwù huì dǎozhì gōngsī pòchǎn。
这种错误会导致公司破产。
They charged off this big loss to the manager\'s misleading.
Tāmen bǎ zhège zhòngdà sǔnshī guīyīnyú jīnglǐ de cuòwù lǐngdǎo。
他们把这个重大损失归因于经理的错误领导。
The erroneous resolution of the emperor led to a disaster.
国王的错误决定导致了灾难。
His graphs demonstrate how small errors in reading can lead to large errors in depth.
Tā de túbiǎo chǎnshì le yuèdú zhōng jíxiǎo de cuòwù shì rúhé zuìzhōng dǎozhì chèdǐ yánzhòng de cuòwù de。
他的图表阐释了阅读中极小的错误是如何最终导致彻底严重的错误的。

The teacher\'s action was corrective rather than instructional.

理论上的错误必然导致实践上的失败。

Dìngzhèng le dìyī bǎn zhōng de cuòwù。

diūdiào cuòwù guāndiǎn

改正错误
gǎizhèng cuòwù

jíshí jiūzhèngcuòwù
