Wǒ zài shuōmíngyíxià，miǎn de yǐnqǐ wùhuì。
To avoid any misunderstanding, let me explain once again.
真理是在同谬误作斗争中间发展起来的
Zhēnlǐ shì zài tóngmiùwù zuò dòuzhēngzhōngjiān fāzhǎn qǐlái de。
Truth develops through its struggle against falsehood.
谬种流传，误人不浅。
Miùzhǒng liúchuán，wù rén bùqiǎn。
The dissemination of error does people great harm.
他不但不承认错误，反而替自己抹粉。
Tā bú dàn bùchéngrèn cuòwù，fǎn\'ér tì zìjǐ mǒ fěn。
He not only refused to admit his mistake but even tried to whitewash himself.
他有错误，就该批评，有什么磨不开的？
Tā yǒu cuòwù，jiù gāi pīpíng，yǒu shénme mòbukāi de? 
If he\'s made mistakes, you should criticize him and not let personal considerations get in your way.
犯错误是难免的，你认真改了就好了。
Fàn cuòwù shì nánmiǎn de，nǐ rènzhēn gǎi le jiù hǎo le。
Mistakes are hard to avoid, but if you correct them conscientiously, things will be all right.
偶然误差
ǒurán wùchā
accidental error
这个错误由我一人负责，跟旁人不相干。
Zhège cuòwù yóu wǒ yì rén fùzé，gēn pángrén bùxiānggān。
I alone should be held responsible for the mistake; no one else has anything to do with it.
批判错误路线
pīpàn cuòwù lùxiàn
criticize the erroneous line
批评缺点和错误
pīpíngquēdiǎn hé cuòwù
criticize shortcomings and mistakes
这篇文章拼排有错误。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngpīnpái yǒu cuòwù。
There is something wrong in the composition and layout of this article.
我们对待在工作中犯过错误的人采取规劝态度，使之翻然改进，弃旧图新。
Wǒmen duìdài zài gōngzuò zhōng fànguò cuòwù de rén cǎiqǔ guīquàn tàidu，shǐ zhī fānrán gǎijìn，qìjiùtúxīn。
Our attitude towards any person who has made mistakes in his work should be one of persuasion in order to help him change and start afresh.
千方百计掩盖错误
qiānfāngbǎijì yǎngài cuòwù
use all one\'s ingenuity to cover up one\'s mistakes
切实改正错误
qièshí gǎizhèngcuòwù
correct one\'s mistakes in real earnest
要认真检查自己的错误，不要轻描淡写。
Yào rènzhēn jiǎnchá zìjǐ de cuòwù，búyào qīngmiáodànxiě。
You should criticize your own mistakes earnestly, and not just touch on them lightly.
对错误一定要揭发，不讲情面。
Duì cuòwù yídìng yào jiēfā，bùjiǎng qíngmiàn。
The mistakes must be exposed without sparing anyone\'s sensibilities.
我们可以确证他的论断是错误的。
Wǒmen kěyǐ quèzhèng tā de lùnduàn shì cuòwù de。
We can prove conclusively that his assertion is wrong.
这容易引起误会。
Zhè róngyì yǐnqǐ wùhuì。
This is liable to cause misunderstanding.
这件事应当立即上报公安部，不容延误。
Zhèjiànshì yīngdānglìjí shàngbào gōng\'ānbù，bùróngyánwù。
This matter should be reported, without delay, to the Ministry of Public Security.
判断失误
pànduàn shīwù
an error in judgment; a misjudgment
接球失误
jiē qiú shīwù
muff (or fumble) a ball
发球失误
fāqiú shīwù
a serving fault
十之八九他是误会了。
Shízhībājiǔ tā shì wùhuì le。
Most likely there is some misunderstanding on his part.
这种错误理论在群众中的市场越来越小。
Zhèzhǒng cuòwù lǐlùn zài qúnzhòng zhōng de shìchǎng yuèláiyuèxiǎo。
This erroneous theory finds less and less support among the people.
随时纠正错误
suíshí jiūzhèng cuòwù
correct mistakes as soon as they occur
误会消除后，两人的关系更铁了。
Wùhuì xiāochú hòu，liǎngrén de guānxì gèngtiě le。
With the misunderstanding cleared up, the two became even closer.
他对自己的错误感到很痛心。
Tā duì zìjǐ de cuòwù gǎndào hěn tòngxīn。
He keenly regretted his mistake.
顽固地坚持错误立场
wángù de jiānchí cuòwù lìchǎng
stubbornly cling to one\'s wrong position
迅速办理，不得违误。
Xùnsù bànlǐ，bùdé wéiwù。
This is to be acted upon without delay.
核查无误
héchá wúwù 
checked and found correct
这种行为无疑是错误的。
Zhèzhǒng xíngwéi wúyí shì cuòwù de。
Such conduct is undoubtedly wrong.
有了错误不能捂捂盖盖。
Yǒu le cuòwù bùnéng wǔwugàigai。
You shouldn\'t try to cover up your mistakes.
误把友谊当爱情
wù bǎ yǒuyì dāngàiqíng
mistake friendship for love
误了火车
wù le huǒchē 
miss a train
生产学习两不误。
Shēnɡchǎn xuéxí liǎnɡ bú wù。 
Neither production nor study is to suffer.
误差不超过千分之三毫米
wùchā bùchāoguò qiānfēnzhīsān háomǐ
with a tolerance of less than three-thousandths of a millimetre
平均误差
píngjūn wùchā 
mean error; average error
仪器误差
yíqì wùchā 
instrumental error
概然误差
gàirán wùchā 
probable error
飞机误点了。
Fēijī wùdiǎn le。
The plane is overdue (or late).
火车误点十分钟。
Huǒchē wùdiǎn shí fēn zhōng。
The train was ten minutes late (or behind schedule).
你误会了我的意思。
Nǐ wùhuì le wǒ de yìsi。
You\'ve mistaken my meaning.
小小的误会
xiǎoxiǎo de wùhuì 
a minor misunderstanding
你误解了我的话。
Nǐ wùjiě le wǒ de huà。
You misunderstood what I said.
产生误解
chǎnshēngwùjiě 
produce misunderstanding
消除误解
xiāochú wùjiě 
clear up a misunderstanding
这项工程误期了。
Zhè xiàng gōngchéngwùqī le。
The project is behind schedule.
误诊病例
wùzhěn bìnɡlì 
missed case
错误常常是正确的先导。
Cuòwù chángchángshì zhèngquè de xiāndǎo。
Error is often the precursor of what is correct.
不要嫌弃犯过错误的同志。
Búyào xiánqì fànguò cuòwù de tóngzhì。
Don\'t cold-shoulder comrades who have made mistakes.
坚持真理，修正错误
jiānchí zhēnlǐ，xiūzhèngcuòwù 
uphold the truth and correct one\'s mistakes
延误时机
yánwù shíjī
miss an opportunity because of a delay
延误时日
yánwù shírì
lose time
掩饰错误
yǎnshì cuòwù
gloss over (or cover up) one\'s mistakes
对待犯错误的同志，要批评帮助，不能一棍子打死。
Duìdài fàn cuòwù de tóngzhì，yào pīpíngbāngzhù，bùnéng yí gùnzi dǎsǐ。
Instead of bludgeoning our erring comrades, we should help them with criticism.
错误一经发现，就应立即纠正。
Cuòwù yìjīngfāxiàn jiù yīnglìjí jiūzhèng。
Mistakes should be corrected as soon as detected.
贻误战机
yíwù zhànjī 
bungle the chance of winning a battle; forfeit a chance for combat
贻误青年
yíwù qīnɡnián 
mislead young people
因循坐误
yīnxún zuòwù 
sit back and allow the situation to deteriorate; procrastinate until it is too late
隐瞒错误
yǐnmán cuòwù 
conceal one\'s mistakes
发现错误应立即纠正。
Fāxiàn cuòwù yīnglìjí jiūzhèng。
When a mistake is discovered, it should be corrected at once.
硬不承认错误
yìnɡ bù chénɡrèn cuòwù 
obstinately refuse to admit one\'s error
由粗心大意造成的错误
yóu cūxīndàyì zàochéng de cuòwù 
mistakes due to carelessness
不能原谅的错误
bùnéng yuánliàng de cuòwù
an unpardonable mistake
误了约期
wù le yuēqī
fail to keep the appointment
本词典虽非草率之作，但错误仍在所难免。
Běncídiǎn suī fēi cǎoshuài zhīzuò，dàn cuòwù réng zàisuǒnánmiǎn。
This dictionary, despite the care exercised in compiling it, cannot in the nature of things be free from error.
真糟糕，误了火车啦！
Zhēn zāogāo，wù le huǒchē la！
What bad luck! We\'ve missed the train.
错误总是遮盖不住的。
Cuòwù zǒngshì zhēgài bú zhù de。
Mistakes can never be hidden.
大胆承认错误，不要遮遮掩掩。
Dàdǎn chéngrèn cuòwù，búyào zhē zhe yǎnyǎn。
Admit your mistakes courageously. Don\'t try to cover them up.
要以“治病救人”的态度帮助犯错误的同志。
Yào yǐ“zhìbìngjiùrén”de tàidu bāngzhù fàn cuòwù de tóngzhì。
To help comrades who have made mistakes, we should adopt the approach of &quot;curing the sickness to save the patient&quot;.
阻留误点的乘客
zǔliú wùdiǎn de chéngkè 
held-up, delayed passengers
耽误
dānwù
delay; hold up
误会
wùhuì
misunderstand; mistake; misconstrue
我们揭发自己工作中的错误。目的是为了改正。
Wǒmen jiēfā zìjǐ gōngzuò zhōng de cuòwù。Mùdì shì wèi le gǎizhèng。
We expose mistakes in our work in order to correct them.
刊误
kānwù
correct errors in printing
误伤
wùshāng
accidentally injure
正误
zhèngwù
correct (typographical) errors
年轻人犯了错误，上帝也会宽恕。
Niánqīngrén fànle cuòwù，shàngdì yĕ huì kuānshù。
犯了这么严重的错误，你就等着挨板子吧。
Fàn le zhème yánzhòng de cuòwù，nǐ jiù děng zhe áibǎnzi ba。
You will get your ass whipped for makiing such a mistake.
面对周围人的误会，他百口莫辩。
Miànduì zhōuwéi rén de wùhuì，tā bǎikǒu mòbiàn。
He couldn\'t get rid of people\'s misunderstanding, no matter what he said.
杯中之物不要多饮，否则既伤身体也容易误事。
Bēizhōngzhīwù búyào duōyǐn，fǒuzé jì shāngshēntǐ yě róngyì wùshì。
Too much wine can do harm to one\'s health. What\'s more, it may also cause mistakes.
备货不足是我们店里工作的失误。
Bèihuò bùzú shì wǒmen diànlǐ gōngzuò de shīwù。
The shortage of goods is due to the negligence of our staff.
尽管领导一再教育，他仍然不觉自己犯了一个严重的错误。
Jǐnguǎn lǐngdǎo yízài jiàoyù，tā réngrán bùjué zìjǐ fàn le yígè yánzhòng de cuòwù。
Though criticized by the leaders again and again, he still did no realize that he had made a big mistake.
我们应该抛弃舛误的观念。
Wǒmen yīnggāi pāoqì chuǎnwù de guānniàn。
We should discard erroneous concepts.
别误了给庄稼施春肥啊。
Bié wù le gěi zhuāngjià shīchūnféi a。
Don\'t be late for spreading spring fertilizer for the crops.
地方主义的错误思想必须要得到及时纠正。
Dìfāngzhǔyì de cuòwù sīxiǎng bìxū yào dédào jíshí jiūzhèng。
The false ideology of localism must be corrected quickly.
我犯憷主要是因为没有经验，怕干不好反而耽误了你的事。
Wǒ fànchù zhǔyào shì yīnwèi méiyǒu jīngyàn，pà gàn bùhǎo fǎn\'ér dānwù le nǐ de shì。
Due to my lack of experience, I was nervous for fear that I might screw the whole thing up.
别在这儿犯傻了，时间都让你耽误了。
Bié zài zhè\'ér fànshǎ le，shíjiān dōu ràng nǐ dānwù le。
Don\'t stay here staring blankly, we are running out of time.
由于航班延误，原定明天一早的会议需改定时间。
Yóuyú hángbān yánwù，yuándìng míngtiān yìzǎo de huìyì xū gǎidìng shíjiān。
Due the flight delay, the meeting next morning needs to be rescheduled.
我误解了你的好意，真是感愧万分。
Wǒ wùjiě le nǐ de hǎoyì，zhēnshì gǎnkuì wànfēn。
I feel deeply indebted to you and ashamed of myself because I misunderstood you.
我误会了你，理当告罪。
Wǒ wùhuì le nǐ，lǐdāng gàozuì。
I beg your pardon for misunderstanding you.
对古籍史料的勾稽工作要严谨、科学地进行，以免误导后人。
Duì gǔjí shǐliào de gōujī gōngzuò yào yánjǐn、kēxué de jìnxíng，yǐmiǎn wùdǎo hòurén。
We should proceed in the compilation of ancient books and files carefully and scientifically so as not to mislead later generations.
我们的学识有限，故此论文中多有谬误之处，还请您批评指正。
Wǒmen de xuéshí yǒuxiàn，gù cǐ lùnwén zhōng duō yǒu miùwù zhī chù，hái qǐng nín pīpíng zhǐzhèng。
Our knowledge has certain boundaries. Therefore, there must be many mistakes in this paper and we are awaiting your criticism and corrections.
古时候，一人犯罪要诖误全家人。
Gǔ shíhou，yì rén fànzuì yào guàwù quánjiārén。
In the old times, when one committed a crime, all the family would be punished.
弧线球易使裁判产生错误判断。
Húxiànqiú yì shǐ cáipàn chǎnshēng cuòwù pànduàn.
Arcing balls are inclined to mislead umpires to incorrect judgements.
人与人之间需要互通，这样才能避免误解的产生。
Rén yǔ rén zhījiān xūyào hùtōng，zhèyàng cáinéng bìmiǎn wùjiě de chǎnshēng。
People need communications. Only in this way can misunderstandings be avoided.
轻易地原谅自己的错误会使自己不汲汲进取，反而退步。
Qīngyì de yuánliàng zìjǐ de cuòwù huì shǐ zìjǐ bùjíjí jìnqǔ，fǎnér tuìbù。
It\'ll make you go backwards instead of actively progressing if you often forgive your own mistakes easily.
由于比赛中最后一局的失误，他与冠军失之交臂。
Yóuyú bǐsài zhōng zuìhòu yì jú de shīwù，tā yǔ guànjūn shīzhī jiāobì。
He would have been the champion if he hadn\'t lost the game in the last round.
我们把猫的叫声误听成是警号了。
Wǒmen bǎ māo de jiàoshēng wùtīng chéng shì jǐnghào le。
We took the mew of a cat as a sound of warning.
重新勘定的辞典共校正出字词错误72处。
Chóngxīn kāndìng de cídiǎn gòng jiàozhèng chū zìcí cuòwù qīshíèrchù。
During the re-collation of the dictionary, 72 misuses of words were found.
凡教材有误，一定要及时勘正！
Fán jiàocái yǒu wù，yídìng yào jíshí kānzhèng！
If there is any mistake in the textbooks, the mistake must be proofread and corrected immediately.
老虎机害人不浅，使许多青少年误入歧途。
Lǎohǔjī hàirén bùqiǎn，shǐ xǔduō qīngshàonián wùrù qítú。
Slot machines do great harm to people, and lead many adolescents astray.
他也为自己的错误流下了眼泪，我就不落忍再批评他了。
Tā yě wèi zìjǐ de cuòwù liúxià le yǎnlèi，wǒ jiù bùlàorěn zài pīpíng tā le。
He has already shed tears for his mistakes, and I can\'t bear to scold him any more.
我们不能只停留在表面问题的分析，那可能会走向误区，而是要挖掘里层规律性的东西。
Wǒmen bùnéng zhǐ tíngliú zài biǎomiàn wèntí de fēnxī，nà kěnéng huì zǒu xiàng wùqū，érshì yào wājué lǐcéng guīlǜxìng de dōngxi。
We can\'t only analyze the surface of the problems, which may mislead us. Instead, we should dig into the underlying principles.
这个部件经过量规的严格检验后没发现任何错误。
Zhège bùjiàn jīngguò liángguī de yángé jiǎnyàn hòu méi fāxiàn rènhé cuòwù。
The part has gone through careful check by a gauge, and there is nothing wrong with it.
由于他的漏诊，耽误了病人的病情。
Yóuyú tā de lòuzhěn，dānwù le bìngrén de bìngqíng。
He failed to pinpoint a disease in his diagnosis, and thus the patient’s disease was exacerbated.
这篇文章鲁鱼亥豕，错误百出。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng lǔyú hàishǐ，cuòwù bǎichū。
In this article, a lot of clerical and typographical errors are made through confusing similar characters.
对于过去犯下的错误，他今天才猛省过来，惭愧不已。
Duìyú guòqù fànxià de cuòwù，tā jīntiān cái měngxǐng guòlái，cánkuì bùyǐ。
Today he suddenly realized  all the mistakes he had made in the past and felt much abashed.
这件事情从一开始就把我引入了迷误之中。
Zhèjiàn shìqing cóng yìkāishǐ jiù bǎ wǒ yǐnrù le míwù zhī zhōng。
I took the wrong path from the very beginning of this matter.
他被金钱所迷眼，所以才会犯这样的错误。
Tā bèi jīnqián suǒ míyǎn，suǒyǐ cáihuì fàn zhèyàng de cuòwù。
He was obsessed by lust for money, so he made a mistake.
男尊女卑是封建社会遗留下来的思想观念，它错误地认为男人比女人高贵。
Nánzūn nǚbēi shì fēngjiànshèhuì yíliú xiàlái de sīxiǎng guānniàn，tā cuòwù de rènwéi nánrén bǐ nǚrén gāoguì。
The ideology of male domination, and female subordination is handed down from feudal society. It wrongly holds that males are nobler than females.
他考试时误将千分号写了成百分号。
Tā kǎoshì shí wùjiāng qiānfēnhào xiě le chéng bǎifēnhào。
He wrote the per cent sign instead of the per thousand sign mistakenly during the exam.
由于决策失误，我们错过了最好的戎机。
Yóuyú juécè shīwù，wǒmen cuòguò le zuìhǎo de róngjī。
Due to mistakes in decision-making, we missed the best opportunity to win the battle.
有的时候我们要能够容错，不要揪着对方的失误不放。
Yǒu de shíhou wǒmen yào nénggòu róngcuò，búyào jiū zhe duìfāng de shīwù búfàng。
Sometimes we should tolerate people\'s mistakes instead of latching on to them.
这个乳油是外用的护肤品，可别让宝宝误食啊。
Zhège rǔyóu shì wàiyòng de hùfūpǐn，kě bié ràng bǎobao wùshí a。
The face cream is for protecting skin and for external use only. Don\'t let the baby eat it by mistake.
你应该好好申敕他一顿，让他知道这样做是错误的。
Nǐ yīnggāi hǎohao shēnchì tā yídùn，ràng tā zhīdao zhèyàng zuò shì cuòwù de。
You should give him a serious dressing down to let him know that this is wrong.
在老师的教导下，我深醒了自己的错误。
Zài lǎoshī de jiàodǎo xià，wǒ shēnxǐng le zìjǐ de cuòwù。
Under the teacher\'s instructions, I fully realized my mistakes.
他如今犯下这样的错误，都是因为少年失教。
Tā rújīn fànxià zhèyàng de cuòwù，dōushì yīnwèi shàonián shījiào。
It was because of lack of education in childhood that he committed such a blunder now.
一个微小的计算错误将会导致失之毫厘，谬以千里的结果。
Yígè wēixiǎo de jìsuàn cuòwù jiāng huì dǎozhì shīzhīháolí，miùyǐqiānlǐ de jiéguǒ。
A minor mistake in calculation might lead to serious consequences.
有错误就该承认并改正，你怎么能文过饰非呢？
Yǒu cuòwù jiù gāi chéngrèn bìng gǎizhèng，nǐ zěnme néng wénguò shìfēi ne？
You should admit and correct your mistakes rather than cover them up.
工作失误明明是他一个人造成的，却要我们全体受过，这很不公平啊。
Gōngzuò shīwù míngmíng shì tā yígèrén zàochéng de，què yào wǒmen quántǐ shòuguò，zhè hěnbùgōngpíng a。
It is really unfair to let all of us take the blame when the error was simply made by him alone.
对于工作上的失误，他坦称那是他的疏忽。
Duìyú gōngzuò shàng de shīwù，tā tǎnchēng nà shì tā de shūhū。
He frankly admits that it is his negligence that has caused the error.
古代人们不了解月食出现的原因，误以为是天狗把月亮吃掉了。
Gǔdài rénmen bùliǎojiě yuèshí chūxiàn de yuányīn，wù yǐwéi shì tiāngǒu bǎ yuèliàng chīdiào le。
People in ancient times knew nothing about how the lunar eclipse came into being. They falsely believed that it was because a dog in heaven swallowed the moon.
你说的这句话可能会使听者产生误解。
Nǐ shuō de zhèjùhuà kěnéng huì shǐ tīngzhě chǎnshēng wùjiě。
What you\'ve said may cause misunderstandings in the listeners.
老师正在纠正他吐音的错误。
Lǎoshī zhèngzài jiūzhèng tā tǔyīn de cuòwù。
The teacher is correcting his pronunciation errors.
由于犯了重大错误，他被处以开除团籍的惩罚。
Yóuyú fàn le zhòngdà cuòwù，tā bèi chǔyǐ kāichú tuánjí de chéngfá。
He was expelled from the Communist Youth League due to a blunder.
请你把这篇文章上的脱误之处加以改正。
Qǐng nǐ bǎ zhèpiān wénzhāng shàng de tuōwù zhī chù jiāyǐ gǎizhèng。
Please correct the omissions and errors in this article.
国王对他的错误网开三面，决定从宽发落。
Guówáng duì tā de cuòwù wǎngkāi sān miàn，juédìng cóngkuān fāluò。
The king was very lenient towards his error, and decided to give him the lightest punishment.
任何时候我们都不能把错误诿过于别人。
Rènhé shíhou wǒmen dōu bùnéng bǎ cuòwù wěiguò yú biérén。
We should never shift blame onto others.
这一点小失误无伤大体，只是下次要注意了。
Zhè yìdiǎn xiǎo shīwù wúshāng dàtǐ，zhǐshì xiàcì yào zhùyì le。
This lapses is okay, but you must pay attention to it next time.
强尼今天之所以误班，完全是因为火车晚点。
Qiángní jīntiān zhīsuǒyǐ wùbān，wánquán shì yīnwèi huǒchē wǎndiǎn。
Johnny is late for work today because his train was delayed.
公司的误餐补助是每年年底一次性发放的。
Gōngsī de wùcān bǔzhù shì měinián niándǐ yícìxìng fāfàng de。
The company\'s meal allowance are handed out at the end of the year.
就因为你总是拖拖拉拉的，我们才会误车。
Jiù yīnwèi nǐ zǒngshì tuōtuōlālā de，wǒmen cái huì wùchē。
We missed the train because you dragged your feet.
公交公司已经发出通知，大雾将造成部分线路误车。
Gōngjiāo gōngsī yǐjing fāchū tōngzhī，dàwù jiāng zàochéng bùfen xiànlù wùchē。
The bus company announced that the fog would delay certain routes.
这些消息是从哪里听来的？全都是误传嘛！
Zhèxiē xiāoxi shì cóng nǎlǐ tīnglái de？Quán dōushì wùchuán ma！
Where did you get these information which were misrepresented?
医生的误断是发生这场医疗事故的主要原因。
Yīshēng de wùduàn shì fāshēng zhèchǎng yīliáo shìgù de zhǔyào yuányīn。
The main reason for this medical accident is the doctor\'s misjudgement.
这段文字中存在很多误码，根本无法读懂。
Zhè duàn wénzì zhōng cúnzài hěnduō wùmǎ，gēnběn wúfǎ dúdǒng。
There are many unrecognizable parts in this passage.
观众对主裁判的两次误判表示严重不满。
Guānzhòng duì zhǔcáipàn de liǎng cì wùpàn biǎoshì yánzhòng bùmǎn.
The audience was extremely dissatisfied with the two incorrect rulings of the chief umpire.
小张和小李长得很像，他总是把小张误认为是小李。
Xiǎo Zhāng hé Xiǎo Lǐ zhǎng de hěn xiàng，tā zǒngshì bǎ Xiǎo Zhāng wùrènwéi shì Xiǎo Lǐ。
Xiao Zhang and Xiao Li resemble each other very much, so he often takes Xiao Zhang for Xiao Li.
他因为误食菌类食物，引起食物中毒。
Tā yīnwèi wùshí jūnlèi shíwù，yǐnqǐ shíwù zhòngdú。
He was poisoned by the poisonous mushrooms.
有的时候译著中出现几处误译是在所难免的。
Yǒu de shíhou yìzhù zhōng chūxiàn jǐchǔ wùyì shì zàisuǒ nánmiǎn de。
Sometimes it is inevitable to find incorrect translations in a translated book.
如果你再细心点的话，完全可以避免这些误译。
Rúguǒ nǐ zài xìxīn diǎn de huà，wánquán kěyǐ bìmiǎn zhèxiē wùyì。
If you were more careful, you could have avoided these incorrect translations.
有的时候，误用成语是会贻笑大方的。
Yǒu de shíhou，wùyòng chéngyǔ shì huì yíxiào dàfāng de。
You can make yourself a laughing stock by using idioms in a incorrect way.
主裁判又一次误判，只听场外传来一阵唏嘘声。
Zhǔcáipàn yòu yícì wùpàn，zhǐtīng chǎngwài chuánlái yízhèn xīxūshēng。
The chief umpire misruled again, and the crowd booed loundly.
习焉不察容易使人忽视一些常见错误。
Xíyān bùchá róngyì shǐ rén hūshì yìxiē chángjiàn cuòwù。
People are unware of the common mistakes once they are too accustomed to them.
他忽略了一个重要的细故，致使结论错误。
Tā hūlüè le yígè zhòngyào de xìgù，zhìshǐ jiélùn cuòwù。
He neglected an important condition which led to a incorrect conclusion.
由于营销策略失误，今年商品的利润下滑50%。
Yóuyú yíngxiāo cèlüè shīwù，jīnnián shāngpǐn de lìrùn xiàhuá bǎifēnzhī wǔshí。
Due to the wrong sales strategy, the profit of this year\'s goods dropped by 50%.
这件事事关重大，容不得纤毫失误！
Zhèjiànshì shìguān zhòngdà，róngbùdé xiānháo shīwù！
This matter is of great significance, thus there is no matgin for error.
因为工作中屡犯错误，他被销差了。
Yīnwéi gōngzuò zhōng lǚfàn cuòwù，tā bèi xiāochāi le。
He was fired, as he continued to make mistakes in his work.
由于犯了错误，他被卸除了职务。
Yóuyú fàn le cuòwù，tā bèi xièchú le zhíwù。
He was relieved of his office due to his mistakes.
用演绎法推算的结果是错误的。
Yòng yǎnyìfǎ tuīsuàn de jiéguǒ shì cuòwù de。
The result calculated by the deductive method is wrong.
处理要务要及时，延误了你能担责任吗？
Chǔlǐ yàowù yào jíshí，yánwù le nǐ néng dān zérèn ma？
Urgent business should be handled in time. If delayed, nobody can take responsibility.
我们犯了错误不要紧，重要的是以后要引为鉴戒。
Wǒmen fàn le cuòwù bú yàojǐn，zhòngyào de shì yǐhòu yào yǐnwéi jiànjiè。
It doesn\'t matter that we make mistakes, what matters is that we  take warning from it.
由于误抽被注入大麻的香烟，小王不幸成了瘾君子。
Yóuyú wùchōu bèi zhùrù dàmá de xiāngyān，Xiǎo Wáng búxìng chéng le yǐnjūnzǐ。
Unfortunately, Xiaowang became a drug addict after he mistakenly smoked a marijuana cigarette.
老王说起话来经常犯用词不当的错误。
Lǎo Wáng shuōqǐhuàlái jīngcháng fàn yòngcí búdàng de cuòwù。
Old Wang always uses improper language while talking.
任何时候我们都要尽量避免犯原则性错误。
Rènhé shíhou wǒmen dōuyào jìnliàng bìmiǎn fàn yuánzéxìng cuòwù。
We should try to avoid making mistakes in principle at any time.
类似的错误绝对不能再犯。
Lèisì de cuòwù juéduì bùnéng zàifàn。
The similar mistakes should never be made again.
你不但没有意识到自己的错误，反而造谣惑众！
Nǐ búdàn méiyǒu yìshídào zìjǐ de cuòwù，fǎnér zàoyáo huòzhòng！
Not only did you not realize your own mistakes, but also fabricated rumours that mislead other people.
有些领导凭长官意志在错误的道路上一错再错。
Yǒuxiē lǐngdǎo píng zhǎngguān yìzhì zài cuòwù de dàolù shàng yícuò zàicuò。
Some of the leaders made continual mistakes because they stuck to their individual ideas.
这种内包装产品的重量，正负误差控制在规范标准之内。
Zhèzhǒng nèibāozhuāng chǎnpǐn de zhòngliàng，zhèng fù wùchā kòngzhì zài guīfàn biāozhǔn zhīnèi。
For this kind of inner packing product, its positive-negative error of the weight should be controlled within the regulated limits.
我们之间可能有些误会。
Wǒmen zhījiān kěnéng yǒuxiē wùhuì。
There may be some misunderstandings between us.
他已经意识到自己的错误，向我们致歉了。
Tā yǐjing yìshí dào zìjǐ de cuòwù，xiàng wǒmen zhìqiàn le。
He has realized his mistakes, and apologized to us.
他犯了主观主义的错误，只凭自己的意志行事。
Tā fàn le zhǔguānzhǔyì de cuòwù，zhǐpíng zìjǐ de yìzhì xíngshì。
He has made a subjective mistake by acting according to his own will.
他对这次失误进行公开道歉，因为造成事故的主责在他。
Tā duì zhècì shīwù jìnxíng gōngkāi dàoqiàn，yīnwèi zàochéng shìgù de zhǔzé zài tā。
He made a public apology for this error because he was largely responsible for the accident.
虽然他犯了天大的错误，但是整个事件并不是没有转圜之机。
Suīrán tā fàn le tiāndà de cuòwù，dànshì zhěnggè shìjiàn bìngbúshì méiyǒu zhuǎn huán zhī jī。
Though he has made a huge mistake, this entire incident still can be mediated in some way.
他做事总是踟蹰不前，许多事都耽误了。
Tā zuòshì zǒngshì chíchú bùqián，xǔduō shì dōu dānwù le。
He is always hesitant to take action, which leads to the delay of many things.
误会终于解开了，双方握手言欢！
Wùhuì zhōng yú jiěkāi le，shuāngfāng wòshǒu yánhuān！
The misunderstanding was finally cleared when both sides shook hands, and made peace.
这个疑问句有严重的语法错误，请你改一改。
Zhège yíwènjù yǒu yánzhòng de yǔfǎ cuòwù，qǐng nǐ gǎiyigǎi。
The interrogative sentence has serious grammatical errors, please correct them.
许多学者最终不得不承认哲学派别只有两种，从错误的自然主义回归到经典哲学中。
Xǔduō xuézhě zuì zhōng bùdébùchéngrèn zhéxué paibié zhǐyǒu liǎng zhǒng，cóng cuòwù de zìránzhǔyì huíguī dào jīngdiǎn zhéxué zhōng。
At last, many scholars had to admit that there are two sects of philosophy and return from false naturalism to classic philosophy.
这个修订本纠正了以前版本的几个明显的错误。
Zhège xiūdìngběn jiūzhèngle yǐqián bǎnběn de jǐgè míngxiǎn de cuòwù。
This revised edition has corrected several obvious mistakes in the previous editions.
不要为自己的错误行为辩解。
Búyào wèi zìjǐde cuòwùxíngwéi biànjiě。
Don\'t try to make excuses for your mistakes.
我们之间的误会澄清了。
Wǒmen zhījiānde wùhuì chéngqīngle。
We have cleared up our misunderstanding.
因为机械故障，耽误了飞机的起飞。
Yīnwèi jīxiègùzhàng，dānwùle fēijīde qǐfēi。
The flight was delayed because of a mechanical fault.
别耽误时间！
Bié dānwùshíjiān！
Don\'t waste time!
这种错误迭有发生。
Zhèzhǒng cuòwù diéyǒufāshēng。
This sort of mistake is happening again and again.
她发觉有错误。
Tā fājué yǒucuòwù。
She discovered a mistake.
对错误的行为不能放任不管。
Duì cuòwùde xíngwéi bùnéng fàngrènbùguǎn。
Bad behaviour should not be ignored.
您费心帮我看看有没有错误。
Nín fèixīn bāng wǒ kànkàn yǒuméiyǒu cuòwù。
Can you check this for mistakes?
他睡懒觉误了火车，活该！
Tā shuìlǎnjiào wùlehuǒchē，huógāi！
He overslept and missed the train – serves him right!
在错误的地方划上红杠。
Zài cuòwùde dìfāng huàshàng hónggàng。
Where there is a mistake, mark it with a thick red line.
他的失误害得公司破产。
Tāde shīwù hàide gōngsī pòchǎn。
His mistake forced the company into bankruptcy.
既然你知道错误了，为什么不及时纠正呢？
Jìrán nǐ zhīdào cuòwù le，wèishénme bù jíshí jiūzhèng ne?
Since you knew you\'d made a mistake, why didn\'t you put it right immediately?
刊误
kānwù
correct printing errors
好的领导总是承认自己的错误。
Hǎo de lǐngdǎo zǒngshì chéngrèn zìjǐ de cuòwù.
A good leader always acknowledges his or her mistakes.

wùrù mítú
go astray

It\'s unavoidable that young people will make mistakes. The important thing is that they learn from them.

wùrùqítú

我们不能迁就这么多错误。
Wǒmen bùnéng qiānjiù zhèmeduō cuòwù.

When I make a mistake it\'s a beaut.

如果一个错误会对多个结论产生重大影响，那么这个错误就是普遍性的。

然而，这两种说法都是错误的。
Toyota has said the allegations are inaccurate and misleading.
Fēngtián biǎoshì，zhèzhǒng shuōfǎ bùshí，jùyǒu wùdǎo xìng。
丰田表示，这种说法不实，具有误导性。
But this is misleading.
dàn zhè jùyǒu wùdǎo xìng。
但这具有误导性。
查对无误
cháduì wúwù 
examined and found correct; verified
核查无误
héchá wúwù 
checked and found correct
这一点小失误无伤大体，只是下次要注意了。

这种行为无疑是错误的。

这段文字中存在很多误码，根本无法读懂。

There are many unrecognizable parts in this passage.
经过查实，确认无误。

丝毫无误。

帐目核对无误
The meaning is clear.
意思是明白无误的。
She has a sure grasp of social issues.
她对社会问题掌握得准确无误。
Many of his theories have been tested and have proved to be accurate.

他的很多理论都已经过试验，并被证实准确无误。
I saw from the station clock that I had timed my arrival just about perfectly.
Wǒ cóng zhǔ shízhōng shàng kàndào wǒ zhǔnquèwúwù de suàn hǎo le dàodá de shíjiān。
我从主时钟上看到我准确无误地算好了到达的时间。
He unerringly fixed things for us.
Tā zhǔnquèwúwù de wèi wǒmen chǔlǐle gèzhǒng wèntí。
他准确无误地为我们处理了各种问题。
no errors
无错误
Bob was able to pull off his act without any mistakes.
Bàobó kěyǐ háowúcuòwù de wánchéng tā de dòngzuò。
鲍勃可以毫无错误地完成他的动作。
I regret to inform you that due to the late arrival of my flight, I won\'t be able to join the meeting.
很抱歉通知您，因航班延误，我将无法参加会议。
An unwitting mistake may be overlooked.
Yígè wú yìshí de cuòwù kěnéng bèi hūshì le。
一个无意识的错误可能被忽视了。
His main weakness as a person is his inability to admit his mistakes.
他为人最大的弱点就在于无法承认自己的错误。
He cannot bear to seeing innocent people lead into a misunderstanding.
Tā bùnéng rěnshòu kànzhe wúgūzhīrén bèi rén wāiqū wùjiě。
他不能忍受看着无辜之人被人歪曲误解。
Some mistakes can mend, others simply not.

请你把这篇文章上的脱误之处加以改正。
Qǐng nǐ bǎ zhèpiān wénzhāng shàng de tuōwù zhī chù jiāyǐ gǎizhèng。
Please correct the omissions and errors in this article.
脱误。
There are delays of up to half an hour on Guangshun Avenue after a lorry shed its load.
卡车货物脱载，致使广顺大街交通延误半小时之久。

双方矛盾，一经挑明，乃是一场误会。

Yóuyú bǐsài zhōng zuìhòu yì jú de shīwù，tā yǔ guànjūn shīzhī jiāobì。
He would have been the champion if he hadn\'t lost the game in the last round.
判断失误
pànduàn shīwù
an error in judgment; a misjudgment
接球失误
jiē qiú shīwù
muff (or fumble) a ball
发球失误
fāqiú shīwù
a serving fault

The shortage of goods is due to the negligence of our staff.
由于决策失误，我们错过了最好的戎机。

有的时候我们要能够容错，不要揪着对方的失误不放。

Sometimes we should tolerate people\'s mistakes instead of latching on to them.
工作失误明明是他一个人造成的，却要我们全体受过，这很不公平啊。

这件事事关重大，容不得纤毫失误！

This matter is of great significance, thus there is no matgin for error.
他对这次失误进行公开道歉，因为造成事故的主责在他。

秋收秋种两不误。

cuòwù bǎi chū 
full of errors

Búyào bàozhù cuòwù guāndiǎn búfàng。

被迫承认错误
bèipò chéngrèn cuòwù

避免错误
bìmiǎn cuòwù

Errors in theory inevitably result in failures in practice.

Yǒu cuòwù jiù děi pīpíng。

Dìngzhèng le dìyī bǎn zhōng de cuòwù。
Corrections have been made to the first edition.
丢掉错误观点
diūdiào cuòwù guāndiǎn
discard mistaken views
有了错误要作自我批评，不要怕丢面子。
Yǒu le cuòwù yào zuò zìwǒpīpíng，búyào pà diūmiànzi。
Criticize yourself when you\'ve made a mistake. Don\'t be afraid of losing face.
错误一经发觉，就应改正。

Mistakes should be corrected as soon as they are detected.
不能让错误思想自由泛滥。

Under no circumstances should erroneous ideas be allowed to spread unchecked.
七分成绩，三分错误
Qī fēn chéngjì，sān fēn cuòwù。
70 per cent achievements, 30 per cent mistakes
有错误一定要改。
Yǒu cuòwù yídìng yào gǎi。
Any mistakes you\'ve made must be corrected.
改正错误
gǎizhèng cuòwù
correct one\'s mistakes

Wénzhāng yǒu le cuòwù，yīngdāng zài bàozhǐ shàng gēngzhèng。
If there is a mistake in any of the articles, the newspaper should correct it.

gūjì cuòwù

Bùyīnggāi gūxī tā de cuòwù。
We shouldn\'t be indulgent towards his mistakes.

使错误没有扩大化

他不但不承认错误，反而替自己抹粉。

He not only refused to admit his mistake but even tried to whitewash himself.
他有错误，就该批评，有什么磨不开的？
Tā yǒu cuòwù，jiù gāi pīpíng，yǒu shénme mòbukāi de? 
If he\'s made mistakes, you should criticize him and not let personal considerations get in your way.
犯错误是难免的，你认真改了就好了。
Fàn cuòwù shì nánmiǎn de，nǐ rènzhēn gǎi le jiù hǎo le。
Mistakes are hard to avoid, but if you correct them conscientiously, things will be all right.
这个错误由我一人负责，跟旁人不相干。
Zhège cuòwù yóu wǒ yì rén fùzé，gēn pángrén bùxiānggān。
I alone should be held responsible for the mistake; no one else has anything to do with it.
批判错误路线
pīpàn cuòwù lùxiàn

批评缺点和错误
pīpíngquēdiǎn hé cuòwù
criticize shortcomings and mistakes
这篇文章拼排有错误。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngpīnpái yǒu cuòwù。
There is something wrong in the composition and layout of this article.
我们对待在工作中犯过错误的人采取规劝态度，使之翻然改进，弃旧图新。
Wǒmen duìdài zài gōngzuò zhōng fànguò cuòwù de rén cǎiqǔ guīquàn tàidu，shǐ zhī fānrán gǎijìn，qìjiùtúxīn。
Our attitude towards any person who has made mistakes in his work should be one of persuasion in order to help him change and start afresh.
千方百计掩盖错误
qiānfāngbǎijì yǎngài cuòwù
use all one\'s ingenuity to cover up one\'s mistakes
切实改正错误
qièshí gǎizhèngcuòwù
correct one\'s mistakes in real earnest
要认真检查自己的错误，不要轻描淡写。
Yào rènzhēn jiǎnchá zìjǐ de cuòwù，búyào qīngmiáodànxiě。
You should criticize your own mistakes earnestly, and not just touch on them lightly.
对错误一定要揭发，不讲情面。
Duì cuòwù yídìng yào jiēfā，bùjiǎng qíngmiàn。
The mistakes must be exposed without sparing anyone\'s sensibilities.
我们可以确证他的论断是错误的。
Wǒmen kěyǐ quèzhèng tā de lùnduàn shì cuòwù de。
We can prove conclusively that his assertion is wrong.
这种错误理论在群众中的市场越来越小。
Zhèzhǒng cuòwù lǐlùn zài qúnzhòng zhōng de shìchǎng yuèláiyuèxiǎo。
This erroneous theory finds less and less support among the people.
随时纠正错误
suíshí jiūzhèng cuòwù
correct mistakes as soon as they occur
他对自己的错误感到很痛心。
Tā duì zìjǐ de cuòwù gǎndào hěn tòngxīn。
He keenly regretted his mistake.
顽固地坚持错误立场
wángù de jiānchí cuòwù lìchǎng
stubbornly cling to one\'s wrong position
这种行为无疑是错误的。
Zhèzhǒng xíngwéi wúyí shì cuòwù de。
Such conduct is undoubtedly wrong.
有了错误不能捂捂盖盖。
Yǒu le cuòwù bùnéng wǔwugàigai。
You shouldn\'t try to cover up your mistakes.
错误常常是正确的先导。
Cuòwù chángchángshì zhèngquè de xiāndǎo。
Error is often the precursor of what is correct.
不要嫌弃犯过错误的同志。
Búyào xiánqì fànguò cuòwù de tóngzhì。
Don\'t cold-shoulder comrades who have made mistakes.
坚持真理，修正错误
jiānchí zhēnlǐ，xiūzhèngcuòwù 
uphold the truth and correct one\'s mistakes
掩饰错误
yǎnshì cuòwù
gloss over (or cover up) one\'s mistakes
对待犯错误的同志，要批评帮助，不能一棍子打死。
Duìdài fàn cuòwù de tóngzhì，yào pīpíngbāngzhù，bùnéng yí gùnzi dǎsǐ。
Instead of bludgeoning our erring comrades, we should help them with criticism.
错误一经发现，就应立即纠正。
Cuòwù yìjīngfāxiàn jiù yīnglìjí jiūzhèng。
Mistakes should be corrected as soon as detected.
隐瞒错误
yǐnmán cuòwù 
conceal one\'s mistakes
发现错误应立即纠正。
Fāxiàn cuòwù yīnglìjí jiūzhèng。
When a mistake is discovered, it should be corrected at once.
硬不承认错误
yìnɡ bù chénɡrèn cuòwù 
obstinately refuse to admit one\'s error
由粗心大意造成的错误
yóu cūxīndàyì zàochéng de cuòwù 
mistakes due to carelessness
不能原谅的错误
bùnéng yuánliàng de cuòwù
an unpardonable mistake
本词典虽非草率之作，但错误仍在所难免。
Běncídiǎn suī fēi cǎoshuài zhīzuò，dàn cuòwù réng zàisuǒnánmiǎn。
This dictionary, despite the care exercised in compiling it, cannot in the nature of things be free from error.
错误总是遮盖不住的。
Cuòwù zǒngshì zhēgài bú zhù de。
Mistakes can never be hidden.
大胆承认错误，不要遮遮掩掩。
Dàdǎn chéngrèn cuòwù，búyào zhē zhe yǎnyǎn。
Admit your mistakes courageously. Don\'t try to cover them up.
要以“治病救人”的态度帮助犯错误的同志。
Yào yǐ“zhìbìngjiùrén”de tàidu bāngzhù fàn cuòwù de tóngzhì。
To help comrades who have made mistakes, we should adopt the approach of &quot;curing the sickness to save the patient&quot;.
我们揭发自己工作中的错误。目的是为了改正。
Wǒmen jiēfā zìjǐ gōngzuò zhōng de cuòwù。Mùdì shì wèi le gǎizhèng。
We expose mistakes in our work in order to correct them.
年轻人犯了错误，上帝也会宽恕。
Niánqīngrén fànle cuòwù，shàngdì yĕ huì kuānshù。
犯了这么严重的错误，你就等着挨板子吧。
Fàn le zhème yánzhòng de cuòwù，nǐ jiù děng zhe áibǎnzi ba。
You will get your ass whipped for makiing such a mistake.
尽管领导一再教育，他仍然不觉自己犯了一个严重的错误。
Jǐnguǎn lǐngdǎo yízài jiàoyù，tā réngrán bùjué zìjǐ fàn le yígè yánzhòng de cuòwù。
Though criticized by the leaders again and again, he still did no realize that he had made a big mistake.
地方主义的错误思想必须要得到及时纠正。
Dìfāngzhǔyì de cuòwù sīxiǎng bìxū yào dédào jíshí jiūzhèng。
The false ideology of localism must be corrected quickly.
弧线球易使裁判产生错误判断。
Húxiànqiú yì shǐ cáipàn chǎnshēng cuòwù pànduàn.
Arcing balls are inclined to mislead umpires to incorrect judgements.
轻易地原谅自己的错误会使自己不汲汲进取，反而退步。
Qīngyì de yuánliàng zìjǐ de cuòwù huì shǐ zìjǐ bùjíjí jìnqǔ，fǎnér tuìbù。
It\'ll make you go backwards instead of actively progressing if you often forgive your own mistakes easily.
重新勘定的辞典共校正出字词错误72处。
Chóngxīn kāndìng de cídiǎn gòng jiàozhèng chū zìcí cuòwù qīshíèrchù。
During the re-collation of the dictionary, 72 misuses of words were found.
他也为自己的错误流下了眼泪，我就不落忍再批评他了。
Tā yě wèi zìjǐ de cuòwù liúxià le yǎnlèi，wǒ jiù bùlàorěn zài pīpíng tā le。
He has already shed tears for his mistakes, and I can\'t bear to scold him any more.
这个部件经过量规的严格检验后没发现任何错误。
Zhège bùjiàn jīngguò liángguī de yángé jiǎnyàn hòu méi fāxiàn rènhé cuòwù。
The part has gone through careful check by a gauge, and there is nothing wrong with it.
这篇文章鲁鱼亥豕，错误百出。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng lǔyú hàishǐ，cuòwù bǎichū。
In this article, a lot of clerical and typographical errors are made through confusing similar characters.
对于过去犯下的错误，他今天才猛省过来，惭愧不已。
Duìyú guòqù fànxià de cuòwù，tā jīntiān cái měngxǐng guòlái，cánkuì bùyǐ。
Today he suddenly realized  all the mistakes he had made in the past and felt much abashed.
这个错误的公式，不知道迷误了多少数学家。
Zhège cuòwù de gōngshì，bùzhīdào míwù le duōshǎo shùxuéjiā。
Numerous mathematicians have been puzzled and misled by the wrong formula.
他被金钱所迷眼，所以才会犯这样的错误。
Tā bèi jīnqián suǒ míyǎn，suǒyǐ cáihuì fàn zhèyàng de cuòwù。
He was obsessed by lust for money, so he made a mistake.
男尊女卑是封建社会遗留下来的思想观念，它错误地认为男人比女人高贵。
Nánzūn nǚbēi shì fēngjiànshèhuì yíliú xiàlái de sīxiǎng guānniàn，tā cuòwù de rènwéi nánrén bǐ nǚrén gāoguì。
The ideology of male domination, and female subordination is handed down from feudal society. It wrongly holds that males are nobler than females.
你应该好好申敕他一顿，让他知道这样做是错误的。
Nǐ yīnggāi hǎohao shēnchì tā yídùn，ràng tā zhīdao zhèyàng zuò shì cuòwù de。
You should give him a serious dressing down to let him know that this is wrong.
在老师的教导下，我深醒了自己的错误。
Zài lǎoshī de jiàodǎo xià，wǒ shēnxǐng le zìjǐ de cuòwù。
Under the teacher\'s instructions, I fully realized my mistakes.
他如今犯下这样的错误，都是因为少年失教。
Tā rújīn fànxià zhèyàng de cuòwù，dōushì yīnwèi shàonián shījiào。
It was because of lack of education in childhood that he committed such a blunder now.
一个微小的计算错误将会导致失之毫厘，谬以千里的结果。
Yígè wēixiǎo de jìsuàn cuòwù jiāng huì dǎozhì shīzhīháolí，miùyǐqiānlǐ de jiéguǒ。
A minor mistake in calculation might lead to serious consequences.
有错误就该承认并改正，你怎么能文过饰非呢？
Yǒu cuòwù jiù gāi chéngrèn bìng gǎizhèng，nǐ zěnme néng wénguò shìfēi ne？
You should admit and correct your mistakes rather than cover them up.
老师正在纠正他吐音的错误。
Lǎoshī zhèngzài jiūzhèng tā tǔyīn de cuòwù。
The teacher is correcting his pronunciation errors.
由于犯了重大错误，他被处以开除团籍的惩罚。
Yóuyú fàn le zhòngdà cuòwù，tā bèi chǔyǐ kāichú tuánjí de chéngfá。
He was expelled from the Communist Youth League due to a blunder.
国王对他的错误网开三面，决定从宽发落。
Guówáng duì tā de cuòwù wǎngkāi sān miàn，juédìng cóngkuān fāluò。
The king was very lenient towards his error, and decided to give him the lightest punishment.
任何时候我们都不能把错误诿过于别人。
Rènhé shíhou wǒmen dōu bùnéng bǎ cuòwù wěiguò yú biérén。
We should never shift blame onto others.
习焉不察容易使人忽视一些常见错误。
Xíyān bùchá róngyì shǐ rén hūshì yìxiē chángjiàn cuòwù。
People are unware of the common mistakes once they are too accustomed to them.
他忽略了一个重要的细故，致使结论错误。
Tā hūlüè le yígè zhòngyào de xìgù，zhìshǐ jiélùn cuòwù。
He neglected an important condition which led to a incorrect conclusion.
因为工作中屡犯错误，他被销差了。
Yīnwéi gōngzuò zhōng lǚfàn cuòwù，tā bèi xiāochāi le。
He was fired, as he continued to make mistakes in his work.
由于犯了错误，他被卸除了职务。
Yóuyú fàn le cuòwù，tā bèi xièchú le zhíwù。
He was relieved of his office due to his mistakes.
用演绎法推算的结果是错误的。
Yòng yǎnyìfǎ tuīsuàn de jiéguǒ shì cuòwù de。
The result calculated by the deductive method is wrong.
我们犯了错误不要紧，重要的是以后要引为鉴戒。
Wǒmen fàn le cuòwù bú yàojǐn，zhòngyào de shì yǐhòu yào yǐnwéi jiànjiè。
It doesn\'t matter that we make mistakes, what matters is that we  take warning from it.
老王说起话来经常犯用词不当的错误。
Lǎo Wáng shuōqǐhuàlái jīngcháng fàn yòngcí búdàng de cuòwù。
Old Wang always uses improper language while talking.
任何时候我们都要尽量避免犯原则性错误。
Rènhé shíhou wǒmen dōuyào jìnliàng bìmiǎn fàn yuánzéxìng cuòwù。
We should try to avoid making mistakes in principle at any time.
类似的错误绝对不能再犯。
Lèisì de cuòwù juéduì bùnéng zàifàn。
The similar mistakes should never be made again.
你不但没有意识到自己的错误，反而造谣惑众！
Nǐ búdàn méiyǒu yìshídào zìjǐ de cuòwù，fǎnér zàoyáo huòzhòng！
Not only did you not realize your own mistakes, but also fabricated rumours that mislead other people.
他已经意识到自己的错误，向我们致歉了。
Tā yǐjing yìshí dào zìjǐ de cuòwù，xiàng wǒmen zhìqiàn le。
He has realized his mistakes, and apologized to us.
他犯了主观主义的错误，只凭自己的意志行事。
Tā fàn le zhǔguānzhǔyì de cuòwù，zhǐpíng zìjǐ de yìzhì xíngshì。
He has made a subjective mistake by acting according to his own will.
虽然他犯了天大的错误，但是整个事件并不是没有转圜之机。
Suīrán tā fàn le tiāndà de cuòwù，dànshì zhěnggè shìjiàn bìngbúshì méiyǒu zhuǎn huán zhī jī。
Though he has made a huge mistake, this entire incident still can be mediated in some way.
这个疑问句有严重的语法错误，请你改一改。
Zhège yíwènjù yǒu yánzhòng de yǔfǎ cuòwù，qǐng nǐ gǎiyigǎi。
The interrogative sentence has serious grammatical errors, please correct them.
正误表中还有错误，说明此刊物质量不好。
Zhèngwùbiǎo zhōng háiyǒu cuòwù，shuōmíng cǐ kānwù zhìliàng bùhǎo。
There are mistakes in the errata, which means that the quality of this publication is not good.
许多学者最终不得不承认哲学派别只有两种，从错误的自然主义回归到经典哲学中。
Xǔduō xuézhě zuì zhōng bùdébùchéngrèn zhéxué paibié zhǐyǒu liǎng zhǒng，cóng cuòwù de zìránzhǔyì huíguī dào jīngdiǎn zhéxué zhōng。
At last, many scholars had to admit that there are two sects of philosophy and return from false naturalism to classic philosophy.
这个修订本纠正了以前版本的几个明显的错误。
Zhège xiūdìngběn jiūzhèngle yǐqián bǎnběn de jǐgè míngxiǎn de cuòwù。
This revised edition has corrected several obvious mistakes in the previous editions.
不要为自己的错误行为辩解。
Búyào wèi zìjǐde cuòwùxíngwéi biànjiě。
Don\'t try to make excuses for your mistakes.
这种错误迭有发生。
Zhèzhǒng cuòwù diéyǒufāshēng。
This sort of mistake is happening again and again.
她发觉有错误。
Tā fājué yǒucuòwù。
She discovered a mistake.
对错误的行为不能放任不管。
Duì cuòwùde xíngwéi bùnéng fàngrènbùguǎn。
Bad behaviour should not be ignored.
您费心帮我看看有没有错误。
Nín fèixīn bāng wǒ kànkàn yǒuméiyǒu cuòwù。
Can you check this for mistakes?
在错误的地方划上红杠。
Zài cuòwùde dìfāng huàshàng hónggàng。
Where there is a mistake, mark it with a thick red line.
既然你知道错误了，为什么不及时纠正呢？
Jìrán nǐ zhīdào cuòwù le，wèishénme bù jíshí jiūzhèng ne?
Since you knew you\'d made a mistake, why didn\'t you put it right immediately?
好的领导总是承认自己的错误。
Hǎo de lǐngdǎo zǒngshì chéngrèn zìjǐ de cuòwù.
A good leader always acknowledges his or her mistakes.
年轻人犯点错误是难免的，关键要从中吸取教训。
Niánqīngrén fàn diǎn cuòwù shì nánmiǎn de，guānjiàn yào cóngzhōng xīqǔjiàoxùn.
It\'s unavoidable that young people will make mistakes. The important thing is that they learn from them.
我们不能迁就这么多错误。
Wǒmen bùnéng qiānjiù zhèmeduō cuòwù.
We cannot make allowances for so many mistakes.
我们认为，这个决定是错误的。
Wǒmen rènwéi，zhège juédìng shì cuòwù de.
We think that the decision is wrong.
多年后我才醒悟，自己当时是错误的。
Duōnián hòu wǒ cái xǐngwù，zìjǐ dāngshí shì cuòwù de。
It wasn\'t until years later that it dawned on me that I\'d been wrong.
由于决策失误，我们错过了最好的戎机。
Yóuyú juécè shīwù，wǒmen cuòguò le zuìhǎo de róngjī。
Due to mistakes in decision-making, we missed the best opportunity to win the battle.
有的时候我们要能够容错，不要揪着对方的失误不放。
Yǒu de shíhou wǒmen yào nénggòu róngcuò，búyào jiū zhe duìfāng de shīwù búfàng。
Sometimes we should tolerate people\'s mistakes instead of latching on to them.
大前提错误，所以结论也是错误的
犯错误
悔不该私心太重，犯了错误。
训诫犯错误的同学。
不能逼迫人家承认错误。
不要用歪理来为自己的错误言行辩护。
错误观念必须屏除。
驳斥错误观点
不要重犯以前犯过的错误
错误倾向
这种说法是很错误的
纠正错误
我们的努力被他的错误做法抵消了
订正了计算中的几处错误
原来的判决是错误的，应该翻案
对自己的错误要深刻反省
书中的错误俯拾即是
改正错误
他们的错误性质不同，要各别处理
错误是我犯的，不能怪罪别人
不能把错误都归咎于别人
犯错误不要紧，悔改就好
认真检查自己的错误。
错误会使人警觉起来。
发现错误，就要认真纠正。
肯定一切和否定一切都是错误的。
错误之处，敬请匡正。
工作中，难免会犯一些错误。
批判错误观点。
对犯错误的人，不能迁就。
犯了那样大的错误，就这么轻飘飘地检查几句？
经过再三劝导，他终于改正了错误。
不认真学习就要落后、倒退，甚至犯错误。
孩子有错误要批评，但不能总数落他。
提法错误。
改正错误要有行动，不能只停留在口头上。
不能向错误主张投降。
对有错误的同志不应嫌弃。
他不但没有接受大家的意见，相反，在错误的路上走得更远了。
错误路线会把革命引向邪路。
他所犯的错误，性质十分严重。
错误的言论。
只听一面之词，以致作出了错误的判断。
错误在于自作主张。
我的缺点错误不少，望各位指正。
纠错正误。
His teaching is clear that wrong desires precede wrong actions.
Tā de jiàodǎo hěn míngquè，cuòwù de sīxiǎng dǎozhì cuòwù de xíngwéi。
他的教导很明确，错误的思想导致错误的行为。
They were caught in the the wrong place at the wrong time.
Tāmen zài cuòwù de shíjiān bèi kùn zài le cuòwù de dìfang。
他们在错误的时间被困在了错误的地方。
His graphs demonstrate how small errors in reading can lead to large errors in depth.
Tā de túbiǎo chǎnshì le yuèdú zhōng jíxiǎo de cuòwù shì rúhé zuìzhōng dǎozhì chèdǐ yánzhòng de cuòwù de。
他的图表阐释了阅读中极小的错误是如何最终导致彻底严重的错误的。
When I make a mistake it\'s a beaut.
Rúguǒ wǒ fànle cuòwù，nà jiùshì bùtóng yìbān de cuòwù。
如果我犯了错误，那就是不同一般的错误。
An error is pervasive if it is material to more than one conclusion.
Rúguǒ yí gè cuòwù huì duì duō gè jiélùn chǎnshēng zhòngdàyǐngxiǎng，nàme zhège cuòwù jiùshì pǔbiànxìng de。
如果一个错误会对多个结论产生重大影响，那么这个错误就是普遍性的。
They are ­firing at the wrong bank, with the wrong bullets.

误差航向
wùchā háng xiàng
course error
偶然误差
ǒurán wùchā
accidental error
误差不超过千分之三毫米
wùchā bùchāoguò qiānfēnzhīsān háomǐ
with a tolerance of less than three-thousandths of a millimetre
平均误差
píngjūn wùchā 
mean error; average error
仪器误差
yíqì wùchā 
instrumental error
概然误差
gàirán wùchā 
probable error
这种内包装产品的重量，正负误差控制在规范标准之内。

To mark plurality one language may add an extra syllable to the word whereas another may simply change the vowel in the existing final syllable.
Wèile biǎoshì fùshù，yì zhǒng yǔyán kěnéng zài dāncí zhī qián jiāshàng éwài de yīnjié，ér lìng yì zhǒng yǔyán kěnéng zhǐshì jiǎndān de gǎibiàn zuìhòu yí gè yīnjié de yuányīn。
为了表示复数，一种语言可能在单词之前加上额外的音节，而另一种语言可能只是简单地改变最后一个音节的元音。
The cost overrun necessitated an additional allocation of funds in the budget.
Yóuyú cúnzài guò duō de zhīchū，suǒyǐ yǒu bìyào zài yùsuàn zhōng zēngjiā éwài bōkuǎn。
由于存在过多的支出，所以有必要在预算中增加额外拨款。
He procured extra cigarettes even though they were rationed.
Tā éwài huòdéle yì pī xiāngyān，suīrán xiāngyān shì pèijǐ de。
他额外获得了一批香烟，虽然香烟是配给的。
He overextended himself when he accepted the additional assignment.
Zài tā jiēshòu éwài de rènwù shí，tā yǒuxiē lìbùcóngxīn le。
在他接受额外的任务时，他有些力不从心了。
The management refused to provide more funds than were indicated in the contract.
出资方拒绝提供合同规定金额以外的资金。
额头上的冷汗扑拉扑拉直往下淌。
Étóu shàng de lěnghàn pūlā pūlā zhí wǎngxià tǎng。
Cold sweat kept rolling from his brow.
一颗大大的汗珠从他的额头滚落下来。
Yì kē dàdà de hànzhū cóng tā de étóu gǔnluò xiàlái。
A big bead of sweat rolls down from his forehead.

His forehead sweated after doing some labor work.
他十分愤怒，额头上的青筋都凸出了。

他的额头上有一道新月形的伤疤。

He was in a sorry plight, weighed down by numerous troublesome problems.
这件事已经弄得他焦头烂额了，当然不遑他顾。

Utterly exhausted by the whole thing, he certainly had no time for other business.

A white-faced antelope is drinking at the pool.

A cool and damp towel was pressed against her forehead.

He put a hand to his forehead to ease the pressure.
Tā bǎ yì zhī shǒu fàngzài étóu shàng，yǐhuǎnjiě yālì。
他把一只手放在额头上，以缓解压力。
I gave my son a easy pat on his head for a job well done.
Yóuyú chūsè wánchéng gōngzuò，wǒ qīngqīng pāile yíxià érzi de étóu。
由于出色完成工作，我轻轻拍了一下儿子的额头。
Jay kissed the top of his girlfriend\'s head.
Jié wěnle yí xià nǚyǒu de étóu。
杰吻了一下女友的额头。
She peered at him curiously from beneath her fringe of blonde hair.

She massaged the brow, closing her eyes to recall him better.
Tā ànle\'àn étóu，bìshàng yǎnjing，yǐbiàn néng gèng hǎo de huíyì tā。
她按了按额头，闭上眼睛，以便能更好地回忆他。
Kate used a handkerchief to wipe sweat off her brow and dry her hands.
Kǎitè yòng shǒupà cādiào étóu shàng de hàn bìng bǎ shǒu cāgān。

He felt the blood move stickily from his split scalp and trickle down his forehead.

他的公司受困于巨额的债务中，不能自拔。

To mark plurality one language may add an extra syllable to the word whereas another may simply change the vowel in the existing final syllable.

为了表示复数，一种语言可能在单词之前加上额外的音节，而另一种语言可能只是简单地改变最后一个音节的元音。

chāo\'é

从正面看，从侧面看，这尊雕塑都无可挑剔

shānɡhài zìzūnxīn

自尊心差/强

陈述自己的意见
chénshù zìjǐ de yìjiàn 
state one\'s views

jīngpì de lùnshù 
a brilliant exposition

口述全部经过
kǒushù quánbùjīngguò
give an oral account of what happened from beginning to end

略述大意
lüèshù dàyì 
give a brief account

Běnwén zhǔnbèi jiù yǐxià sāngè wèntí fēnbié jiāyǐ lùnshù。

详细描述事情的经过
xiángxì miáoshù shìqing de jīngguò 
describe what happened in great detail
他充满热情地陈述了自己的意见。

如上所述
rú shàng suǒ shù
as described above
达到上述目标
dádào shàngshù mùbiāo
achieve the aforementioned objectives
申述立场
shēnshù lìchǎng
state one\'s position
申述来意
shēnshù lái yì

作进一步的申述
zuò jìnyíbù de shēnshù
make further observations
时事述评
shíshì shùpíng
current events survey
叙述式
xùshùshì
indicative mood
略述其经过
lüè shù qí jīngguò
relate briefly how it happened; give a brief account of the matter
简述如下。
Jiǎnshù rú xià。
A brief account is as follows.
每周时事述评
měi zhōu shíshì shùpíng
weekly review of current affairs
大使已回国述职。
Dàshǐ yǐ huíguó shùzhí。
The ambassador has gone back for consultations.
下文再作阐述
xiàwén zài zuò chǎnshù
be explained in the ensuing chapters or paragraphs
详述自己的论点
xiángshù zìjǐ de lùndiǎn
elaborate one\'s thesis
她的叙述翔实可信。
Tā de xùshù xiángshí kěxìn。
The account she gave was full, accurate and reliable.
上述规定希严格执行为要。
Shàngshù guīdìngxī yángé zhíxíng wéi yào。
It is imperative that the above rules be strictly observed.
上述各项望一体遵照。
Shàngshù gè xiàng wàngyìtǐ zūnzhào。
It is expected that the above stipulations will be observed by all.
依据上述意见
yījù shàngshù yìjiàn 
in accordance with the above views
无庸细述。
Wúyōngxì shù。
This needn\'t be related in detail. or There is no need to go into details.
他把他看到的情形有声有色地描述了一番。
Tā bǎ tā kàndào de qíngxíngyǒushēngyǒusè de miáoshù le yì fān。
He gave a vivid and spirited description of what he had seen.
正如上文所述
zhèngrú shàngwén suǒ shù 
just as mentioned above
从事著述
cóngshì zhùshù 
be engaged in writing or compiling scholarly works
主要著述
zhǔyào zhùshù 
major works
我只是转述他的话。
Wǒ zhǐshì zhuǎnshù tā de huà。
I am merely reporting what he said.
不必一一赘述。
Bú bì yīyī zhuìshù。
It is unnecessary to go into details.
综上所述
zōngshàngsuǒshù 
to sum up
来稿综述
láigǎo zōngshù 
a summary of readers\' contributions
口述
kǒushù
give an oral account
缕述
lǚshù
state in detail; give all the details; go into details (or particulars)
这次旅行中趣闻很多，无法一一备述。
Zhècì lǚxíng zhōng qùwén hěnduō，wúfǎ yīyī bèishù。
Quite a lot interesting things happened in the journey, so there is no time for me to go into details.
你有辩护权，请陈述一下事情的经过。
Nǐ yǒu biànhùquán，qǐng chénshù yíxià shìqing de jīngguò。
As you are entitled to your right to defend yourself, please describe your account of the story.
他一一陈述了这件事情的利害关系。
Tā yīyī chénshù le zhèjiàn shìqing de lìhài guānxì。
He stated the advantages and disadvantages in sequential order.
《创世记》作为《圣经》的首卷，讲述了上帝造人的传说。
《Chuàngshìjì》zuòwéi《shèngjīng》 de shǒujuàn，jiǎngshù le Shàngdìzàorén de chuánshuō。
As the first episode of The Bible, Genesis describes the legend of how human beings were created by God.
电视台正在播放一部讲述帝王将相故事的电视剧。
Diànshìtái zhèngzài bōfàng yíbù jiǎngshù dìwáng jiàng xiàng gùshì de diànshìjù。
The TV station is broadcasting a TV show about emperors and high-positioned officials.
这部小说采用了第一人称叙述的方法。
Zhèbù xiǎoshuō cǎiyòng le dìyī rénchēng xùshù de fāngfǎ。
This novel uses the first person in narration.
讣文记述了这位死者的生平。
Fùwén jìshù le zhèwèi sǐzhě de shēngpíng。
The obituary records the whole life of the deceased.
要完整地叙述佛教的世界观，就要从微观世界与宏观世界两个层面来讲。
Yào wánzhěng de xùshù fójiào de shìjièguān，jiùyào cóng wēiguān shìjiè yǔ hóngguān shìjiè liǎnggè céngmiàn lái jiǎng。
To explain the world view of Buddhism clearly, we should do it in two levels-the micro-world and the macro-world.
他给我们讲述了一个湖汊的变迁史。
Tā gěi wǒmen jiǎngshù le yígè húchà de biànqiānshǐ。
He told us the vicissitudes of a lake branch.
他写的《浣溪沙》描述的是初夏农村的景色。
Tā xiě de《Huànxīshā》miáoshù de shì chūxià nóngcūn de jǐngsè。
&quot;Huanxisha&quot; was written by him, described the scene of early summer in country.
这部科幻小说讲述的是主人公回到荒古时代的所见所感。
Zhèbù kēhuàn xiǎoshuō jiǎngshù de shì zhǔréngōng huídào huānggǔ shídài de suǒjiàn suǒgǎn。
This sci-fi told about the feelings and findings of the dramatis personae\' who had gone back to the remote antiquity times.
他阐述的极左思想，遭到全会人的抨击。
Tā chǎnshù de jízuǒ sīxiǎng，zāodào quánhuì rén de pēngjī。
The extreme left-wing views he espoused were attacked by all those at the meeting.
在面试时通常要简述一下自己的工作经历。
Zài miànshì shí tōngcháng yào jiǎnshù yíxià zìjǐ de gōngzuò jīnglì。
When being interviewed, usually you are required to give a brief account of your work experience.
这本书的第一页有一个故事简述。
Zhèběnshū de dìyī yè yǒu yígè gùshì jiǎnshù。
There is an introduction to the story on the first page of the book.
文章中关于哲学的论述，十分精彩，令人绝倒。
Wénzhāng zhōng guānyú zhéxué de lùnshù，shífēn jīngcǎi，lìngrén juédǎo。
The discussion about philosophy in this article is so brilliant that it is totally convincing.
在谈判桌前，他慷慨陈词，不卑不亢地表述了我方观点。
Zài tánpànzhuō qián，tā kāngkǎi chéncí，bùbēi búkàng de biǎoshù le wǒ fāng guāndiǎn。
In front of the negotiation table, his impassioned speech demonstrated our points in a way neither servile nor overbearing.
将那两个人的论述联属在一起对比着研究，对我们大有裨益。
Jiāng nà liǎnggè rén de lùnshù liánzhǔ zài yìqǐ duìbǐ zhe yánjiū，duì wǒmen dàyǒu bìyì。
Studying the two person\'s narration by contrasting them is very helpful.
律令上对于这种行为并未做明确阐述。
Lǜlìngshàng duìyú zhèzhǒng xíngwéi bìng wèi zuò míngquè chǎnshù。
The laws and decrees do not give a definite elaboration of this action.
这本科幻小说讲述了一个神奥的故事。
Zhèběn kēhuàn xiǎoshuō jiǎngshù le yígè shénào de gùshì。
This science fiction novel tells us a mysterious story.
述而不作的思想对中国的发展有着消极的影响。
Shùér búzuò de sīxiǎng duì Zhōngguó de fāzhǎn yǒu zhe xiāojí de yǐngxiǎng。
The concept of expounding on predecessors\' theories without producing anything original oneself had a negative impact on China\'s development.
他把这件事情添油加醋地描述了一遍。
Tā bǎ zhèjiàn shìqing tiānyóu jiācù de miáoshù le yí biàn。
He added highly colored details to the story.
我们常用物理量来描述一个物体的特征。
Wǒmen chángyòng wùlǐliàng lái miáoshù yígè wùtǐ de tèzhēng。
We often use physical quantity to describe the features of an object.
下述问题需要特别注意，希望大家详细记录。
Xiàshù wèntí xūyào tèbié zhùyì，xīwàng dàjiā xiángxì jìlù。
We need to pay special attention to the following questions, please write it down carefully.
在审讯人员强大的攻势下，嫌疑犯终于详述了实情。
Zài shěnxùn rényuán qiángdà de gōngshì xià，xiányífàn zhōng yú xiángshù le shíqíng。
The suspect finally confessed the details, faced with the attack of the interrogator.
报纸头版头条刊登了这篇新闻述评。
Bàozhǐ tóubǎn tóutiáo kāndēng le zhèpiān xīnwén shùpíng。
This news review appears on the front page of the newspaper.
这只盒子行述很奇怪，不知道是装什么用的。
Zhèzhī hézi xíngshù hěn qíguài，bùzhīdào shì zhuāng shénme yòng de。
The description of this box is quite strange. It\'s not known what it can contain.
奶奶喜欢向人忆述年轻时的美好时光。
Nǎinai xǐhuan xiàng rén yìshù niánqīng shí de měihǎo shíguāng。
My grandma likes to recall and talk about her happy days when she was young.
合同对双方责权利的描述都很模糊。
Hétong duì shuāngfāng zéquánlì de miáoshù dōu hěn móhu。
The contract doesn\'t clearly describe the responsibilities, and rights of the two parties.
这些事情，不必浓墨重彩地描述。
Zhèxiē shìqing，búbì nóngmò zhòngcǎi de miáoshù。
These matters don\'t need to be described with thick and heavy colours.
综上所述，我们的理论成立。
Zōngshàng suǒshù，wǒmen de lǐlùn chénglì。
In a word, our theory is tenable.
他这种做法其实也只不过是祖述前人罢了。
Tā zhèzhǒng zuòfǎ qíshí yě zhǐbúguò shì zǔshù qiánrén bà le。
His method actually follows the example of his predecessors.
他祖述了前人的理论，同时结合了新时代的精神。
Tā zǔshù le qiánrén de lǐlùn，tóngshí jiéhé le xīn shídài de jīngshén。
He followed the theory of his predecessors while combining it with the spirit of the new era.
你能把这个陈述句改成反问句吗？
Nǐ néng bǎ zhège chénshùjù gǎichéng fǎnwènjù ma？

这部影片记述了一个真实的故事。
Zhè bù yǐngpiàn jìshùle yígè zhēnshí de gùshì.
This film tells a true story.
记者对此事进行了完整的记述。
Jìzhě duì cǐshì jìnxíngle wánzhěng de jìshù.
The journalist gave a full account of the event.
精辟的论述
jīngpì de lùnshù 
brilliant analysis
如实讲述事情的经过
rúshí jiǎngshù shìqing de jīngguò

Tā shùshuōzhe zuówǎn fāshēng de shìqing。
He gave an account of yesterday evening\'s incident.
述职报告
shùzhíbàogào
work report

Zōngshù
sum up

A sentence is in the active form when the action stated by the verb is performed by the subject.
如果动词描述的动作是由主语发出的，这句话就是主动语态。
He has always described his wife as one of the best movie artists in the world.
你总是把他妻子描述成世界上最出色的一个电影艺术家。

如有任何疑问，请按上述地址联系我们。

我在警察局看了很多照片，但没有一个人与描述相符。

她并不像你描述的那么漂亮。

他讲述了自己在二战期间的经历。

这个故事主要讲述了家庭观的问题。

大多数的服饰书籍只能向你大致描述某段时期服装的特点。

法国社会学家皮埃尔·布迪厄写了很多论述社会分化方面的书。

这些歌讲述的是奋斗和自尊的故事。

他在传记中描述了自己歌唱事业的起起伏伏。
I have a million reasons to love you.
千言万语，难述我对你的衷肠。

法律上是如何描述这种情况的？

在做陈述前，我检查了这份报告的每一个部分。
She described the earthquake\'s destruction in vivid detail.
她绘声绘色地描述了地震的破坏力。

他准确地描述了小偷的特征。
Can you describe yourself in three words?
你能用三个词描述一下自己吗？
This is a very detailed description of the events.
这是对这些事件的详尽描述。

我的作业就是要写一篇描述家人的作文。

他向我描述了他想要的那件大衣，但我不确定能否在这儿找到。

The poem is about a fair maiden.
这首诗描述的是一个美丽的少女。

请描述一下图表3。
Stated thus, it seems we have a big problem.
综上所述，看来我们到遇到大问题了。

人的一生中，对自己的主观描述是不断发生变化的。
The description of your blind date seems to be too good to be true.
你把你这次相亲描述得太美好了，不像是真的。
any/none of the above
上述中任一/无一
He gave an account of what happened.
他对发生的事情做了一番描述。
His statement agrees with those of other witnesses.
他的陈述和其他证人的完全一致。

把某事/某人/自己描述成…
a man described by the police as extremely dangerous
一个被警察描述为极为危险的人
to describe sb/sth to sb
向某人描述某人/某事
to (not) go into details
(没有)详细叙述
to report for duty
述职
to enlarge on {or} upon
[frm] [+subject] 详述
to expand on sth
[+notes，story，comments] 详述某事
Jenkins was there, holding forth on his favourite subject.
詹金斯在那儿，滔滔不绝地讲述他最喜欢的话题。
to observe that...
评述说…
to present o.s. as being...
将自己表述为…
to give a presentation
做陈述
He didn\'t put it quite as crudely as that.
他表述得并没那么拙劣。
He should have known how to put his case.
他早该知道如何陈述他的情况。
to repeat o.s.
一再重述
I had the same experience myself.
我自己也有上述的经历。
I told her the story of my life.
我向她描述了我的生活。
the story of the women\'s movement in Ireland
对于爱尔兰妇女运动的描述
my side of the story
我的叙述
to tell sb about {or} of sth
给某人讲述某事
The witness\' account conforms with the police\'s speculation.
目击者的叙述和警方的推测一致。

这个文章讲述了一个中国女英雄从军的故事。

这个故事讲述了一群可爱的年轻人，有些懦弱却满怀梦想。

他没研究过历史，所以论文中有些含混不清的论述。

作者从正反两方面进行了大量的论述。

他在传记中描述了自己歌唱事业的起起伏伏。

to repeat o.s.
一再重述

a declarative sentence
【语法】陈述句
陈述自己的意见
chénshù zìjǐ de yìjiàn 
state one\'s views
他充满热情地陈述了自己的意见。
Tā chōngmǎn rèqíng de chénshù le zìjǐ de yìjiàn。
He expressed his views with a great deal of warmth.

他一一陈述了这件事情的利害关系。
Tā yīyī chénshù le zhèjiàn shìqing de lìhài guānxì。
He stated the advantages and disadvantages in sequential order.
你能把这个陈述句改成反问句吗？

Can you turn the declarative sentence into a rhetorical question?

I want to quit. (Then present some practical reasons.)

陈述冤情
The statement &quot;he is brave and he is not brave&quot; is a contradiction.

biǎoshù jǐjiàn

谨启，不具(置于信的末尾，表示写信人恭敬地作了以上的陈述，不再署上自己的名字)。

xiǎotuǐ

她突然跑掉了，腿上还有一个带编号的小圈。
拔腿就跑
bátuǐ jiù pǎo 
start running away at once; immediately take to one\'s heels
拔腿就追
bátuǐ jiù zhuī 
give instant chase
他事情太多，拔不开腿。
Tā shìqing tài duō, bá bù kāi tuǐ。 
He is too busy with his work to get away.
腿上起了个包
tuǐ shàng qǐ le gè bāo 
have a swelling in the leg
我这腿不争气，最后一圈跑不动了。
Wǒ zhè tuǐ bùzhēngqì，zuìhòu yì quān pǎo bu dòng le。
My legs failed me and I wasn\'t able to run the last lap.
他的双腿去年就残废了。
Tā de shuāngtuǐ qùnián jiù cánfèi le。
He lost the use of both legs last year.
他的腿有残疾，行动不便。
Tā de tuǐ yǒu cánjí，xíngdòngbúbiàn。
He\'s got a deformed leg, so he has difficulty getting about.
小猫在桌子腿上蹭痒痒。
Xiǎo māo zài zhuōzituǐ shàng cèng yǎngyang。
The kitten is scratching its back against the table leg.
他的腿疼得厉害，只能一步一步地往前蹭。
Tā de tuǐ téng de lìhai，zhǐnéng yíbù yíbù de wǎng qián cèng。
His legs hurt terribly. He could only drag himself along inch by inch.
叉着腿站着
chǎzhe tuǐ zhànzhe 
stand with one\'s legs apart
我两腿直颤。
Wǒ liǎngtuǐ zhí chàn。
My legs kept shaking.
吓得两腿颤抖
xià de liǎngtuǐ chàndǒu 
shake in one\'s shoes
他要去参军，你不要扯他的后腿。
Tā yào qù cānjūn，nǐ búyào chě tā de hòutuǐ。
He wants to enlist. Don\'t try to hold him back.
两条腿沉得迈不动步。
Liǎng tiáo tuǐ chén de mài bu dòng bù。
My legs were heavy and I could hardly move a step.
腿上吃了一枪
tuǐshàngchī le yì qiāng
get wounded by a shot in the leg
腿抽筋
tuǐ chōujīn 
have a cramp in the leg
蛹显示出成虫的触角、腿、翅膀的雏形。
Yǒng xiǎnshì chū chéngchóng de chùjiǎo、tuǐ、chìbǎng de chúxíng。
The undeveloped forms of the adult insect\'s antennae, legs and wings are embodied in the pupa.
他的腿给弹片打断了。
Tā de tuǐ gěi dànpiàn dǎduàn le。
A shrapnel broke his leg.
桌子腿底下垫点儿纸就平了。
Zhuōzi tuǐ dǐxià diàn diǎnr zhǐ jiù píng le。
Put a wad of paper under the leg of the table to make it level.
腿上叫蚊子叮了一下
tuǐ shàng jiào wénzi dīng le yíxià 
get a mosquito bite on the leg
跷起二郎腿
qiāoqǐ èrlángtuǐ
sit cross-legged, poising one foot in the air
腿上的伤已经封口了。
Tuǐ shàng de shāng yǐjing fēngkǒu le。
The leg wound has healed.
弓着腿坐着
gōng zhe tuǐ zuò zhe 
sitting with arched legs
他腿上挂过两次花。
Tā tuǐ shàngguàguò liǎngcì huā。
He was twice wounded in the leg.
他的腿都跪麻了。
Tā de tuǐ dōu guìmá le。
His legs were numb from kneeling.
跪一条腿
ɡuì yì tiáo tuǐ
go down on one knee
他下肢瘫痪，两腿丧失机能。
Tā xiàzhī tānhuàn，liǎngtuǐ sàngshī jīnéng。
His lower body was paralyzed, so he lost the use of his legs.
他左腿有块记。
Tā zuǒ tuǐ yǒu kuài jì。
There is a birthmark on his left leg.
假腿
jiǎ tuǐ 
artificial leg
她坐得太久，腿都麻了。
Tā zuò de tài jiǔ，tuǐ dōu má le。
She\'d been sitting so long that she felt pins and needles in her legs.
盘腿坐在炕上
pántuǐ zuò zài kàngshàng
sit cross-legged on a kang
我没干多少，就是跑跑腿儿。
Wǒ méi gàn duōshao，jiùshì pǎopao tuǐr。
I didn\'t do much, just a bit of running around.
他拖着疲弱的双腿缓慢地往前走。
Tā tuō zhe píruò de shuāngtuǐ huǎnmàn de wǎngqián zǒu。
He dragged his tired legs slowly along.
跷着腿坐着
qiāo zhe tuǐ zuò zhe
sit with one\'s legs crossed
老大娘拳着腿坐在炕上。
Lǎodàniáng quán zhe tuǐ zuò zài kàng shàng。
The old woman sat on the kang with her legs curled up.
他把两腿蜷曲起来做了个前滚翻。
Tā bǎ liǎng tuǐ quánqū qǐlái zuò le gè qiángǔnfān。
Drawing up his knees against his chest, he did a forward roll.
左腿瘸了
zuǒtuǐ qué le
be lame in the left leg
瘸腿的人
quétuǐ de rén 
lame person; cripple
揉一揉腿
róu yi róu tuǐ
rub one\'s legs
他两腿发软。
Tā liǎng tuǐ fā ruǎn。
His legs felt weak (or like jelly).
撒腿就跑
sātuǐ jiù páo
make off at once; scamper
我的胳膊腿像散了架似的。
Wǒ de gēbo tuǐ xiàng sǎn le jià sì de。
I feel as if all my limbs are falling apart (or are out of joint).
奶奶上了年纪，腿脚不那么灵便了。
Nǎinai shàng le niánjì，tuǐjiǎo bú nàme língbiàn le。
Granny is stricken in years and isn\'t so surefooted as before.
跳水时腿要伸直。
Tiàoshuǐ shí tuǐ yào shēnzhí。
When you dive you must keep your legs straight.
他的腿上了石膏。
Tā de tuǐ shàng le shígāo。
He had a plaster cast on his leg.
他把腿摔断了。
Tā bǎ tuǐ shuāiduàn le。
He had a fall and broke his leg.
他摔了一跤，把腿给摔折了。
Tā shuāi le yì jiāo，bǎ tuǐ gěi shuāishé le。
He had a fall and broke his leg.
两腿酥麻
liǎng tuǐ sūmá
one\'s legs feeling weak and numb
走了一天路，我的腿肚子酸溜溜的。
Zǒu le yìtiān lù，wǒ de tuǐdùzi suānliūliū de。
My legs ached after I\'d been walking all day.
腿疼
tuǐ ténɡ 
have a pain in the leg
他腿长。
Tā tuǐ cháng。
He has long legs.
桌子(椅子)腿
zhuōzi（yǐzi）tuǐ
legs of a table (chair)
腿脚不灵便
tuǐjiǎo bùlíngbian 
have difficulty walking
这位老奶奶的腿脚还很利落。
Zhèwèi lǎo nǎinai de tuǐjiǎo hái hěn lìluo。
This old lady still moves briskly.
孩子要到西藏去工作，你可别拖后腿。
Háizi yào dào Xīzàng qù gōngzuò，nǐ kě bié tuōhòutuǐ。
The kid wants to go and work in Xizang; you shouldn\'t try to hold him back.
蛙泳蹬腿
wāyǒngdēngtuǐ

腌制火腿
yānzhì huǒtuǐ
make ham

Wénzi yǎo de tuǐ shàngzhí yǎngyang。

腰酸腿疼
yāosuān tuǐténɡ
aching back and legs
他腿疼得厉害，几乎不能站立。
Tā tuǐ téng de lìhai，jīhū bùnéng zhànlì。
His leg was so painful that he could hardly stand.
折断腿
zhéduàn tuǐ 
fracture (or break) one\'s leg
我的腿肿了。
Wǒ de tuǐ zhǒng le。
My legs are swollen.
他腿上中了一枪。
Tā tuǐ shàngzhòng le yì qiāng。
He got shot in the leg.
腿肚子
tuǐdùzi

火腿
huǒtuǐ
ham
就因为你小时候太淘气打架，腿上才留下了这个疤拉。
Jiù yīnwèi nǐ xiǎoshíhou tài táoqì dǎjià，tuǐ shàng cái liúxià le zhège bāla。
You got yourselves into a lot of fist fights when you were small, and this scar is their legacy.
这个把风的小偷见到警察来了撒腿就跑，扔下同伙不管了。
Zhège bǎfēng de xiǎotōu jiàndào jǐngchá lái le sātuǐ jiù pǎo，rēngxià tónghuǒ bùguǎn le。
The thief\'s accomplise ran away at the sight of the police, abandoning his watch and his friend.
他刚用鳔胶粘和了椅子腿，要等干了才能用。
Tā gāng yòng biàojiāo zhānhé le yǐzi tuǐ，yào děng gān le cáinéng yòng。
He used the isinglass to glue the chair legs, so we can only use the chair once it has dried.
你去了帮不上忙，反而扯腿。
Nǐ qù le bāngbúshàng máng，fǎnér chětuǐ。
It won\'t help even you were there, you just would have been a drag.
自从那次车祸后，他的腿就再也不吃劲了。
Zìcóng nà cì chēhuò hòu，tā de tuǐ jiù zài yě bùchījìn le。
After the traffic accident, his legs can\'t bear much weight.
由于游泳池水温太低，她的腿搐搦了。
Yóuyú yóuyǒngchí shuǐwēn tài dī，tā de tuǐ chùnuò le。
He legs cramped because the temperature of the swimming pool was too low.
他的腿不会打弯儿了。
Tā de tuǐ búhuì dǎwānr le。
He can not bend his legs.
站的时间太长了，小明觉得腿有些发僵。
Zhàn de shíjiān tài cháng le，Xiǎo Míng jué de tuǐ yǒuxiē fājiāng。
Xiao Ming feels his legs are stiff after standing for too long.
酒喝得太多了，他觉得腿有些发软。
Jiǔ hē de tài duō le，tā jué de tuǐ yǒuxiē fāruǎn。
He has drunk too much and feels weak in the legs.
他在练高抬腿。
Tā zài liàn gāotáituǐ.
He is practicing leg lifts.
这事儿还得听你父母的，有道是胳膊拧不过大腿啊。
Zhèshìr hái děi tīng nǐ fùmǔ de，yǒudàoshì gēbo nǐng búguò dàtuǐ a。
You have to obey your parents: as the saying goes, the arm is no match for the thigh.
武术的工架是手型、步型、身型、手法、步法、以及腿法的总称。
Wǔshù de gōngjià shì shǒuxíng、bùxíng、shēnxíng、shǒufǎ、bùfǎ、yǐjí tuǐfǎ de zǒngchēng。
The movements and postures of martial arts refer to the combination of the postures and movements of hands, feet and body.
就他那花拳绣腿，还敢称天下无双？
Jiù tā nà huāquán xiùtuǐ，hái gǎn chēng tiānxià wúshuāng？
How dares he announce that he is incomparable just by the right of some fancied postures?
科学家根据安装在鸟腿上的环志来研究候鸟的迁徙规律。
Kēxuéjiā gēnjù ānzhuāng zài niǎotuǐ shàng de huánzhì lái yánjiū hòuniǎo de qiānxǐ guīlǜ。
Scientists do researches on the migrating rules of migratory birds according to the circular marks fixed on bird legs.
这个不幸的孩子，因为患脊髓灰质炎而留下了条瘸腿。
Zhège búxìng de háizi，yīnwèi huàn jǐsuǐhuīzhìyán ér liúxià le tiáo quétuǐ。
This poor child was left with two paralyzed legs due to polio.
他为了让敌人相信，假戏真作把自己腿打伤了。
Tā wèi le ràng dírén xiāngxìn，jiǎxì zhēnzuò bǎ zìjǐ tuǐ dǎshāng le。
In order to convince the enemy, he had to turn the acting into a real story and shoot himself in the leg.
我的小腿拘挛了，快来扶我一把。
Wǒ de xiǎotuǐ jūluán le，kuàilái fú wǒ yì bǎ。
My legs are frozen stiff; come and help me.
我们做事要两条腿走路，不能在一棵树上吊死。
Wǒmen zuòshì yào liǎng tiáo tuǐ zǒulù，bùnéng zài yì kē shù shàng diàosǐ。
We should take different measures to handle things instead of stubbornly sticking to one method.
由于从小骑马，长大后他成了罗圈儿腿。
Yóuyú cóng xiǎo qímǎ，zhǎngdà hòu tā chéng le luóquānrtuǐ。
He has ridden horses since he was young, so he has bowlegs after growing up.
小刘，麻烦你跑腿儿帮我送个信吧？
Xiǎo Liú，máfan nǐ pǎotuǐr bāng wǒ sòng gè xìn ba？
Xiao Liu, would you go and convey the message for me?
他骗腿骑车的动作很麻利。
Tā piàntuǐ qíchē de dòngzuò hěn máli。
He is very agile hopping onto a bicycle by swinging one of his legs sideways.
他总是屈曲着腿，好像永远站不直。
Tā zǒngshì qūqū zhe tuǐ，hǎo xiàng yǒngyuǎn zhàn bùzhí。
He always bends his legs, as if he is always unable to stand up straight.
比武时他用一个扫堂腿把我踢倒在地。
Bǐwǔ shí tā yòng yígè sǎotángtuǐ bǎ wǒ tīdǎozàidì。
In the wushu competition, he kicked me down to the ground with a  leg-sweep.
医生说我的腿痛应该尝试一下沙疗。
Yīshēng shuō wǒ de tuǐtòng yīnggāi chángshì yíxià shāliáo。
The doctor said I could try sand therapy to cure my leg ache.
运动员们正在锻炼，以便加强腿部肌肉的力量。
Yùndòngyuánmen zhèngzài duànliàn，yǐ biàn jiāqiáng tuǐbùjīròu de lìliang。
The sportsmen are exercising to improve the strength of the muscles on their legs.
那辆汽车把我撞倒在地，然后从我的腿子上压了过去。
Nà liàng qìchē bǎ wǒ zhuàngdǎozàidì，ránhòu cóng wǒ de tuǐzi shàng yā le guòqù。
That car knocked me down, then drove over my leg.
他根本没把你当朋友，只不过把你当成了他的腿子。
Tā gēnběn méi bǎ nǐ dāng péngyou，zhǐbúguò bǎ nǐ dàngchéng le tā de tuǐzi。
He has never regarded you as a friend, only a henchman.
前面还有很长的路要走，不要急，累了就坐下歇歇腿。
Qiánmiàn háiyǒu hěn cháng de lù yào zǒu，búyào jí，lèi le jiù zuòxià xiēxiētuǐ。
There is still a long way to go, don\'t worry, take a break if you are tired.
舞蹈演员每天都要早起压腿练功，很辛苦的。
Wǔdǎo yǎnyuán měitiān dōuyào zǎoqǐ yātuǐ liàngōng，hěn xīnkǔ de。
It is very hard for the dancers to get up early in the morning and practice their skills.
腰腿好，身体好就是福气啊。
Yāotuǐ hǎo，shēntǐ hǎo jiùshì fúqì a。
It\'s lucky to be healthy.

伴随着对环境的关注，‘绿色’成了最重要的字眼儿。
Greenpeace set themselves up for serious problems in future.
Lǜsèhépíng zǔzhī biǎomíngle yǐhòu de yánjùn wèntí。
绿色和平组织表明了以后的严峻问题。
World leaders will take a stand on green energy.
Shìjiè gè guó lǐngdǎorén huì biǎomíng tāmen duì lǜsè néngyuán de tàidù。
世界各国领导人会表明他们对绿色能源的态度。
The Greenpeace support was welcomed with open arms.
Lǜsè hépíng zǔzhī de bāngzhù dédào zhōngxīn de huānyíng。
绿色和平组织的帮助得到衷心的欢迎。
He told the painter that he wanted a yellow base with just a hint of green.
Tā gàosu nàgè yóuqījiàng tā xiǎngyào yǐ huángsè wéizhǔ，zhǐ dài xiēxǔ lǜsè。
他告诉那个油漆匠他想要以黄色为主，只带些许绿色。
There were Turk\'s head lilies and patches of iris , islands of brilliant blue set capriciously in the green sea.
Nàr zhǎng yǒu tǔ\'ěrqí mào bǎihéhuā hé yuānwěihuā；zhànlán sè de dǎoyǔ suíyì de xiāngqiàn zài lǜsè de hǎiyáng zhīzhōng。
那儿长有土耳其帽百合花和鸢尾花；湛蓝色的岛屿随意地镶嵌在绿色的海洋之中。
It suddenly spewed out a thick green concoction.
Tā tūrán pēnchūle yì zhǒng niánchóu de lǜsè tiáohéwù。
它突然喷出了一种粘稠的绿色调合物。
They painted it a light shade of bluish green.
Tāmen bǎ tā huàchéngle qiǎnlánlǜsè。
他们把它画成了浅蓝绿色。
Messengers were moving unobtrusively over the jet-black mountain ranges, bearing confidential tidings from sheikhdom to sheikhdom.
Wǎngfǎnyú qiúzhǎngguó zhījiān de xìnshǐ dàizhe jīmì xiāoxi jǐnshèn de fānguòle mòlǜsè de shānmài。
往返于酋长国之间的信使带着机密消息谨慎地翻过了墨绿色的山脉。
It was not dull grey as distance had suggested, but a mottle of khaki and black and olive-green.
Nà qíshí búshì cóng yuǎnchù kànqǐlái de àn huīsè，érshì huánghèsè 、hēisè hé gǎnlǎnlǜ zǔchéng de zásè。
那其实不是从远处看起来的暗灰色，而是黄褐色、黑色和橄榄绿组成的杂色。
Blue turquoise is valued as a gemstone.
Lánsè de lǜsōngshí bèi shìwéi bǎoshí。
蓝色的绿松石被视为宝石。
He was wearing faded olive-green cords, a check shirt and a dark brown jersey.
Tā chuānzhe yí jiàn tuìsè de gǎnlǎnlǜ dēngxīnróng yīfu，yí jiàn gézi chènshān hé yí jiàn shēnzōngsè yùndòngyī。
他穿着一件褪色的橄榄绿灯芯绒衣服，一件格子衬衫和一件深棕色运动衣。
The additive reproduction process usually uses red, green and blue light to produce the other colours.
Zēngsè guòchéng tōngcháng shǐyòng hóng guāng、lǜ guāng hé lán guāng lái chǎnshēng qítā yánsè。
增色过程通常使用红光、绿光和蓝光来产生其他颜色。
Colours other than red, green and blue are formed by the combination of the three primary colours.
Chúle hóng、lǜ、lán zhīwài de qítā yánsè dōushì yóu zhè sānyuánsè zǔhé ér chéng de。
除了红、绿、蓝之外的其他颜色都是由这三原色组合而成的。
The brilliant orange flowers against the green foliage were a showstopper.
Nàxiē zài lǜyè yìngchèn xià de liàngchéngsè huāduǒ fēicháng piàoliang。
那些在绿叶映衬下的亮橙色花朵非常漂亮。
A quark\'s color can have one of three values, called red, green, and blue.
Yí gè kuākè de kěyǐ yǒu sān zhǒng sètài，fēnbié chēngwéi hóng，lǜ hé lán。
一个夸克的可以有三种色态，分别称为红，绿和蓝。
他们厂的厂区绿化搞得特别好。
Tāmen chǎng de chǎngqū lǜhuà gǎo de tèbié hǎo。
The green work in their factory district is well done.
这个小区采用了房顶绿化，既环保美观又节省空间。
Zhège xiǎoqū cǎiyòng le fángdǐng lǜhuà，jì huánbǎo měiguān yòu jiéshěng kōngjiān。
This living community adopts roof greening measures which are environmental-friendly, pleasing to the eye, and can save space.
把我们的小区建成文化绿洲。
部分小区已实现立体绿化。
The zonal vegetation in this area is evergreen broad leaved forest.
这个区域的地域性植被是常绿阔叶林。
I bought a pack of green tea in the corner shop.
我在住宅区附近的小卖铺买了一包绿茶。
书皮儿是绿的。
Shūpír shì lǜ de。
The book cover is green.
The government is more likely to publish a consultative Green Paper towards the end of the year.
Zhèngfǔ hěn kěnéng zài jīnnián niándǐ chūbǎn yìběn zīxún lǜpíshū。
政府很可能在今年年底出版一本咨询绿皮书。
公园里一对对红男绿女，牵手偕行。
Gōngyuán lǐ yí duìduì hóngnánlǜnǚ，qiānshǒu xiéxíng。
Gaily dressed young couples walked hand in hand in the park.
青绿的松林
qīnglǜ de sōnglín
a dark green pine forest
经过近十年的努力，这座荒山现在已经绿树成林了。
Jīngguò jìn shínián de nǔlì，zhè zuò huāngshān xiànzài yǐjing lǜshù chénglín le。
After ten years of hard work, the barren hill is now covered with green tress.
柳树的抗性极好，特别适合用于园林绿化。
Liǔshù de kàngxìng jíhǎo，tèbié shìhé yòngyú yuánlín lǜhuà。
Willow has good resistance and is especially suitable for landscaping.
绿林英雄。
也曾绿林落草。
植树造林，绿化祖国。
绿油油的松林
丛林一片青绿。

The greenwood was Robin Hood\'s home.
Lǜlín jiùshì luóbīnhàn de jiā。

The zonal vegetation in this area is evergreen broad leaved forest.
这个区域的地域性植被是常绿阔叶林。
The deer came walking down the green aisles of the forest.

鹿从森林的绿色小路中缓慢走了出来。
He was surprised to discover that green cards are no longer green.
Tā jīngyà de fāxiàn lǜkǎ yǐ búzài“lǜ”le。
他惊讶地发现绿卡已不再“绿”了。
A Green Card, is evidence of your status as a lawful permanent resident with a right to live and work permanently in the United States.
在美国，绿卡是成为永久居民的法律证据，这样你就有权利永久地在这里工作和居住。
A Green Card gives you official immigration status in the United States.
在美国，绿卡是对移民身份的官方认可。
Not all foreign individuals are eligible to work in the United States, but if you are, better protect your green card status.
不是所有的外国人都可以在美国工作的，如果你正在这里工作，那就好好保护你的绿卡身份吧。
A green card can serve as easily recognizable proof of third party insurance, for example in the case of an accident, when traveling abroad.
例如在国外旅行出了事故，绿卡可用作第三方保险的证明，很容易识别。
A Green Card is an internationally recognized document that serves as evidence that the holder has the minimum insurance cover required by law in the country visited.
绿卡是国际公认的证明文件，可以做为证据使用，这样当地政府就会提供少量的赔偿。
She forged a green card.
Tā wěizàole yí fèn lǜkǎ。
她伪造了一份绿卡。

jǐzhàn lǜhuà tiándì 
encroach upon a green belt
绿化城市
lǜhuà chéngshì 
plant trees in and around the city
绿化
lǜhuà
make (a place) green by planting trees, flowers, etc.; afforest

一眼望去菜地里都是绿生生的菜叶。

一片苍绿的草原上，有几只山羊在悠闲地吃着草。

他家养了一只绿衣使者，好象还会学人说话呢。

Zhège fěicuì lǜyíngyíng de，chéngsè jíhǎo！
This glittering green emerald is of high purity.
这些嫩绿的叶子，都是要用来埋青的。

These tender green leaves will be buried as manure.
这些毛条会被加工成绿茶然后出售。

These raw tea leaves will be processed into green tea to sell.

The lotus pond is bottle-green and pink in color, and is full of poetic luster.
又是春天了，暖风吹绿了树叶和草芽。

调配这个颜色的色度比例是：20%的蓝加80%的绿。

A Green Card, is evidence of your status as a lawful permanent resident with a right to live and work permanently in the United States.
在美国，绿卡是成为永久居民的法律证据，这样你就有权利永久地在这里工作和居住。
A Green Card gives you official immigration status in the United States.
在美国，绿卡是对移民身份的官方认可。
Not all foreign individuals are eligible to work in the United States, but if you are, better protect your green card status.
不是所有的外国人都可以在美国工作的，如果你正在这里工作，那就好好保护你的绿卡身份吧。
A green card can serve as easily recognizable proof of third party insurance, for example in the case of an accident, when traveling abroad.
例如在国外旅行出了事故，绿卡可用作第三方保险的证明，很容易识别。
A Green Card is an internationally recognized document that serves as evidence that the holder has the minimum insurance cover required by law in the country visited.
绿卡是国际公认的证明文件，可以做为证据使用，这样当地政府就会提供少量的赔偿。

醒目
xǐngmù
(of written words or pictures) catch the eye; attract attention; be striking to the eye
马路上这些醒目的车道线是刚刚刷上去的。
Mǎlù shàng zhèxiē xǐngmù de chēdàoxiàn shì gānggāng shuā shàngqù de。
These striking lines on the traffic lane were painted only a moment ago.
这个机徽很醒目，即使在天上也可以看得清楚。
Zhège jīhuī hěnxǐngmù，jíshǐ zài tiānshàng yě kěyǐ kàn de qīngchu。
This plane badge is very striking, it can be seen even when the plane is flying in the sky.
这个报道的标题要做套红处理，越醒目越好。
Zhège bàodào de biāotí yào zuò tàohóng chǔlǐ，yuè xǐngmù yuè hǎo。

wake from one\'s sleep

xǐngguòlái
wake up; sober up; come to

to come to life
[person，party etc+] 苏醒过来
Her eyes opened and she woke up.
她的眼睛睁开了，她醒过来了。
He was waken after a long coma.

醒悟过来，恢复正常
The man was awaken with a startle.
Yóuyú shòudào jīngxià，tā xǐngle guòlái。
由于受到惊吓，他醒了过来。
When I stay up all night, I usually have some coffee to keep me alert.
我彻夜熬夜的时候，经常喝咖啡来保持清醒。
This was strikingly demonstrated.
Zhè bèi hěn xǐngmù de zhǎnshì chūlái。
这被很醒目地展示出来。
I was waken by a loud noise in the kitchen.
Wǒ bèi chúfáng lǐ chuánlái de yìshēng jùxiǎng jīngxǐngle。
我被厨房里传来的一声巨响惊醒了。
The rooster, who had been awakened by the noise, cried down from the roof.
Bèi zàoyīn chǎoxǐng de gōngjī cóng wūdǐng tiàole xiàlái。
被噪音吵醒的公鸡从屋顶跳了下来。
Even though I was wide awake, I didn\'t recognize you with that haircut.
尽管我很清醒，但你换了头型，我还是没能认出你来。
To me, his behavior is not a sign of clouded judgment or weakness.
对我来说，他的行为并不意味着丧失了清醒的辨别能力，也不是什么缺点。
When you come in from the party, please try not to wake the whole house!
你从外面的聚会回来时，能不能别那么大动静，把全家人都吵醒了！
醒一醒！
Xǐnɡ yi xǐnɡ!
Wake up!
吃个梨醒醒酒。
Chī gè lí xǐngxingjiǔ。
Have a pear to sober yourself up.
你这一嚷不要紧，把大家都吵醒了。
Nǐ zhè yì rǎngbúyàojǐn，bǎ dàjiā dōu chǎoxǐng le。
You may think it\'s all right for you to shout, but you\'ve woken everybody up.
瞧，孩子被你们吵醒了。
Qiáo，háizi bèi nǐmen chǎoxǐng le。
Look! You\'ve woken the child.
中药催醒剂
zhōngyào cuīxǐngjì 
herbal analeptic
清醒地估计当前的形势
qīngxǐng de gūjì dāngqián de xíngshì
make a clearheaded appraisal of the present situation
醒过来
xǐngguòlái
wake up; sober up; come to
闹钟的响声将我从酣睡中惊醒。
Nào zhōng de xiǎngshēngjiāngwǒ cónghānshuì zhōng jīngxǐng。
The alarm clock roused me from my deep sleep.
他睡得正香，我不愿唤醒他。
Tā shuì de zhèngxiāng，wǒ bú yuàn huànxǐngtā。
I didn\'t want to wake him from his sound sleep.
唤醒人民
huànxǐnɡ rénmín 
arouse the people
昏迷不醒
hūnmí bùxǐnɡ 
remain unconscious
一觉醒来
yí jiào xǐnglái 
wake from one\'s sleep
一声巨响把他从睡梦中惊醒。
Yì shēngjùxiǎngbǎ tā cóngshuìmèng zhōng jīngxǐng。
He was awakened by a terrific bang.
他睡觉很惊醒，有点响动都知道。
Tā shuìjiào hěn jīngxing，yǒu diǎn xiǎngdòngdōu zhīdào。
He\'s a very light sleeper; any little noise disturbs him.
亏他提醒了我，要不我早忘了。
Kuī tā tíxǐng le wǒ，yàobùwǒ zǎo wàng le。
Luckily he reminded me; otherwise I\'d have forgotten all about it.
我屡次三番提醒他要谨慎。
Wǒ lǚcìsānfān tíxǐngtā yào jǐnshèn。
I\'ve reminded him over and over again that he should be cautious.
为醒目起见，请排黑体字。
Wèi xǐngmù qǐjiàn，qǐngpái hēitǐzì。
In order to make it stand out clearly, please print it in boldface type.
护士出来进去都轻手轻脚的，怕惊醒病人。
Hùshì chūlái jìnqù dōu qīngshǒuqīngjiǎo de，pà jīngxǐng bìngrén。
The nurse moved around very softly so as not to wake the patient.
保持清醒的头脑
bǎochí qīngxǐng de tóunǎo
keep a clear (or cool) head; keep sober-minded
现实使他清醒过来。
Xiànshí shǐ tā qīngxǐng guòlái。
The reality has sobered him up.
病人已经清醒过来。
Bìngrén yǐjing qīngxǐng guòlái。
The patient has come to.
一席话，说得他如梦初醒。
Yì xí huà，shuō de tā rúmèng chūxǐng。
This conversation made him suddenly see the light.
神志清醒
shénzhì qīngxǐng
be in one\'s right mind; remain fully conscious
她轻轻地走进卧室，生怕惊醒了孩子。
Tā qīngqīng de zǒu jìn wòshì，shēng pà jīngxǐng le háizi。
She went into the bedroom softly so as not to wake her child (or lest she should wake her child).
一阵敲门声把他从睡梦中惊醒了。
Yízhèn qiāoménshēng bǎ tā cóng shuìmèng zhōng jīngxǐng le。
He was roused from sleep by a heavy pounding on the door.
他昏迷了一个多小时才苏醒过来。
Tā hūnmí le yígè duō xiǎoshí cái sūxǐng guòlái。
He remained unconscious for more than an hour before he came to.
如果我忘了，请你提醒我一下。
Rúguǒ wǒ wàng le，qǐngnǐ tíxǐngwǒ yíxià。
Please remind me in case I should forget.
头脑清醒
tóunǎo qīnɡxǐnɡ 
clearheaded; sober-minded
我几次提醒他，惟恐他忘了。
Wǒ jǐ cì tíxǐngtā，wéikǒngtā wàng le。
I reminded him several times lest he should forget.
她小心翼翼地把门打开，生怕把孩子惊醒。
Tā xiǎoxīnyìyì de bǎ mén dǎkāi，shēngpà bǎ háizi jīngxǐng。
She opened the door gently so as not to wake the baby.
汽笛的啸鸣把人们从睡梦中惊醒。
Qìdí de xiàomíngbǎ rénmen cóngshuìmèng zhōng jīngxǐng。
The wails of the siren woke the people out of their dreams.
酒醉未醒
jiǔ zuì wèi xǐnɡ
be drunk and not sobered up yet
他昏迷了三天，刚刚醒过来。
Tā hūnmí le sān tiān，gānggāngxǐngguòlái。
He was unconscious for three days and has just come to.
今天早晨我醒得早。
Jīntiān zǎochén wǒ xǐng de zǎo。
I woke up early this morning.
浓茶可以用来醒酒。
Nóngchá kěyǐ yònglái xǐngjiǔ。
Strong tea can help to dispel the effects of alcohol.
醒目的标语
xǐngmù de biāoyǔ
eye-catching slogans
醒目的标题
xǐngmù de biāotí
bold headlines
醒世之言
xǐnɡshì zhī yán
words to rouse the public
清醒
qīngxǐng
clear-headed; sober
醒目
xǐngmù
(of written words or pictures) catch the eye; attract attention; be striking to the eye
半睡半醒之间，他忽然听见有人叫他的名字。
Bànshuìbànxǐng zhījiān，tā hūrán tīngjiàn yǒurén jiào tā de míngzi。
Halfway between sleeping and awake, he suddenly heard someone call his name.
您的批评如同当头棒喝，让我及时醒悟。
Nín de pīpíng rútóng dāngtóu bànghè，ràng wǒ jíshí xǐngwù。
Your criticism has awoken me and made me realize where I had gone wrong.
专家提醒，变色镜虽好但是不宜长时间佩戴。
Zhuānjiā tíxǐng，biànsèjìng suī hǎo dàn shì bùyí cháng shíjiān pèidài。
According to the experts, it is not good to wear light-sensitive glasses for too long.
惨厉的叫声惊醒了沉睡中的人们。
Cǎnlì de jiàoshēng jīngxǐng le chénshuì zhōng de rénmen。
The miserable shouting woke people from their sleep.
马路上这些醒目的车道线是刚刚刷上去的。
Mǎlù shàng zhèxiē xǐngmù de chēdàoxiàn shì gānggāng shuā shàngqù de。
These striking lines on the traffic lane were painted only a moment ago.
他已经沉眠两天了，不知道什么时候才能苏醒过来。
Tā yǐjing chénmián liǎngtiān le，bùzhīdào shénme shíhou cáinéng sūxǐng guòlái。
He has been in a deep sleep for two days, nobody knows when he will wake.
被晨风一吹，他感到清醒多了。
Bèi chénfēng yìchuī，tā gǎndào qīngxǐng duō le。
The scent of the morning air made him feel refreshed.
听了他的话，我顿然醒悟。
Tīng le tā de huà，wǒ dùnrán xǐngwù。
I suddenly woke up to reality on hearing his words.
敷用花露水可以止痒、醒脑。
Fūyòng huālòushuǐ kěyǐ zhǐyǎng、xǐngnǎo。
Toilet water can relieve itching and make one clear-minded.
快喊醒他，就要迟到了。
Kuài hǎnxǐng tā，jiùyào chídào le。
Wake him up quickly, it is getting late.
这个机徽很醒目，即使在天上也可以看得清楚。
Zhège jīhuī hěnxǐngmù，jíshǐ zài tiānshàng yě kěyǐ kàn de qīngchu。
This plane badge is very striking, it can be seen even when the plane is flying in the sky.
你以为你这样激将，他就会醒悟吗？
Nǐ yǐwéi nǐ zhèyàng jījiàng，tā jiùhuì xǐngwù ma?
Do you think he will wake up to reality due to your provocation?
这起生产事故令公司的安全部门警醒，应该加强设备的安全检查。
Zhè qǐ shēngchǎn shìgù lìng gōngsī de ānquán bùmén jǐngxǐng，yīnggāi jiāqiáng shèbèi de ānquán jiǎnchá。
This accident warns the security department of the company to be alert and improve security inspection on equipment.
仓库里存着贵重货物，咱们晚上睡觉要警醒些。
Cāngkù lǐ cúnzhe guìzhòng huòwù，zánmen wǎnshàng shuìjiào yào jǐngxǐng xiē。
We must be alert when we sleep and watch over the valuable goods in the garage.
妈妈提醒我做这道菜一定要加入一些梅干菜。
Māma tíxǐng wǒ zuò zhè dào cài yídìng yào jiārù yìxiē méigàncài。
Mother reminded me that some dried vegetables must be added to this dish.
午夜时分，一阵琴声吵醒了我。
Wǔyè shífēn，yí zhèn qínshēng chǎoxǐng le wǒ。
I was woken by the sound of a stringed instrument at midnight.
在老师的教导下，我深醒了自己的错误。
Zài lǎoshī de jiàodǎo xià，wǒ shēnxǐng le zìjǐ de cuòwù。
Under the teacher\'s instructions, I fully realized my mistakes.
我一觉醒来，感觉神清气爽。
Wǒ yíjiào xǐnglái，gǎnjué shénqīng qìshuǎng。
I felt fresh and cool after a sleep.
这个报道的标题要做套红处理，越醒目越好。
Zhège bàodào de biāotí yào zuò tàohóng chǔlǐ，yuè xǐngmù yuè hǎo。
The title of this report is to be colored so that it will stand out.
都下午了，你怎么还没醒盹儿？
Dōu xiàwǔ le，nǐ zěnme hái méi xǐngdǔnr？
It\'s already afternoon, haven\'t your shaken off your drowsiness?
这部小说意思醒豁。
Zhèbù xiǎoshuō yìsi xǐnghuō。
The theme of the novel is clearly presented.
刘兰芳把醒木一敲，开始说书了。
Liú Lánfāng bǎ xǐngmù yìqiāo，kāishǐ shuōshū le。
Liu Lanfang gave one beat of the gavel and began his storytelling.
薄荷具有提神醒脑的作用。
Bòhe jùyǒu tíshén xǐngnǎo de zuòyòng。
Mint can refresh the  mind.
今天我巡哨，早上你可要记得叫醒我啊。
Jīntiān wǒ xúnshào，zǎoshàng nǐ kě yào jìde jiào xǐng wǒ a。
Today is my turn to patrol. Don\'t forget to wake me up in the morning.
医生说要等麻醉剂的药劲过了他才能醒。
Yīshēng shuō yào děng mázuìjì de yàojìn guòle tā cáinéng xǐng。
The doctor says that he will not wake until the anesthetic loses potency.
孩子们清晨醒来后，会发现圣诞树下堆满了圣诞礼物。
Háizǐmen qīngchén xǐngláihòu，huì fāxiàn shèngdànshùxià duīmǎn le shèngdànlǐwù。
When the children wake up in the morning, they\'ll find a lot of Christmas presents under the Christmas tree .

bǎochí qīngxǐng de tóunǎo

rúmèngfāngxǐng
as if just awakened from a dream

Měitiān zǎochén nàozhōng bǎ wǒ huànxǐng.

mínzúyìshí de juéxǐng
the awakening of a national consciousness

Kuī nǐ bǎ wǒ jiàoxǐng，yàobù wǒ jiù chídàole.

Wǒmen qù kàn bìngrén shí，tā hái méiyǒu qīngxǐng.

Lǎoshī de yìfānhuà，shǐ tā rúmèngchūxǐng.

shànyì de tíxǐng

您能明天早上8点叫醒我吗？我得去趟银行。

我知道这听起来可能有些不可思议，不过周日时我总是在下午4点以后才能醒过来。
Yesterday, Carl awoke me at 7am to go playing tennis.
卡尔昨天早上七点就把我叫醒去打网球。
He couldn\'t think straight.
他头脑不够清醒。

Last night, I woke up and my heart was pounding out of control.
昨晚我醒来后，心脏像是失控了一样狂跳不止。

你从外面的聚会回来时，能不能别那么大动静，把全家人都吵醒了！

作为你的母亲，我的职责就是要在你犯错的时候提醒你。
