他提醒我注意自己的身份，让我知道他才是老板。
He wasn\'t right in his head when he made the will.
他立遗嘱时，头脑已经不怎么清醒了。
John is sleeping off the hangover.
约翰睡了一觉，才从宿醉中醒来。

催眠师击掌唤醒了人群。
She woke up just as day was dawning.
她在天快亮时醒来了。

电话铃响时，我还没怎么睡醒呢。
To me, his behavior is not a sign of clouded judgment or weakness.
对我来说，他的行为并不意味着丧失了清醒的辨别能力，也不是什么缺点。
I woke up several times during the night.
我夜里醒了好几次。

a rude awakening
猛然醒悟
to have a clear head
头脑清醒
When I woke up, I found I couldn\'t move my legs.
醒来时，我发觉腿动不了了。
to give sb a gentle hint/reminder
给某人一个善意的暗示/提醒
The noise woke the whole house.
那个声音吵醒了全家。
to come to life
[person，party etc+] 苏醒过来
Her eyes opened and she woke up.
她的眼睛睁开了，她醒过来了。
to remind sb to do sth
提醒某人做某事
to remind sb that...
提醒某人…
to remind sb of sth
提醒某人某事
to rouse o.s.
醒来
to have one\'s head screwed on
[inf] 保持头脑清醒
to stay sober
保持清醒
The name on the van stood out clearly.
货车上的名字非常醒目。
He awoke with a start.
他猛然惊醒。
to have one\'s wits about one
保持头脑清醒
When I stay up all night, I usually have some coffee to keep me alert.
我彻夜熬夜的时候，经常喝咖啡来保持清醒。

在弥留之际，这位老人仍很清醒。

病人被局部麻醉后，头脑还是清醒的。

那蛇醒了，伸开了盘着的身体.

早上我被妈妈叫醒了。

老师提醒了我们野外实习的作业。
This place is crawling with ninjas. We had better keep our eyes open.
这个地方到处是忍者，我们最好警醒些。
Not wanting to wake her up, he crept quietly up to his bedroom.
他不想惊醒她，于是蹑手蹑脚地悄悄走到自己的卧室。

醒目的广告

一阵清新的空气能帮助你提神醒脑。

a well-intentioned warning

to come to life
[person，party etc+] 苏醒过来

对不起，我还没睡醒，五分钟前我刚起床。

I should let my son have his sleep out.

我应该让我的儿子睡足自行醒来。

报警器响了，消防员从他们的睡梦中惊醒。
闹钟的响声将我从酣睡中惊醒。
Nào zhōng de xiǎngshēngjiāngwǒ cónghānshuì zhōng jīngxǐng。
The alarm clock roused me from my deep sleep.
一声巨响把他从睡梦中惊醒。
Yì shēngjùxiǎngbǎ tā cóngshuìmèng zhōng jīngxǐng。
He was awakened by a terrific bang.
他睡觉很惊醒，有点响动都知道。
Tā shuìjiào hěn jīngxing，yǒu diǎn xiǎngdòngdōu zhīdào。
He\'s a very light sleeper; any little noise disturbs him.
护士出来进去都轻手轻脚的，怕惊醒病人。
Hùshì chūlái jìnqù dōu qīngshǒuqīngjiǎo de，pà jīngxǐng bìngrén。
The nurse moved around very softly so as not to wake the patient.
她轻轻地走进卧室，生怕惊醒了孩子。
Tā qīngqīng de zǒu jìn wòshì，shēng pà jīngxǐng le háizi。
She went into the bedroom softly so as not to wake her child (or lest she should wake her child).
一阵敲门声把他从睡梦中惊醒了。
Yízhèn qiāoménshēng bǎ tā cóng shuìmèng zhōng jīngxǐng le。
He was roused from sleep by a heavy pounding on the door.
她小心翼翼地把门打开，生怕把孩子惊醒。
Tā xiǎoxīnyìyì de bǎ mén dǎkāi，shēngpà bǎ háizi jīngxǐng。
She opened the door gently so as not to wake the baby.
汽笛的啸鸣把人们从睡梦中惊醒。
Qìdí de xiàomíngbǎ rénmen cóngshuìmèng zhōng jīngxǐng。
The wails of the siren woke the people out of their dreams.
惨厉的叫声惊醒了沉睡中的人们。

Wǒ mǎi le yì shuāng huāyàngdāo lái xuéxí huábīng。
I have bought ice skates to learn to figure skate.
他刻苦练习冰球，不知用坏了多少球刀。
Tā kèkǔ liànxí bīngqiú，bùzhī yònghuài le duōshǎo qiúdāo。
He practices ice hockey hard, nobody knows how many hockey blades he has worn out.
Ice melts under the blades of the skates and this makes them slide easily.
Bīngdāo xiàmiàn de bīng rónghuàle，zhè shǐ tāmen huáqǐbīnglái gèng qīngsōng。
冰刀下面的冰熔化了，这使他们滑起冰来更轻松。

yuánzǐ pòbīngchuán
atomic icebreaker

There are a great number of people in the park riding the sledge.

现在在冰里的一些船必须被拉到岸上。
Last night the U-boat was towed by a trawler to Iceland.
昨晚那艘U潜艇被一艘拖网渔船拖到了冰岛。
这俩人冰场斗技，引来不少人围观。

The two competed with each other in skills, attracting a crowd of onlookers.

旱冰场
这种冰箱在市场上十分走红。

溜冰场就建在他们的后院，所以他们有专属使用权。

Chúle chāo bàng de huáxuě yùndòng zhīwài，zhège yúlè chǎng háiyǒu diànyǐngyuàn、bǎolíngqiúguǎn hé liūbīngchǎng。

他溜冰溜到了冰层很薄的地方，真是胡来。
Tā liūbīngliū dào le bīngcénghěn báo de dìfāng，zhēn shì húlái。
It was reckless of him to skate out onto the thin ice.
冷冰冰的脸色
lěngbīngbīng de liǎnsè 
a cold expression; frosty looks
冷冰冰的态度
lěngbīngbīng de tàidu 
an icy manner
对人冷冰冰的
duì rén lěngbīngbīng de 
be cold towards people
她的手冷冰冰的。
Tā de shǒu lěngbīngbīng de。
Her hands are icy.

Tā zhèngzài qīnglǐ bīngxiāng lǐ de bīngchár。
He is cleaning the thin coat of ice in the fridge.
为了学习滑冰，他给自己买了一个冰车。
Wèile xuéxí huábīng，tā gěi zìjǐ mǎi le yígè bīngchē。
He bought himself a device with ice skate blades to learn to skate.
他把刚买的冰棍放在冰瓶里，等孩子们回来吃。

He bought some ice lollies, and put them in the ice flask for the children to eat when they come back.

He put the ice-cream he had just bought into the refrigerator.
他的手凉冰冰的，是不是生病了？
Tā de shǒu liángbīngbīng de，shìbushì shēngbìng le？
His hands are ice-cold. Is he ill?

Tā chī bīngtáng húlu zhīqián，zǒng yào xiān chīdiào wàimiàn bāo zhe de nà céng nuòmǐzhǐ。
She always eats the glutinous rice paper on the outside before she eats the candied haws.
他一下子吃了三个冰淇淋，结果受凉跑肚了。
Tā yíxiàzi chī le sāngè bīngqílín，jiéguǒ shòuliáng pǎodù le。
He ate three ice creams all at once. and ended up with a cold and diarrhea.
他刻苦练习冰球，不知用坏了多少球刀。
Tā kèkǔ liànxí bīngqiú，bùzhī yònghuài le duōshǎo qiúdāo。
He practices ice hockey hard, nobody knows how many hockey blades he has worn out.
陪同皇帝游历的这几天，我一直是如临深渊，如履薄冰，生怕自己做错事。
Péitóng huángdì yóulì de zhè jǐ tiān，wǒ yìzhí shì rúlín shēnyuān，rúlǚbóbīng，shēngpà zìjǐ zuò cuòshì。
Those days when I accompanied the emperor on his tour, I was afraid of doing something wrong, as if I was standing on the edge of an abyss or treading on thin ice.
朔风阵阵的早晨，窗玻璃上结满了冰花。
Shuòfēng zhènzhèn de zǎochén，chuāng bōli shàng jiémǎn le bīnghuā。
In a morning when there were blasts of north wind, the window glass was covered with a lot of ice crystals.
湖面上的冰碎裂了，春天又来到了人间！
Húmiàn shàng de bīng suìliè le，chūntiān yòu láidào le rénjiān！
The ice on the lake surface has cracked, which means spring has come back to the world again!
这些冰雕动物晶莹剔透、栩栩如生。
Zhèxiē bīngdiāo dòngwù jīngyíng tītòu、xǔxǔrúshēng。
These ice-carved animals are sparkling and crystal-clear.
他温煦的笑容融化了她那颗冰冷的心。
Tā wēnxù de xiàoróng rónghuà le tā nà kē bīnglěng de xīn。
His warm smile warms her cold heart.
水发生相变后可能变成水蒸汽或者冰。
Shuǐ fāshēng xiāngbiàn hòu kěnéng biànchéng shuǐzhēngqì huòzhě bīng。
Water can turn into steam or ice in its phase transition.
水蒸汽、水和冰是同一物质的气体、液体、固体三个相态。
Shuǐzhēngqì、shuǐ hé bīng shì tóngyí wùzhì de qìtǐ、yètǐ、gùtǐ sāngè xiàng tài。
Steam, water and ice constitute the three phases of one substance.
春天到了，气温开始回升，冰雪也渐渐消溶了。
Chūntiān dào le，qìwēn kāishǐ huíshēng，bīngxuě yě jiànjiàn xiāoróng le。
Spring comes, the temperature rises, and the snow and ice melt gradually.
他从来都是这样淡泊名利，一片冰心。

He is always morally pure and indifferent to fame and fortune.

The twigs hereof are physic.
Qí nènzhī shì yàocái。
其嫩枝是药材。
The physician prescribed a commercial preparation of the medicine.
Yīshēng kāile yào de pèizhì cáiliào。

She collected the ingredients and cooked the medicine down into a thick liquid.
Tā jíqíle cáiliào，ránhòu bǎ zhèxiē yào zhǔ chéngle jiāng。
她集齐了材料，然后把这些药煮成了浆。
买家具的时候，一定要分辨边材和心材。
Mǎi jiājù de shíhou，yídìng yào fēnbiàn biāncái hé xīncái。
One must be able to differentiate between cambium and heartwood when buying furniture.
我们都知道，心材价格一向高于边材价格。
Wǒmen dōu zhīdào，xīncái jiàgé yí xiàng gāoyú biāncái jiàgé。
We all know that the price of heartwood is higher than that of sapwood.
上课前请同学去器材室把实心球拿来，我们课上要用。
Shàngkè qián qǐng tóngxué qù qìcáishì bǎ shíxīnqiú nálái，wǒmen kè shàng yào yòng。
Students, please bring the medicine balls here before class, we\'ll use them in class.
这些材料都是别有用心地瞎编出来的！
He was small in stature but big in heart and determination.

他身材矮小，但心气和决心很大。

现代题材
xiàndài tícái
contemporary themes
题材新颖
tícái xīnyǐnɡ
original in choice of subject (or theme)
这批爱国主义题材的书籍很有教育意义。
Zhè pī àiguózhǔyì tícái de shūjí hěnyǒu jiàoyù yìyì。
These books on patriotism are very educational.
他最善于创作这类题材的作品，每每能够妙笔生花。
Tā zuì shànyú chuàngzuò zhè lèi tícái de zuòpǐn，měiměi nénggòu miàobǐshēnghuā。
He is good at creating works with this theme, so he always can write ingeniously with exquisite description.
这个可以入戏的好题材是我从报纸上看到的。
Zhège kěyǐ rùxì de hǎo tícái shì wǒ cóng bàozhǐ shàng kàndào de。
I saw a good theme in a newspaper, which can be put into a drama.
我最喜欢看历史题材的电视剧。
Wǒ zuì xǐhuan kàn lìshǐ tícái de diànshìjù。
I like TV shows with historical themes.
抓住这个主题，把所有的材料组编起来，成为一个整体。
Zhuāzhù zhège zhǔtí，bǎ suǒyǒu de cáiliào zǔbiān qǐlái，chéngwéi yígè zhěngtǐ。
Keep to the theme; put all relevant material together and work it into a unified, organic whole.

This book came out about a year ago but merits a mention because the subject matter  interests quite a number of people.

两本书中都有一个部分探讨的是同一个主题，使用同样的材料，最后得出类似的结论。

She collected many writing materials through a series of investigations and surveys.

The reporter had two sources for the story.

那个记者对那件事的报道素材源自两个渠道。
The gossip columnist got his information by visiting nightclubs every night.

The goal of the well-disciplined, physically trim athletes was to be better.
训练有素、身材匀称的运动员的目标是成为更好的运动员。
A composite is any material made up of two or more distinct elements.
Fùhécáiliào shìzhǐ yǒu liǎngzhǒng huò gèngduō bùtóng yuánsù gòuchéng de rènhé cáiliào。
复合材料是指有两种或更多不同元素构成的任何材料。

身材魁梧
shēncái kuíwú
of great height and powerful build; tall and sturdy
身材瘦小
shēncái shòuxiǎo
slight of figure (or stature)

shēncái yúnchèn

She is not only attractive but also tall and thin.
他身材高大，走到哪里都是鹤立人群。

He is tall, and stands head and shoulders above others wherever he goes.
虽然已经70岁了，但是他依然身材坚俉。
Suīrán yǐjing qīshísuì le，dànshì tā yīrán shēncái jiānwù。
He is still in good condition, even though he is already seventy years old.
新娘子身材高挑，面容娇好。
Xīnniángzi shēncái gāotiǎo，miànróng jiāohǎo。
The bride has a good figure and a tender face.

She is lecturing others about the secrets of keeping a good figure.
这个姑娘身材佼好，面容清秀。

The girl has a good figure and comely appearance.
这件紧身儿很适合她穿，显得她身材很好。

她个子高身材好，是个不错的服装模特儿。

She is tall and in a good shape, and is an excellent fashion model.
他挺秀的身材在同行的人中显得特别突出。

演出在一阵震耳欲聋的鼓声中开始了。
The earthquake caused the people to flee away in horror.
Dìzhèn ràng rénmen zài jīngkǒng zhōng táosàn。
地震让人们在惊恐中逃散。
He could feel the shimmy in the steering wheel.
Tā nénggòu gǎnjué dào fāngxiàngpán zhōng bù xúncháng de zhèndòng。
他能够感觉到方向盘中不寻常的震动。
This show zaps the viewers with some shocking scenes.
Zhège jiémù zhōng yìxiē lìng rén zhènjīng de chǎngjǐng ràng guānzhòng gǎndào bēngkuì。
这个节目中一些令人震惊的场景让观众感到崩溃。
Selling the company caused an earthquake among the employees.
Chūshòu gōngsī de xiāoxi zài yuángōng zhōng chǎnshēngle jùdà zhèndòng。
出售公司的消息在员工中产生了巨大震动。
His dreamed symphony would take the world of music by storm.
Tā mèngxiǎng zhōng de jiāoxiǎngyuè nénggòu zhènjīng yīnyuèjiè。
他梦想中的交响乐能够震惊音乐界。
He was startled to see a column of smoke rising from among the trees.
Tā hěn zhènjīng de kàndào yānzhù zài shùlín zhī zhōng shēngqǐ。
他很震惊地看到烟柱在树林之中升起。
He was shocked by the softness of the atmosphere surrounding the young prince, arising from the superfluity of the femininity that guided him.
Tā bèi nà wèi niánqīng wángzǐ zhōuwéi de wēnróu qìfēn suǒ zhènjīng，nàzhǒng qìfēn yuánzì tā shòudào guòduō de nǚxìng qìzhì yǐngxiǎng。
他被那位年轻王子周围的温柔气氛所震惊，那种气氛源自他受到过多的女性气质影响。
爆炸的声音震得他耳根发麻。
Bàozhà de shēngyīn zhèn de tā ěrgēn fāmá。
The noise of the explosion made his ears numb.
震耳欲聋的声音
zhèn\'ěryùlóng de shēngyīn
an ear-splitting sound
他在电影院里感觉音响有点震耳。
Tā zài diànyǐngyuàn lǐ gǎnjué yīnxiǎng yǒudiǎn zhèněr。
He thought the hi-fi in the cinema sounded a little deafening.
From inside the shed came a dull rolling thudding noise.
Cóng chēkù de lǐmiàn chuánchū yí zhèn róuhé de gǔndòng de zhèn yīn。
从车库的里面传出一阵柔和的滚动的震音。
His dreamed symphony would take the world of music by storm.
Tā mèngxiǎng zhōng de jiāoxiǎngyuè nénggòu zhènjīng yīnyuèjiè。
他梦想中的交响乐能够震惊音乐界。
The noise from the train wreck made me go deaf.
Huǒchē bàofèi shí fāchū de zàoyīn bǎ wǒ zhènlóng le。
火车报废时发出的噪音把我震聋了。
The low notes have a rich roundness that make your ankles wobble.
Dīyīn de nóngzhòng néng zhèndòng nǐ de jiǎohuái。
低音的浓重能震动你的脚踝。
他任凭手机在一旁震响，也不理会。
Tā rènpíng shǒujī zài yìpáng zhènxiǎng，yě bùlǐhuì。
He let his cellphone vibrate, and ring beside him doing nothing about it.
随着山边的一声震响，炸弹被引爆了。
Suí zhe shānbiān de yìshēng zhènxiǎng，zhà dàn bèi yǐnbào le。
With a deafening sound at the side of the hill, the bomb is exploded.
他在电影院里感觉音响有点震耳。
Tā zài diànyǐngyuàn lǐ gǎnjué yīnxiǎng yǒudiǎn zhèněr。
He thought the hi-fi in the cinema sounded a little deafening.

Wōlúnjī zhuàndòngshí fāchūle zhèn\'ěryùlóng de xiǎngshēng。
The turbine makes a lot of noise.
震响山谷
在耳边震响。
一声震响。
锣鼓擂得震天价响|听到一声震天价的巨响。
炮声震天价响
炮弹把门窗震得直响。
An improperly adjusted tool chatters.
未调好的工具震颤作响。
A train was crossing the bridge, and its thunder drummed against the glass.

一列火车正在过桥，轰隆隆的响声震撼着玻璃。
It rattled the windowpane and sent the dog scratching to get under the bed.
窗玻璃震得格格作响，把狗吓得往床底下钻。

yì shēngzhèntiāndòngdì de jīngléi

强震区
qiángzhènqū
meizoseismal area

The earthquake affected the entire island country.
地震灾区的震情
dìzhèn zāiqū de zhènqíng
situation in the earthquake zone
在地震灾区进行抢掠的人将被枪决。
Zài dìzhèn zāiqū jìnxíngqiǎnglüè de rén jiāngbèi qiāngjué。
Anyone found looting in the earthquake-stricken area will be shot.
地震灾区
dìzhèn zāiqū
earthquake-stricken area
震中区
zhèn zhōng qū 
epicentral area
地震发生后，灾区群众住进了临时的防震棚。
Dìzhèn fāshēng hòu，zāiqū qúnzhòng zhù jìn le línshí de fángzhènpéng。
People living in the disaster area moved into temporary earthquake shelters after the earthquake.
该地区发生地震灾情，国家领导驰电慰问。
Gāi dìqū fāshēng dìzhèn zāiqíng，guójiā lǐngdǎo chídiàn wèiwèn。
An earthquake struck that district.  The Chinese leaders hurriedly sent a cable to express their sympathy, and solicitude to people there.
地震造成了这个地区的煤矿坍方。
Dìzhèn zàochéng le zhège dìqū de méikuàng tānfāng。
The earthquake caused the collapse of the coal mines in this district.
这片地区经常会发生火山地震。
Zhè piàn dìqū jīngcháng huì fāshēng huǒshān dìzhèn。
Volcanic earthquakes often happen in this area.
部队星夜驰援地震灾区
We will aid the victims of the earthquake.
Wǒmen jiāng duì dìzhèn zāiqū de rénmen jìnxíng yuánzhù。
我们将对地震灾区的人们进行援助。
The research result will be important for the new generation of seismic zonation.
这项研究成果对新一代地震动参数区划图具有重大的意义。
We received reports of the earthquake damages in the area.
我们听到了关于该地区遭到地震破坏的报道。

地震的时候，找一个空旷的地区，远离高楼、树木和电线。
All concrete frame buildings in the region collapsed in the earthquake.
这个地区所有的混凝土结构建筑都在地震中倒塌了。

The Nanjing Massacre shocked the country and the whole world.
震惊中外。
那些战俘受到了不人道的待遇，世界舆论为之震惊。

The Nanjing Massacre shocked the country and the whole world.
如此惨象，使人震惊。

The people are shocked to see such a terrible scene.
我生平从未感到这么震惊过。

I have never been so astonished in my whole life.
得知这个消息，人们震惊了。

People were amazed to hear this news.

yì shēngzhèntiāndòngdì de jīngléi
sudden clap of a shattering thunder

震惊。
贪贿数额之大，令人震惊。
得此凶耗，震惊不已。
朝野震惊
这番话犹如晴天霹雳，令人震惊。

震惊中外。

a discovery that startled the world
震惊世人的发现

得知他已经离开了公司，我们感到很震惊。

听到祖父去世的消息，他感到很震惊。

她的意外太让人震惊了。
That tragedy touched the hearts of millions.
这场悲剧震惊了无数人。

得知他出了意外，她大为震惊。
I was shocked by his story which was absolutely awful.
我对他不幸的遭遇深感震惊。

to come as a surprise/shock
出人意料/令人震惊地来了

to be horrified at sth

to give sb a jolt
使某人震惊
to be numb with shock/fear/grief

（听到…）令人震惊
I was shocked to learn that...
听说…我很震惊

我听到关于朋友的可怕消息后，一下震惊了。

Tā nà shèrénxīnpò de měi zhènjīngle guānzhòng。

Tā bèi nà wèi niánqīng wángzǐ zhōuwéi de wēnróu qìfēn suǒ zhènjīng，nàzhǒng qìfēn yuánzì tā shòudào guòduō de nǚxìng qìzhì yǐngxiǎng。
他被那位年轻王子周围的温柔气氛所震惊，那种气氛源自他受到过多的女性气质影响。
I was shocked at the lack of ambition among the staff.
yuángōngmen de xiōngwúdàzhì lìng wǒ gǎndào zhènjīng。
员工们的胸无大志令我感到震惊。
The earthquake caused the people to flee away in horror.
Dìzhèn ràng rénmen zài jīngkǒng zhōng táosàn。
地震让人们在惊恐中逃散。
这次地震为里氏震级七点一级。
zhè cì dì zhèn wéi lǐ shì zhèn jí qī diǎn yī jí。
The shock was of 7.1 magnitude on the Richter scale.
七级地震
qījí dìzhèn 
an earthquake of magnitude 7 (on the Richter scale)
经测定，这次地震的烈度为七级。
Jīng cèdìng，zhècì dìzhèn de lièdù wéi qī jí。
This earthquake measured 7 according to the seismic survey.
这次地震云南各地普遍有震感。

The earthquake was felt in many parts of Yunnan province.
1976年唐山大地震的时候北京都感到震荡。

Tremors were felt in Beijing when a great earthquake rocked Tangshan in 1976.
我生平从未感到这么震惊过。
Wǒ shēngpíng cóngwèi gǎndào zhème zhènjīngguò。
I have never been so astonished in my whole life.
他在电影院里感觉音响有点震耳。
Tā zài diànyǐngyuàn lǐ gǎnjué yīnxiǎng yǒudiǎn zhèněr。
He thought the hi-fi in the cinema sounded a little deafening.
I was shocked by his story which was absolutely awful.
我对他不幸的遭遇深感震惊。
to be horrified at sth
对某事感到震惊
The scandalous behavior of this married woman shocked her friends.

这位已婚妇女的浪荡行为让她的朋友感到震惊。

I\'m shocked from what you are telling me that Ken is a wolf in sheep\'s clothing.

你告诉我肯是一个披着羊皮的狼，我感到很震惊。
I regret the loss of life in this earthquake.
我为这次地震中死去的人感到痛惜。

This show zaps the viewers with some shocking scenes.

shake; shock; vibrate
如此惨象，使人震惊。
Rúcǐ cǎnxiàng,shǐrén zhènjīng.
The people are shocked to see such a terrible scene.
近期股市震荡，我已经把仓位降到了二分之一。
Jìnqī gǔshì zhèndàng，wǒ yǐjing bǎ cāngwèi jiàngdào le èr fēn zhīyī。
I have reduced the empty space of the storehouses by a half beacause of the unstable stock market.
我们刚刚接到了市地震局的测报。
Wǒmen gānggāng jiēdào le shì dìzhènjú de cèbào。
We have just received the measurement report from the Municipal Earthquake Bereau.
监测室里，技术人员正在紧张地进行测震工作。
Jiāncèshì lǐ，jìshù rényuán zhèngzài jǐnzhāng de jìnxíng cèzhèn gōngzuò。
In the surveillance room, technicians were busy measuring the magnitude of the earthquake.
该地区发生地震灾情，国家领导驰电慰问。
Gāi dìqū fāshēng dìzhèn zāiqíng，guójiā lǐngdǎo chídiàn wèiwèn。
An earthquake struck that district.  The Chinese leaders hurriedly sent a cable to express their sympathy, and solicitude to people there.
地震过后，唐山人民在国家的帮助下重整家园。
Dìzhèn guòhòu，Tángshān rénmín zài guójiā de bāngzhù xià chóngzhěng jiāyuán。
With the help of the government, people in Tangshan began to rebuild their homes after the earthquake.
这次地震是由地壳的错动引发的。
Zhècì dìzhèn shì yóu dìqiào de cuòdòng yǐnfā de。
This earthquake was caused by diastrophism of the earth\'s crust.
地震发生的时候，天塌地陷。
Dìzhèn fāshēng de shíhou，tiāntā dìxiàn。
When earthquakes happen, it seems that the sky and the earth are sinking.
这个地震棚废弃很久了。
Zhège dìzhènpéng fèiqì hěnjiǔ le。
This quakeproof shed has long been out of use.
老鼠搬家，牛羊狂躁，有可能是地震噩兆。
Lǎoshǔ bānjiā，niú yáng kuángzào，yǒu kěnéng shì dìzhèn èzhào。
When rats move house and cows and sheep become wild, it is a sign of an earthquake.
爆炸的声音震得他耳根发麻。
Bàozhà de shēngyīn zhèn de tā ěrgēn fāmá。
The noise of the explosion made his ears numb.
地震后的重建工作很顺利，大家纷纷盖起了新的房舍。
Dìzhèn hòu de chóngjiàn gōngzuò hěn shùnlì，dàjiā fēnfēn gài qǐ le xīn de fángshě。
The reconstruction works after the earthquake are going smoothly with everyone putting up their new houses.
在封装贵重易碎品时，应有抗震填充物。
Zài fēngzhuāng guìzhòng yìsuìpǐn shí，yīng yǒu kàngzhèn tiánchōngwù。
When packing valuable and fragile items, we should put anti-earthquake filling materials inside.
股指在高位震荡。
Gǔzhǐ zài gāowèi zhèndàng.
The stock index is fluctuating violently.
候风地动仪是世界上最早出现的地震仪。
Hòufēng dìdòngyí shì shìjièshàng zuìzǎo chūxiàn de dìzhènyí。
&quot;Houfeng Seismograph&quot; is the earliest seismograph in the world.
在路面不平的路段他开启了减震器。
Zài lùmiàn bùpíng de lùduàn tā kāiqǐ le jiǎnzhènqì。
While driving on the bumpy section of the road, he switches on the shock-absorbers.
这出戏的结幕真令人震撼！
Zhè chū xì de jiémù zhēn lìngrén zhènhàn！
The ending of this play is very shocking.
四下里杀声震天，金鼓齐鸣。
Sìxiàlǐ shāshēng zhèntiān，jīngǔ qímíng。
The battle cry could be heard everywhere, and battle was hot and heavy.
听到要地震的消息大家惊惶不安。
Tīngdào yào dìzhèn de xiāoxi dàjiā jīnghuáng bùān。
People are panic-striken by the news about the coming earthquake.
多年来，他一直以他的艺术创作而名震中外。
Duōniánlái，tā yìzhí yǐ tā de yìshù chuàngzuò ér míngzhèn zhōng wài。
He has been famous at home, and abroad for his artistic works through these years.
最近股市不断地盘跌，震荡不大。
Zuìjìn gǔshì búduàn de pándiē，zhèndàng búdà。
Recently, the stock market has been falling slightly in price, with small fluctuations.
本周的期货市场，因为有人恶意抛盘而显得震荡不稳。
Běnzhōu de qīhuò shìchǎng，yīnwèiyǒurén èyì pāopán ér xiǎnde zhèndàng bùwěn。
This week\'s option market seemed to have fluctuated because somebody was selling maliciously.
我要把地震灾害的具体情况启奏皇上。
Wǒ yào bǎ dìzhèn zāihài de jùtǐ qíngkuàng qǐzòu huángshàng。
I am going to report to the emperor on the specific situation of the earthquake.
我们利用敲山震虎的办法使歹徒们露出了马脚。
Wǒmen lìyòng qiāoshān zhènhǔ de bànfǎ shǐ dǎitúmen lòuchū le mǎjiǎo。
We made the gang give their position away by attacking in an indirect way.
这次事故使他患上了轻度脑震荡。
Zhècì shìgù shǐ tā huànshàng le qīngdù nǎozhèndàng。
He was slightly concussed in this accident.
地震来临时，他只穿着条三角裤就跑到了院子里。
Dìzhèn láilín shí，tā zhī chuān zhe tiáo sānjiǎokù jiù pǎodào le yuànzi lǐ。
When the earthquake came, he ran to the courtyard wearing only a briefs.
地震造成了这个地区的煤矿坍方。
Dìzhèn zàochéng le zhège dìqū de méikuàng tānfāng。
The earthquake caused the collapse of the coal mines in this district.
地震后不少地方都发生了坍陷。
Dìzhèn hòu bùshǎo dìfāng dōu fāshēng le tānxiàn。
After the earthquake, many places had collapsed.
岳飞用兵如神，声名威震八方，令敌人闻风丧胆。
Yuè Fēi yòngbīng rúshén，shēngmíng wēizhèn bāfāng，lìng dírén wénfēng sàngdǎn。
Yue Fei could work miracles in maneuvering troops and won resounding fame throughout the country. This made enemies terror-stricken at the mention of his name.
他是这次地震中唯一的幸存者。
Tā shì zhècì dìzhèn zhōng wéiyī de xìngcúnzhě。
He is the only survivor of this earthquake.
中华雄风威震九洲大地。
Zhōnghuá xióngfēng wēizhèn jiǔzhōu dàdì。
The grand appearance of China thrills the whole world.
这次地震中负责赈务的是小明。
Zhècì dìzhèn zhōng fùzé zhènwù de shì Xiǎo Míng。
It is Xiaoming who is in charge of the relief work for the earthquake.
古代印度人称的震旦就是今天的中国。
Gǔdài Yìndùrén chēng de zhèndàn jiùshì jīntiān de Zhōngguó。
What the ancient Indian people called as Sinian is China at present.
他在电影院里感觉音响有点震耳。
Tā zài diànyǐngyuàn lǐ gǎnjué yīnxiǎng yǒudiǎn zhèněr。
He thought the hi-fi in the cinema sounded a little deafening.
这次震区波及了整个岛国。
Zhècì zhènqū bōjí le zhěnggè dǎoguó。
The earthquake affected the entire island country.
听着震天价的唢呐声，她知道迎亲队伍来了。
Tīng zhe zhèntiānjià de suǒnàshēng，tā zhīdào yíngqīn duìwu lái le。
Hearing the loud sound of the horns, she knew that the group of people who were responsible for escorting the bride to the wedding were coming.
他任凭手机在一旁震响，也不理会。
Tā rènpíng shǒujī zài yìpáng zhènxiǎng，yě bùlǐhuì。
He let his cellphone vibrate, and ring beside him doing nothing about it.
随着山边的一声震响，炸弹被引爆了。
Suí zhe shānbiān de yìshēng zhènxiǎng，zhà dàn bèi yǐnbào le。
With a deafening sound at the side of the hill, the bomb is exploded.
经测定，这次地震的烈度为七级。
Jīng cèdìng，zhècì dìzhèn de lièdù wéi qī jí。
This earthquake measured 7 according to the seismic survey.
地震仪是由张衡发明的。
Dìzhènyí shì yóu Zhāng Héng fāmíng de。
The seismometer was invented by Zhang Heng.
这片地区经常会发生火山地震。
Zhè piàn dìqū jīngcháng huì fāshēng huǒshān dìzhèn。
Volcanic earthquakes often happen in this area.
这次禁毒的宣传品很有震撼力，参观的人很多。
Zhècì jìndú de xuānchuánpǐn hěn yǒu zhènhànlì，cānguān de rén hěnduō。
The publicity materials at the anti-drug campaign have attracted a large number of visitors with their huge impact.
电脑包装箱里有好多用于防震隔潮的泡沫塑料。
Diànnǎo bāozhuāngxiāng lǐ yǒu hǎoduō yòngyú fángzhèn gécháo de pàomò sùliào。
There is a lot of anti-shock waterproof foam in a computer packing box.
涡轮机转动时发出了震耳欲聋的响声。
Wōlúnjī zhuàndòngshí fāchūle zhèn\'ěryùlóng de xiǎngshēng。
The turbine makes a lot of noise.
新疆地震了。
Xīnjiāng dìzhèn le。
There has been an earthquake in Xinjiang.
人们在哄传地震的消息。
Rénmen zài hōngchuán dìzhènde xiāoxi。
People are spreading the news of the earthquake.
震天动地的呼声
zhèntiāndòngdìde hūshēng
an earth-shattering cry
他家乡闹了地震。
Tā jiāxiāng nàole dìzhèn.
His hometown suffered an earthquake.
强烈地震
qiángliè dìzhèn
a powerful earthquake
我生平从未感到这么震惊过。
Wǒ shēngpíng cóngwèi gǎndào zhème zhènjīngguò。
I have never been so astonished in my whole life.
回忆起大地震时的场景，她到现在还心惊胆战。
Huíyì qǐ dàdìzhèn shí de chǎngjǐng，tā dào xiànzài hái xīnjīng-dǎnzhàn。
When she remembers the scene at the time of the earthquake, she still feels terrified.
余震

after-shock

Dézhī zhège xiāoxi，rénmen zhènjīng le。
People were amazed to hear this news.

抗震抢险，重建家园。

这番话犹如晴天霹雳，令人震惊。

地震后各界立即伸出援手。

地震前动物不安地躁动。

炮声在耳边震荡。

窗户震动了一下。
这场海啸震动了全世界。
改革开放的成功震撼了全世界。

消息令人震惊。
震惊中外。
震慑敌人。
震慑力量。
尚未发现地震的征候。
A seismograph records earthquakes.
地震仪记录地震的情况
Antiseismic architecture enabled the building to survive the earthquake.
抗震结构使得这座大厦能够在地震中幸存下来。
The earthquake caused many older buildings to topple over.
Dìzhèn zhèn tāle xǔduō shídài jiào jiǔ de jiànzhù。
地震震塌了许多时代较久的建筑。
When the earthquake hit, everything in the office was vibrating.
Dìzhèn láixí shí，bàngōngshì de suǒyǒu dōngxi dōu zài zhèndòng。
地震来袭时，办公室的所有东西都在震动。
All the jars and jolts were smoothed out by the shock absorbers.
Suǒyǒu de yáohuàng hé zhèndòng dōu bèi jiǎnzhènqì xiāochú le。
所有的摇晃和震动都被减震器消除了。
The seismograph showed a sharp spike in response to the temblor.
Dìzhènyí duì zhèndòng xiǎnshì yí gè duìyìng de ruì bō。
地震仪对震动显示一个对应的锐波。
Earthquakes convulsed the countryside.
Dìzhèn shǐ Xiāngcūn jùliè zhèndòng。
地震使乡村剧烈震动。
An improperly adjusted tool chatters.
未调好的工具震颤作响。

a discovery that startled the world
震惊世人的发现
It came as a surprise to learn that he had left the company.
得知他已经离开了公司，我们感到很震惊。
He was surprised to hear that his grandfather had died.
听到祖父去世的消息，他感到很震惊。
The Argentina coast guard was astonished to find icebergs floating along the Atlantic coast.
阿根廷海岸警备队震惊地发现，冰山群正沿着大西洋海岸漂移。
The Cuban Medical Brigade attended to 73% of earthquake victims in Pakistan.
古巴医疗队帮助治疗了巴基斯坦百分之七十三的地震灾民。
I think it was an earthquake, wasn\'t it?
我认为那是地震，不是吗？
She was a sorry sight after the earthquake destroyed everything.
她一切都被地震毁掉了，非常悲惨。
Her accident was a big shock.
她的意外太让人震惊了。
These shoes absorb the shock of walking.
这些鞋子可以减轻行走时造成的震动。
That tragedy touched the hearts of millions.
这场悲剧震惊了无数人。
The earthquake made everybody jump.
突如其来的地震让每个人都吓了一跳。
She was shocked when she heard about his accident.
得知他出了意外，她大为震惊。
Estimates for the earthquake put the cost of damage at nearly $3 million.
据估算，地震造成近三百万美元的损失。
We received reports of the earthquake damages in the area.
我们听到了关于该地区遭到地震破坏的报道。
During the earthquake, she kept telling herself that nothing was wrong.
地震时，她不停告诉自己不会有什么事的。
I was shocked by his story which was absolutely awful.
我对他不幸的遭遇深感震惊。
She described the earthquake\'s destruction in vivid detail.
她绘声绘色地描述了地震的破坏力。
After the earthquake, the city was covered in dust.
地震过后，这座城市成了一片废墟。
I watched her performance and it completely blew me away.
我看了她的表演，完全把我震住了。
During a quake, find a clear spot away from buildings, trees, and power lines.
地震的时候，找一个空旷的地区，远离高楼、树木和电线。
The country was shocked, although Abraham Lincoln himself believed he would be killed.
虽然亚伯拉罕·林肯认为自己会被杀害，但是全体国民还是很震惊。
More than 5,500 people have died in the earthquake, an estimated 58 590 are injured.
有5500多人死于地震，估计有58590人受伤。
to come as a surprise/shock
出人意料/令人震惊地来了
shocked/surprised/annoyed at sth
由于某事而震惊/吃惊/恼怒
to be horrified at sth
对某事感到震惊
to give sb a jolt
使某人震惊
to be numb with shock/fear/grief
因震惊/恐惧/悲痛而失去知觉
it came as a shock (to hear that...)
（听到…）令人震惊
I was shocked to learn that...
听说…我很震惊
it was a shock to his system
对他震动很大
Victims of the earthquakes acknowledged the generous donations made by the public after the calamity.
地震的受害者在灾难过后，感谢了大众的慷慨捐献。
Strong earthquakes happened in the recent epoch.
全新世发生过强烈的地震。
I got a rude shock when I heard of the horrible news about my friend.
我听到关于朋友的可怕消息后，一下震惊了。
An earthquake sometimes can unbuild the whole city.
地震有时会摧毁整个城市。
A reed produces vibrations in the clarinet.
簧片可以在单簧管中产生震动。
Everyone made donations to help the earthquake victims.
大家都捐款帮助地震灾民。

他的耳鼓膜被爆炸气浪震破了。
It rattled the windowpane and sent the dog scratching to get under the bed.
窗玻璃震得格格作响，把狗吓得往床底下钻。
That country\'s economic progress bogged down under the influence of the world-shaking international conflict.
在那场震惊世界的国际冲突的影响下，这个国家的经济发展陷入了困境。
Her resignation was a real zinger.
她的辞职真的是件令人震撼的事。
The research result will be important for the new generation of seismic zonation.
这项研究成果对新一代地震动参数区划图具有重大的意义。
I regret the loss of life in this earthquake.
我为这次地震中死去的人感到痛惜。
All concrete frame buildings in the region collapsed in the earthquake.
这个地区所有的混凝土结构建筑都在地震中倒塌了。
The earthquake resistance of these buildings are credible.
这些建筑的抗震能力是很可靠的。
The big earthquake was given ample coverage by the media.
所有的媒体都对这次大地震做了充分的报道。
Wherever we looked, we saw  destruction after the earthquake.
地震过后，满目疮痍。
The relief distribution for the earthquake victims will arrive tomorrow.
给地震受灾人民的救灾物资会在明天运到。
The 2004 Indian Ocean Earthquake released a shock equal to 9, 560 gigatons of TNT.
2004年印度洋地震释放的能量相当于9560吉吨梯恩梯当量。
We are scarce of felt after the earthquake.
震后，我们急需毡制品。
Several buildings were still intact after the earthquake.
地震过后，有几栋楼仍然完好无损。
There was a slight earthquake and some of the dishes clattered down.
发生了一次轻微地震,一些碟子哗啦啦地掉了下来。
In theory, the share market may get agitated by the corporation\'s bankruptcy.
据估计，股市可能会因这家公司的破产而震荡。
The Sichuan earthquake gave witness to the kindness of strangers in an emergency.
四川大地震见证了危难中的那些素不相识者的善举。
Suddenly, there was a slight trembling sound from below.
突然从下面传来一阵轻微的震颤声。

kàngzhèn jiégòu
anti-seismic structure

炮火震颤着大地。
A seismograph records earthquakes.
地震仪记录地震的情况
The base  and the capital were badly damaged during the earthquake.

地震中，地基和梁柱都遭到严重损坏。
Earthquakes originate far below the surface.
Dìzhèn fāshēng zài dìbiǎo yǐxià hěn shēn de dìfang。
地震发生在地表以下很深的地方。
There was a slight earthquake and some of the dishes clattered down.
发生了一次轻微地震,一些碟子哗啦啦地掉了下来。

地震的时候，找一个空旷的地区，远离高楼、树木和电线。

古巴医疗队帮助治疗了巴基斯坦百分之七十三的地震灾民。
I think it was an earthquake, wasn\'t it?
我认为那是地震，不是吗？
She was a sorry sight after the earthquake destroyed everything.
她一切都被地震毁掉了，非常悲惨。
The earthquake made everybody jump.
突如其来的地震让每个人都吓了一跳。

据估算，地震造成近三百万美元的损失。
We received reports of the earthquake damages in the area.
我们听到了关于该地区遭到地震破坏的报道。
During the earthquake, she kept telling herself that nothing was wrong.
地震时，她不停告诉自己不会有什么事的。
She described the earthquake\'s destruction in vivid detail.
她绘声绘色地描述了地震的破坏力。
After the earthquake, the city was covered in dust.
地震过后，这座城市成了一片废墟。

这个地区所有的混凝土结构建筑都在地震中倒塌了。

所有的媒体都对这次大地震做了充分的报道。

地震过后，满目疮痍。

地震过后，有几栋楼仍然完好无损。

Earthquakes are likely to cause severe and devasting damages.

This radio station used to broadcast from a garage before becoming famous.
这家电台早期曾在一间车库播音，随后逐渐有了名气。
You can use the chain that is in the garage.
你可以用车库里的铁链。
My house doesn\'t have a garage.
我的房子没有车库。
The garage was built on later.
车库是后来才建的。
The car boot sale is a great way of emptying the contents of your loft or garage.
车尾箱甩卖是清空阁楼和车库的一大捷径。
I spent the afternoon cleaning the garage.
我一下午都在打扫车库。
How carefully did you cost the materials for the new garage?
你有没有仔细算过新车库花去了多少原料？
One day, I came home to find my garage open.
有一天，我到家时发现车库的门是开着的。
Mr. Parsons is building a garage himself.
帕森斯先生正在自己建车库。
Frank always garages his car at the same location.
弗兰克总把车停在车库的固定位置上。
His dad kept all his tools in the garage.
Tā bàba bǎ suǒyǒu gōngjù dōu fàngzài chēkù lǐ。
他爸爸把所有工具都放在车库里。
Please bring a few torches to the garage.
Qǐng ná jǐ bǎ shǒudiàntǒng dào chēkù。
请拿几把手电筒到车库。
The parking garage adjoins the city park and museum.
Chēkù jǐnkàozhe chéngshì huāyuán hé bówùguǎn。
车库紧靠着城市花园和博物馆。
The kitchen is annexed to the garage.
Chúfáng jǐnkàozhe chēkù。
厨房紧靠着车库。
The stream next to the old garage was becoming blocked with tree branches.
Jiù chēkù pángbiān de nà tiáo xīliú bèi shùzhī zǔduàn le。
旧车库旁边的那条溪流被树枝阻断了。
The car goes into the bank \'s underground garage.

This button opens the garage door.

这只电子纽扣开关用于打开车库的门。
From inside the shed came a dull rolling thudding noise.
Cóng chēkù de lǐmiàn chuánchū yí zhèn róuhé de gǔndòng de zhèn yīn。
从车库的里面传出一阵柔和的滚动的震音。
He parked the car in an underground garage near the hotel.
Tā jiāng chē tíng zài jiǔdiàn fùjìn de dìxià chēkù。
他将车停在酒店附近的地下车库。
He had photographed the two boys in their brand new uniforms outside the garage.
Tā ràng liǎng gè nánhái chuānzhe zhǎnxīn de xiàofú zhànzài chēkù wàimiàn，wèi tāmen zhàole xiàng。
他让两个男孩穿着崭新的校服站在车库外面，为他们照了相。
Drum sounds were coming from the garage across the street.
Gǔshēng láizì jiē duìmiàn de chēkù。
鼓声来自街对面的车库。
I remembered the oil drums in the garage needed to be replaced.
Wǒ jìdé chēkù zhōng de yóutǒng xūyào gēnghuàn。
我记得车库中的油桶需要更换。
The closed garage was filled with exhaust fumes.
Fēngbì de chēkù zhōng chōngmǎnle wěiqì。

The fleet of vehicles were parked inside a large garage.
Yì zhī chēduì tíngzài dàchēkù nèi。

当他们迅速离开去往马克的车库时，你连他们的影子也看不到。
He had the animals penned up in the garage.
Tā bǎ dòngwù guān zài chēkù lǐ。
他把动物关在车库里。
The ladder was pushed out of the garage.
Lóutī bèi cóng chēkù lǐ tuī chūlái。

My car was in the garage and sheltered from the hail.

我的车停在车库里，躲避冰雹。
We used the garage to stock up on supplies.
Wǒmen yòng chēkù lái chǔbèi gōngjǐ。
我们用车库来储备供给。
My mother switched on the light in the garage.
Wǒ māma dǎkāile chēkù lǐ de dēng。
我妈妈打开了车库里的灯。
My parents came back inside，worn out from the repairs to the temporary garage.
Wǒ de fùmǔ huídào wū nèi，tāmen zài línshí chēkù lèide jīnpí-lìjìn。
我的父母回到屋内，他们在临时车库累得筋疲力尽。

我把它们比喻成车库或地窖。

仓库里存着贵重货物，咱们晚上睡觉要警醒些。

We must be alert when we sleep and watch over the valuable goods in the garage.

Wèile jīhuó shìchǎng gòumǎilì，liǎng jiā gōngsī juédìng jiàngjià liánxiāo bùfēn kùcún shāngpǐn。
In order to activate market purchasing power, the two companies decided to lower the price to jointly sell some of the stock goods.

我们从这个库房里领取了十箱美浓纸。

她家在南疆城市库尔勒，对我来说那是个很遥远的地方。

She lives in Ku’erle, Xinjiang, which for me is a faraway place.
国家对钱粮都有一定的库存，以备不时之需。

今天下午公司要清库盘点货物。

本店服装一律清库甩卖！

At the direction of his wife he had cleaned the attic and garage.
Fèng qīzi zhī mìng，tā dǎsǎole gélóu hé chēkù。
奉妻子之命，他打扫了阁楼和车库。
This container belongs in the garage，and not in the kitchen.
Zhè xiāngzi shì chēkù de，bú shì chúfáng de。
这箱子是车库的，不是厨房的。
He was found hanged by a rope in the garage of his home.
Tā bèi fāxiàn yòng shéngzi diàozài zìjiā de chēkù lǐ。
他被发现用绳子吊在自家的车库里。
You couldn\'t see them for dust as they dashed off to Mike\'s garage.
Dāng tāmen xùnsù líkāi qù wǎng Mǎkè de chēkù shí，nǐ lián tāmen de yǐngzi yě kànbúdào。
当他们迅速离开去往马克的车库时，你连他们的影子也看不到。
He had the animals penned up in the garage.
Tā bǎ dòngwù guān zài chēkù lǐ。
他把动物关在车库里。
The ladder was pushed out of the garage.
Lóutī bèi cóng chēkù lǐ tuī chūlái。
楼梯被从车库里推出来。
My car was in the garage and sheltered from the hail.
Wǒ de chē tíngzài chēkù lǐ，duǒbì bīngbáo。
我的车停在车库里，躲避冰雹。
We used the garage to stock up on supplies.
Wǒmen yòng chēkù lái chǔbèi gōngjǐ。
我们用车库来储备供给。
My mother switched on the light in the garage.
Wǒ māma dǎkāile chēkù lǐ de dēng。
我妈妈打开了车库里的灯。
My parents came back inside，worn out from the repairs to the temporary garage.
Wǒ de fùmǔ huídào wū nèi，tāmen zài línshí chēkù lèide jīnpí-lìjìn。
我的父母回到屋内，他们在临时车库累得筋疲力尽。
We car was kept in the garage for another few years.
Wǒmen de chē bèi guān zài chēkù yòu hǎojǐ nián。
我们的车被关在车库又好几年。
He locked the ladders in the garage overnight.
Tā liányè bǎ tīzi suǒzàile chēkù lǐ。
他连夜把梯子锁在了车库里。
The truck gave him a tow to the garage.
Kǎchē bǎ tā tuōxiàng chēkù。
卡车把他拖向车库。
He started the company in his garage.
Tā zài zìjǐ de chēkù zhōng chuàngjiànle zhèjiā Gōngsī。
他在自己的车库中创建了这家公司。
The garage served to shelter his horses.
Chēkù yòng zuò tā de mǎpéng。
车库用做他的马棚。
My garage backs their yard.
Wǒ de chēkù zài tāmen de yuànzi hòumiàn。
我的车库在他们的院子后面。
We don\'t garage our car.
Wǒmen méiyǒu bǎ chē fàngrù chēkù。
我们没有把车放入车库。
The garage was an afterthought.
Nàgè chēkù shì hòulái de xiǎngfǎ。
那个车库是后来的想法。
The analogy I resorted to was a garage or cellar.
wǒ bǎ tāmen bǐyù chéng chēkù huò dìjiào。
我把它们比喻成车库或地窖。
兵库
秦兵马俑是中国艺术殿堂中的瑰宝，同时也是世界艺术宝库中的珍品。
在卷帙浩繁的文学宝库中，《红楼梦》是一颗华美宝石。
Zài juànzhì hàofán de wénxué bǎokù zhōng，《Hónglóumèng》 shì yì kē huáměi bǎoshí。
A Dream of Red Mansions is a beautiful gemstone in the vast literature collection.
中国医药学是一个伟大的宝库。
Zhōngguó yīyàoxué shì yígè wěidà de bǎokù。
Chinese medicine and pharmacology are a great treasure-house.
自学是打开知识宝库的一把金钥匙。
Zìxué shì dǎkāi zhīshi bǎokù de yìbǎ jīnyàoshi。
Self-study is the golden key to the treasure-trove of knowledge.
龙门石窑是河南洛阳的著名景点，是一个古代石刻艺术的宝库。
Lóngménshíyáo shì Hénán Luòyáng de zhùmíng jǐngdiǎn，shì yígè gǔdài shíkè yìshù de bǎokù。
Longmen Grottoes is a famous sight spot in Luoyang in Henan province, and also a treasure house of ancient stone-carving art.
书籍是智慧的宝库。
秦兵马俑是中国艺术殿堂中的瑰宝，同时也是世界艺术宝库中的珍品。
知识的渊薮，智慧的宝库。
Books are avenues to knowledge.
书是知识的宝库。
a mine of information
消息(或资料)的来源；知识的宝库
The sea is the world\'s greatest thesaurus of minerals and food.
海洋是世界上最大的矿物和食物宝库。
The arboretum is a world treasure trove of botanical resources.
这个植物园是世界植物资源的宝库。
Movie 6 Channel is a treasure trove of classic and high quality international movies.
电影六台二十四小时不停播放国际怀旧精采好片，是经典电影的宝库。
Both books are a mine of information about the wildlife.
Liǎng běn shū dōu shì yǒuguān yěshēng dòngzhíwù de zhīshi bǎokù。
两本书都是有关野生动植物的知识宝库。
Mother\'s attic was a treasure trove when we were looking for antiques.
Mǔqīn de gélóu shì yí gè gǔdǒng de bǎokù。
母亲的阁楼是一个古董的宝库。
Her book was a treasure trove of new ideas.
Tā de shū shì yí gè xīn xiǎngfǎ de bǎokù。
她的书是一个新想法的宝库。
对不起，请您绕行走廊，中厅不许穿行。
Duìbuqǐ，qǐng nín ràoxíng zǒuláng，zhōng tīng bùxǔ chuānxíng。
Excuse me, would you please go round using the corridor, it is not permitted to go through the lobby.
我家中厅垂挂着一副启功先生的墨宝。
Wǒjiā zhōng tīng chuíguà zhe yífù Qǐgōng xiānshēng de mòbǎo。
A piece of calligraphy written by Mr. Qigong is hanging in the hall of our house.
宝物被放在展厅的最中间。
Bǎowù bèi fàngzài zhǎntīng de zuìzhōngjiān。
The precious article is placed at the center of the exhibition hall.
在客船的中上层，有两个餐厅，一个舞厅。
Zài kèchuán de zhōng shàngcéng，yǒu liǎnggè cāntīng，yígè wǔtīng。
On the middle and upper levels of the passenger ship there are two dining rooms and one ballroom.
中央办公厅。
西餐厅将集中展示瑞士特菜。
The party will be at the grand ball room of the hotel.
晚会会在宾馆的豪华舞厅中举行。
The temperature and humidity in the hall are strictly controlled to protect antique exhibitions.
展厅中的温度和湿度是严格控制的，以保护古董展品。
A small rat suddenly appeared in the living room.
Yì zhī xiǎo lǎoshǔ tūrán chūxiàn zài kètīng zhōng。
一只小老鼠突然出现在客厅中。
After shopping in town, we went to a Chinese resturant to have dinner.
Zài shāngyèqū gòuwù zhīhòu，wǒmen zǒujìn yìjiā Zhōngguó cāntīng chīfàn。
在商业区购物之后，我们走进一家中国餐厅吃饭。
There are several highly recommended Chinese restaurants.
Zhèer yǒu hǎo jǐ jiā bèi jílì tuījiàn de Zhōngguó cāntīng。
这儿有好几家被极力推荐的中国餐厅。
In the living room there was a tank of colorful fish.
Kètīng zhōng yǒu yì gāng wǔyánliùsè de jīnyú。
客厅中有一缸五颜六色的金鱼。
The music had a fullness that echoed through the hall.
Xiǎngliàng de yīnyuèshēng zài dàtīng zhōng huíxiǎng。
响亮的音乐声在大厅中回响。
Please put that table in the centre of the living room.
请把桌子放在客厅的中间。
The band was playing on one of the balconies.
Yuèduì zhèngzài qízhōng yí gè lóu tīng shàng yǎnchū。
乐队正在其中一个楼厅上演出。
Light pours daylong into the parlor.
Dēngguāng zhěngrì zhàoshè rù kètīng zhīzhōng。
灯光整日照射入客厅之中。
The seance was held in the medium\'s parlor.
Jiàng shén huì zài zhōngjiān de kètīng jǔxíng。
降神会在中间的客厅举行。
We stepped outside the hall into the cool evening.
Wǒmen zǒudào Dàtīng wàimiàn liángshuǎng de yèsè zhōng。
我们走到大厅外面凉爽的夜色中。
He was watching her surreptitiously as she waited in the hotel lobby.
Dāng tā zài jiǔdiàn de dàtīng lǐ děngzhe de shíhou，tā zhèngzài ànzhōng guānchá tā。
当她在酒店的大厅里等着的时候，他正在暗中观察她。
The actress high-tailed to her villa when reporters began to follow her to the restaurant.
Dāng jìzhěmen wěisuí tā láidào Cāntīng shí，zhège nǚyǎnyuán yòu xùnsù duǒ dào tā de Biéshù zhōng。
当记者们尾随她来到餐厅时，这个女演员又迅速躲到她的别墅中。
The characters in Henry James\' novels are forever paying calls on each other, usually in the parlor of some residence.
Hēnglì·Zhānmǔsī xiǎoshuō zhōng de rénwù yǒngyuǎn zài xiānghù bàifǎng，tōngcháng shì zài yìxiē jūsuǒ de kètīng。
亨利·詹姆斯小说中的人物永远在相互拜访，通常是在一些居所的客厅。
音乐厅的隔音设备是从美国进口的。
Yīnyuètīng de géyīn shèbèi shì cóng Měiguó jìnkǒu de。
The sound insulation equipment in the concert hall was imported from the US.
她第一次在音乐厅登台演出就把听众镇住了。
tā dì yícì zài yīnyuètīng dēngtái yǎnchū jiùbǎ tīngzhòng zhènzhù le。
Her debut took the concert hall by storm.
修盖音乐厅。
I went to see her sing at the concert hall last year, and she absolutely butchered my favorite song.
我去年在音乐厅听了她的演唱，她彻底把我最喜欢的歌给毁了。
With the newly built concert hall this town will never be called a cultural desert again.
有了这座新落成的音乐厅，这座城市再也不会被称作文化荒漠了。
The concert hall was voided of the audience.
Yīnyuètīng kōngwúyìrén。
音乐厅空无一人。
This singer always packs the concert halls.
Zhè míng gēshǒu zǒng néng ràng yīnyuètīng shuǐxièbùtōng。
这名歌手总能让音乐厅水泄不通。
The prodigy played Carnegie Hall at the age of 16.
Zhè wèi shéntóng shíliù suì jiù zài kǎ nèi jī yīnyuètīng biǎoyǎn。
这位神童16岁就在卡内基音乐厅表演。
Horowitz is performing at Carnegie Hall tonight.
Huòluòwéizī jīnwǎn zài Kǎnèijī yīnyuètīng biǎoyǎn。
霍洛维兹今晚在卡内基音乐厅表演。
His playing coruscated throughout the concert hall.
Tā de yǎnzòu shǐ zhěnggè yīnyuètīng yìyìshēnghuī。
他的演奏使整个音乐厅熠熠生辉。

Xiǎngliàng de yīnyuèshēng zài dàtīng zhōng huíxiǎng。

We attend music programs at Liberty Hall.
Wǒmen chūxí le zài Xiāoyáotīng jǔxíng de yīnyuè jiémù。
我们出席了在逍遥厅举行的音乐节目。
We went to a concert at City Hall last weekend.
我们上周末去市政厅观看了一场音乐会。
